property.desc:
THIS IS A VERY SPECIAL RESORT! Nestled around the Santa Rosalia Lake with beach areas to relax, several sports and leisure facilites including a Golf course, an abundance of trees, plants and pedestrian walking paths, a sustainable high-tech water irrigation system to maintain all of the green areas that this resort has to offer. The lake has more than 16,000mÂ² of turquoise water with world-leading pool filtration system for large lakes and lagoons for swimming and water sports.
There are plenty of paths for running, walking and cycling. You will find charming spots for relaxing and yoga. Then there is also the Beach Club which is perfect for Al-Fresco dining and enjoying a cocktail or drink. What more do you need to enjoy your time here in Murcia?
There are limited property options due to high demand. Please contact us for the latest availability. The properties are under construction and due to be delivered in 2026.
The Resort is located in the area of Torre de Pacheco just a 6 minute drive from the beaches of Los Alcazares, where you have a host of amenities, restaurants and shops.

property.property-address: Santiago de la Ribera, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.desc:
This development of detached villas are walking distance to the beach and amenities of Santiago de la Ribera. They will be completed by May 2024.
The properties are comprised over 2 levels and also a roof solarium to enjoy sunshine all year round. They all come with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and a private swimming pool.
Included in the price is a fully fitted kitchen with oven, hob, microwave and extractor fan. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. There is off-road parking for one car.
Santiago de la Ribera is a great Spanish beach town. Full of amenities, restaurants and coffee shops. There are nice walks to do alongside the coast. Just a 30 minute drive from Murcia airport.

property.property-address: Las Colinas Golf, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
Last apartments available for this exclusive development of luxury apartments with 2 or 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, situated in the prestigious Las Colinas Golf Resort.
The apartments have an open plan living room/kitchen, with patio doors giving access to a large terrace offering amazing views over the surrounding green areas. There is a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, one or two further bedroom(s) and a second bathroom. The ground floor apartments have a private garden and the penthouses have a private roof terrace.
There is a beautiful communal pool, and each apartment comes with its own private parking space in the underground area and with a spacious storage room.
All the white goods in the kitchen are included in the price, as are the fully installed ducted air conditioning throughout, the underfloor heating in the bathrooms, and a complete home automation system.
About the location:
Las Colinas Golf is a prestigious and exclusive golf resort, situated less than 10 minutes from the white sandy beaches of the Mediterranean, and with all local amenities in nearby San Miguel de Salinas or in Villamartin. There is a security guard at the only entrance to the resort, to ensure maximum peace of mind.

This level also has a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, and a separate lavatory. The first floor has two further bedrooms and a second bathroom. From the living room level there is also an internal staircase down to the underground garage, which offers ample room for two cars.
The properties are situated on spacious plots and are fully fenced. They are finished with a landscaped garden and a private pool (8,5 x 3,5 m)
All the white goods in the kitchen are included in the price, as are the fully installed ducted air conditioning throughout the villa, the underfloor heating in the bathrooms, and a complete home automation system.

property.property-address: Las Colinas Golf, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:

They are under construction and ready for June 2025.
All apartments are finished using the highest quality materials including marble floors, polished wood, ambient lighting. This superior design creates space, light with a warm contemporary feel.
All apartments consist of 2 and 3 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms, spread across 2 blocks with options of ground floor, mid-floor and penthouse with private rooftop solarium. There are beautiful communal gardens with an outdoor infinity pool and beautiful landscaped gardens. Parking and storage included in the price.

It has a stunning entrance which has 24-hour security, 3 tennis courts, 2 paddle courts, clubhouse, mini supermarket, sushi bar, Mediterranean restaurant and a gym. The magnificent La Glea beach in Campoamor is just a few minutes drive from the resort.

property.property-address: Las Colinas Golf, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:

All of the apartments have two terraces looking south to the natural park and forest or looking to the golf course giving both orientations of shade and sun throughout the whole year. Some of the upper apartments have distant sea views.

property.property-address: La Finca Resort, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This development is currently under construction on the La Finca Golf Resort and you have the choice of apartments, semi-detached and detached villas with private pools.
Estimated delivery for the the first phase is for May 2024 and the next phase will be ready in September 2024.
Included in the price are the fully installed hot and cold air-conditioning, and underfloor heating and shower screens in both bathrooms. A private parking space with storage room is also included.
The development will have a beautiful communal pool, and communal gardens with sun bed area. And there is a private pool in the detached villas.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
La Finca Golf Resort is built around a stunning golf course. It offers a high-quality lifestyle and has a good range of local shops, bars and restaurant, all within easy walking distance. Nearby Ciudad Quesada offers you a wider range of amenities, including shopping centre, water park, and a vibrant night life. The stunning beaches of Guardamar del Segura are just a 15 minutesÂ´ drive away.

This development have a total of 4 villas are now available to purchase off-plan, situated front line to the prestigious La Finca Golf Course, all with stunning views of the golf course and the mountains.
Construction time is 14-15 months from signing the contract.
The outside space consists of a large garden, designed to your own needs, a barbecue area and a private infinity pool with chill area.
There is ducted hot and cold air-conditioning and underfloor heating throughout the whole villa, all bathrooms are fitted with shower screens and mirrors, and there is a Home Automation System.Availability and prices may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
La Finca Golf Course is a prestigious development, situated just between the towns of Algorfa and Ciudad Quesada. There is a good range of local amenities available within easy walking distance, with lovely shops, bars and restaurants. There is also a spa hotel on-site. The beautiful white sandy beaches of Guardamar del Segura are only a short 15 minutesÂ´ drive away.

These new build villas in the popular La Finca Golf resort are under construction. This particular villa is semi-detached and ready in April of 2025
The property has the living area on the ground level, two bedrooms and two bathrooms on the upper level. There is a small basement that can be used as a gym or cinema room. There is also access to a large private roof solarium where you get views and sunshine all day long.
Included in the price is pre-installation of air-conditioning and a 4x2.5m private swimming pool. There is also off-road parking for one car. Please contact us for the latest availability, floor plans and full building specifications.
Las Finca golf resort is a well-established area with beautiful surroundings and great views of the countryside. It also has a great mixture of all year-round residents and visiting tourists with the Spanish towns of Algorfa and Los Montesinos a short drive away.

This new development of 12 south facing apartments has just been released. They are under construction and will be ready for March 2025. Just a 15 minute walk from all of the amenties of Villamartin and a 10 minute drive from the beach.
All the penthouse apartments have two bedrooms and two bathrooms and a private roof terrace.
Upon entrance, the properties have a spacious living room, with patio doors giving access to the balcony, an open-plan kitchen, a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a second double bedroom, and a second bathroom. Exterior stairs lead up to the spacious private roof terrace which features an aluminium pergola with wood-like finish on the roof terrace.
The development is fully fenced, with landscaped communal gardens and a beautiful communal pool. The apartments have a parking place and a storage room in the underground garage included. There is also off-road outdoor parking within the fenced part of the development.
The properties are equipped with a Home Automation System, with remote control of shutters, lights and alarm.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
Location: The Villamartin area is very popular with tourists and most of the population consists of European expatriates who have settled there in the last 10 years, virtually transforming the village into a modern-looking town. There are also other golf courses nearby and numerous beaches.

Ready for January 2025, these 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments could be yours to own and just 200m from the sea and with a roof top communal swimming pool.
This is a ground floor apartment with no terrace.
The properties comprise of two bedrooms and two shower rooms, an open-plan living room and kitchen diner which has lots of light and space. On this particular ground floor apartment, there is no terrace, but a lift will take you up to the upper level of the building where you can enjoy the sunshine all day plus a dip in the pool during the warmer season. It is a real luxury to get a roof top pool in this area of La Mata, so close to all the amenities, restaurants coffee shops and beach.
Included in the price is pre-installation of hot and cold air-conditioning. There is an option to have underfloor heating as an extra.
This part of Torrevieja and La Mata boats a large sandy beach and long promenades to take a stroll. Conveniently located just a 30 minute drive from Alicante airport.

This fantastic project of KEY READY semi -detached villas is situated in La Herrada, Los Montesinos, a lovely location walking distance in to the town where you will find all the amenities you require and only a short drive away from the beaches of Guardamar. Ready for the Spring of 2024.
This project has 32 semi-detached villas spread across two floors with approximately 150 square meters of plot, constructed with the best materials , including solarium, bath screens, garden finished with artificial grass , pre-installation for solar panels, electric socket and electric gate.
On entering these villas you are greeted with a spacious open plan living room, dining room and kitchen with floor to ceiling windows to allow plenty of sunlight giving them an bright and open feel. From the living room there are patio doors leading out to a tiled terrace, private 3x4m swimming pool and garden area along with private driveway.
Leading on from the kitchen there is a ground floor double bedroom and separate bathroom with walk-in shower.
There is a staircase leading to the first floor where there are 2 double bedrooms both with en-suite and access to the balcony. All the bedrooms have built-in wardrobes. The staircase leads on again to a further level where you will find the roof-top solarium.
La Herrada is a lovely area located on the edge of Los Montesinos. There is a supermarket and a couple of bars and restaurants within a few minutes walk. The main town of Los Montesinos is around a 20-minute walk away where you will find more bars and restaurants along with pharmacies, banks, shops and much more. The beaches of Guardamar are less than a 20-minute drive away.

These 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment are situated beachside Punta Prima and will be ready for delivery in the summer of 2026 and spring 2027 .
The development is fully gated for maximum security and offers extensive communal gardens, a large pool area with a main pool and separate heated pool, a childrenÂ´s pool, jacuzzi, gym, sauna, pÃ©tanque, chess table, table tennis table, paddle court, childrenÂ´s play area and a bicycle parking.
The available 3 bedroom apartments are located on the ground floor, middle floors and penthouse. The last remaining ground floor apartment is â¬ 384.000, the middle floor apartments start at â¬ 364.000 and the penthouse apartments start at â¬ 485.000.
On the ground floor the apartment features a spacious open plan living / dining room and fitted kitchen, separate utility room, 2 double bedrooms, a guest bathroom and the master bedroom with en suite bathroom. Sliding doors open up from the living room and master bedroom onto the private terrace and garden.
The middle floor and penthouse apartments have the same layout with sliding doors opening up from the living room and master bedroom onto the private terrace.
In the penthouse apartment you have interior stairs leading up from the living room onto the private solarium. Here you have amazing views and can take the sun or entertain friends and family and enjoy the Mediterranean climate.
Included in each apartment are underground parking and storage with direct elevators from garages and storage areas, pre-installation of charging for electric vehicles, vitroceramic induction hob, extractor hood, integrated oven and microwave, fridge-freezer and dishwasher ( both can be integrated ), underfloor heating in all bathrooms, hot and cold air conditioning.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
About the location: Punta Prima is part of the Orihuela Costa area, which offers clean and white beaches, beautiful golf courses, hundreds of bars and restaurants, and a fantastic all-year-round infrastructure. The dry Mediterranean climate guarantees plenty of sun, whilst the winter months offer the highest temperatures and lowest precipitations of all of mainland Spain. This area is very popular for both holiday use and permanent residency, and many ex-pats chose it for its high-quality lifestyle.

These brand new modern semi-detached villas are currently under construction and ready for June 2025. Situated on La Finca golf resort with stunning views of the mountains, countryside and the beautiful golf course. The properties are a short walk from a host of bars, shops and restaurants and the beach is only a fifteen-minute drive away.
These villas comprise of a spacious lounge/diner with patio doors leading into the garden with a private swimming pool, an open plan kitchen with fitted appliances including oven, hob, extractor, fridge/freezer, washing machine, dishwasher and microwave. There are two double bedrooms both of which have access to a guest bathroom. On the upper level there is a further master bedroom with an en-suite shower room.
The villa includes pre-installation of air-conditioning, mirrors and underfloor heating in the bathrooms, a 6x3 private pool and also has access to the beautiful communal gardens with communal swimming pool.
La Finca golf resort is a well-established area with beautiful surroundings and great views of the countryside. It also has a great mixture of all year-round residents and visiting tourists with the Spanish towns of Algorfa and Los Montesinos a short drive away. The bars, shops and restaurants are also only a short walk away.

There is a master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, two further double bedrooms, and a second bathroom. All three bedrooms have built-in wardrobes. An external staircase gives access to a roof terrace.
The houses are situated on spacious, fully fenced plots with car ports, finished with a landscaped garden, a private 7.5x4 meter private pool, and roof top solariums.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This brand new development consists of 17 detached villas. These modern style 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom villas are located in the town of Pilar de la Horadada and come with a private swimming pool.
The villas are KEY READY and some are ready for March 2025.
The villas comprise of an open plan lounge with large patio doors leading out into the private garden with swimming pool, open plan kitchen with fitted appliances including oven, hob, extractor, fridge/freezer, washing machine, dishwasher and microwave, a double bedroom with access to the rear terrace, outdoor storage room and a guest bathroom.
On the first floor there is the master bedroom with fitted wardrobes and an en suite bathroom and its own private sun terrace, another double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and an en suite. A further staircase leads to a private rooftop solarium.
Each villa includes pre-installed vented air conditioning, fitted kitchen appliances, private swimming pool landscaped garden, off road parking and electric shutters.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor-plans.
Pilar de la Horadada is a vibrant, typically Spanish town on the most southern point of the Costa Blanca. It has a good local infrastructure, making it a very suitable place for both permanent residency and short holidays. There is a good selection of local shops, bars and restaurants within easy walking distance. The beautiful white sandy beaches are just a 5 minute drive away, as is the local Lo Romero golf course.

This fantastic small development of 9 new build detached villas all consist of 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. They are situated in Benimar, Rojales which is a lovely location within walking distance of the town where you will find all the amenities you require and only a short drive away from the beaches of Guardamar del Segura.
The villas are spread across two floors and constructed with the best materials and include the kitchen appliances, bath screens, garden finished with artificial grass, a private swimming pool and optional solarium.
These villas welcome you with a spacious open concept living room, dining area, and kitchen. Floor to ceiling windows let in plenty of light, giving the rooms a bright, airy vibe. Patio doors in the living room open to a tiled terrace, a 7 x 3 m private pool, a garden area, and a private driveway.
A ground floor double bedroom and separate bathroom with a walk-in shower are located adjacent to the living room.
On the first level, there are two double bedrooms, each with an ensuite bathroom and access to a balcony. Built-in wardrobes are present in every bedroom. There is an optional stairway that continues up to a higher level, where there is a roof-top solarium.
Rojales is a charming, typically Spanish town, situated on the Rio Segura. It offers a high-quality lifestyle and has a good range of local shops, bars, and restaurants, all within easy walking distance. Nearby is Ciudad Quesada, a popular town with local ex-pats, which offers a golf course, shopping centre, water park, and a vibrant nightlife. The beautiful white sandy beaches of Guardamar del Segura are only 15 minutes away.

Villas Galan is a superb new development of only 10 properties which consist of 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom detached villas with optional private pools in a great location being only a few minutesâ walk from restaurants, bars and shops.
The villas are under construction and ready for June and September of 2024.
The ground floor is comprised of an open plan lounge/dining area with patio doors leading out into the private garden with swimming pool, an open plan kitchen with utility room, a double bedroom, and a guest bathroom.
The first floor consists of a large master bedroom with ensuite and access to a private sun terrace, another double bedroom also with ensuite and a staircase which leads up to the upper level where you will find a large 32mÂ² private solarium on which to enjoy the all-day sun.
We think: "These are beautiful high-quality villas, set in a great location close to all amenities and just a short drive to golf and the sea."
The Villamartin area is very popular with tourists and most of the population consists of Western European expatriate communities who have settled there in the last 10 years, virtually transforming the village into a modern looking town. There are also another 3 golf courses nearby and numerous beaches.

This new development of 15 detached villas with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, and with a private pool, is situated in the charming town of Benijofar, within easy walking distance of all the local amenities. The villas are due to be delivered in 2025.
On the ground floor, the villas have a spacious living room, with patio doors giving access to the front garden and pool area, an open plan kitchen, a master bedroom, and a Jack-and-Jill bathroom which is accessible both directly from the master bedroom and from the general living area. The second floor has two further double bedrooms and a second bathroom.
The development is situated in a quiet, residential area, opposite a municipal green area, and close to the town centre of Benijofar, where you will find a large selection of local shops, bars and restaurants. Each villa has its own individual private 6 x 3 m pool and off-road parking space on their own plot.
Included in the price are: aero-thermic boiler for hot water, pre-installation for ducted air conditioning, electric shutters throughout the property, downlights in the kitchen and living area, wall lamps in the garden, and electric hob and extractor fan in the kitchen.
About the location: Benijofar is a very pleasant town in the southern part of the Costa Blanca, very popular with the ex-pats, yet still retaining its original Spanish charm and character. It is situated very close to Ciudad Quesada and Rojales, and offers a great range of local amenities. There are two golf courses available within a 5 minute drive, and the glorious white sandy beaches of Guardamar del Segura are only 15 minutes away. The international Alicante airport is only 30 minutes in the car.

This last remaining, 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom penthouse is located in Los Balcones and enjoy beautiful salt lake views. They are only a few minutes drive from the sea and a host of bars, shops and restaurants.
This will be completed in February 2026.
The properties consists of a lounge/diner , an open plan American style kitchen, with patio doors onto a sun terrace, a master bedroom with en-suite and underfloor heating, a further 2 double bedrooms and a guest bathroom. Stairs take you upstairs to a private roof solarium where you get sun all day.
Option of an underground parking space and a storage area for 15,000 EUR. Included in the price you get, electric shutters, glass shower screens, mirrors in the bathroom and exterior lighting. The kitchen comes with a sink and extractor hood. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning.

The Los Balcones area is well established and close to a great range of amenities including bars, shops and restaurants and also the bustling Spanish town of Torrevieja is only a few minutes drive away.

property.property-address: San Miguel de Salinas, Costa Blanca South

The villas are situated on plot sizes starting from 175 m2, with a private pool included in the price. Included in the price are: solar panels for hot water, extractor fan in the kitchen, electric blinds throughout the villa, underfloor heating in all bathrooms, and pre-installation for ducted air conditioning.

There is a good range of local shops, bars and restaurants available within the development. And it has an 18-hole golf course, a bowls green, and various padel courts. The area benefits from the tranquility of the surrounding countryside, but still has very easy access to the Mediterranean beaches.

These 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment are situated beachside Punta Prima and will be ready for delivery in the summer of 2026 and spring 2027 .
The development is fully gated for maximum security and offers extensive communal gardens, a large pool area with a main pool and separate heated pool, a childrenÂ´s pool, jacuzzi, gym, sauna, pÃ©tanque, chess table, table tennis table, paddle court, childrenÂ´s play area and a bicycle parking.
The available 2 bedroom apartments are located on the middle floors and penthouse. The middle floor apartments start at â¬ 324.000 and the penthouse apartment at â¬ 429.000.
Inside the middle floor apartments comprise a spacious open plan living / dining room and fitted kitchen, separate utility room, a double bedroom, a guest bathroom and the master bedroom with en suite bathroom. Sliding doors open up from the living room and master bedroom onto the private terrace.
In the penthouse apartment you have interior stairs leading up from the living room onto the private solarium. Here you have amazing views and can take the sun or entertain friends and family and enjoy the Mediterranean climate.
Included in each apartment are underground parking and storage with direct elevators from garages and storage areas, pre-installation of charging for electric vehicles, vitroceramic induction hob, extractor hood, integrated oven and microwave, fridge-freezer and dishwasher ( both can be integrated ), underfloor heating in all bathrooms, hot and cold air conditioning.

About the location: Punta Prima is part of the Orihuela Costa area, which offers clean and white beaches, beautiful golf courses, hundreds of bars and restaurants, and a fantastic all-year-round infrastructure. The dry Mediterranean climate guarantees plenty of sun, whilst the winter months offer the highest temperatures and lowest precipitations of all of mainland Spain. This area is very popular for both holiday use and permanent residency, and many ex-pats chose it for its high-quality lifestyle.

It is situated in the southernmost part of the Costa Blanca, very close to the fabulous Mar Menor area. The white sandy beaches are just a couple of kilometres away and are easily accessible. The town centre is just a short walk away and offers a great selection of lovely shops, bars and restaurants. Various award winning golf courses are also available in the area.

This area is particularly popular with people looking to enjoy the pleasant winter climate and the health benefits that the salt lakes offer.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South

It has a very good local infrastructure, making it a very suitable place for both permanent residency and short holidays. There is an excellent selection of local shops, bars and restaurants within easy walking distance. The beautiful white sandy beaches are just a 5 minute drive away, as is the local Lo Romero Golf Course.

The area of Los Montesinos is well established and has a variety of shops, bars, restaurants, banks, pharmacies, doctors, dentists etc. The town hosts annual fiestas along with many other different events throughout the year, it is a short drive from the Blue Flag beaches of Guardamar and a short drive to Torrevieja also.

It boasts lots of restaurants, shops and bars and its cobbled streets have numerous Spanish tapas bars for you to enjoy a glass of wine in the sun.

There is an apartment of 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Underground parking spaces with storage units can be bought separately.
Each apartment will be delivered with fridge-freezer, hob/oven, microwave and extractor fan. Fully installed ducted air conditioning throughout the apartments will be included in the price, as will be the shower screens in both bathrooms.
The development will have two communal outdoor pools, surrounded by beautiful sub-tropical gardens. There will also be a heated indoor pool, with spa area, fitness room and sauna. On the roof top there will be communal lounge areas.
Other options are also available Prices and availability are subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
About the area: Campoamor is a very popular holiday destination, with fantastic white sandy beaches, a beautiful marina, and a good range of local bars and restaurants within easy walking distance. It is a part of the municipality called Orihuela Costa, where you have all the amenities that you need, as well as no less than 3 championship golf courses and the fabulous Zenia Boulevard shopping centre, all within a 10 minute drive.

NEW RELEASE of 16 detached villas with a private pool and use of a communal pool, situated in the popular Villamartin area of Orihuela Costa. A 15 minute walk to a host of restaurants and amenities and just a 10 minute drive to the beach. Ready for March 2025.
The detached villas have a bright and spacious living room with open plan kitchen. Patio doors give direct access to the garden and 4 x 2 mÂ² private pool area. There is 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom on the ground floor, then 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom on the first floor.
The gardens are landscaped to your own individual design, with tiled sunbathing areas, and with exterior lighting. Some of the villas will also have a private parking space within their own garden, and others will have a designated parking space in the communal car park.
A beautiful communal pool is going to be available within the development, which is going to be surrounded by sun terraces and garden areas.
Each property will be protected by a fully installed alarm system and by an elegantly finished armoured front door. There is also an advanced home automation system with which you will have control over the motorized shutters and 3 light points. Pre-installation for air conditioning is also included.
Prices and availability are subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
About the location: This complex is situated in a quiet part of Villamartin, yet only a short stroll away from the lively bars and restaurants of Villamartin Plaza, and from the well-known Villamartin Golf Course. The area has an abundance of local amenities and is very popular with ex-pats, choosing it for its high-quality lifestyle. Within the wider Orihuela Costa area there are two more golf courses and various commercial areas with plenty of shops, bars, and restaurants. The beautiful white sandy beaches that the area is so famous for are only a short drive away, and so is the fantastic shopping centre Zenia Boulevard.

Montesinos villas is an exclusive development of brand new 3/4 bedroom, 2 bathroom detached villas with private pools located in the Spanish town of Los Montesinos. The villas are built to the highest standard and there is a choice of large plots available.
There are KEY READY options but this price is for off-plan.
This beautiful villa comprises of an open plan lounge with patio doors leading out onto the terrace and garden with an 8 x 3 metre swimming pool, dining area, a fully fitted modern kitchen with feature island and appliances including oven, hob, extractor, fridge/freezer, dishwasher, washing machine and microwave. There is a laundry room, two large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a guest bathroom also on this level.
The first floor comprises of a master bedroom with fitted wardrobes, en suite bathroom and access to the large 30 mÂ² sun terrace, another optional double bedroom also with fitted wardrobes and another bathroom.
This high quality villa includes private swimming pool, vented hot and cold air conditioning, interior and exterior lights, kitchen appliances, video intercom and electric shutters.
Los Montesinos is a traditional Spanish town which has a host of amenities including bars, shops, restaurants and a lovely plaza area to meet and enjoy a glass of wine in the sun. The beautiful beaches of Guardamar is only a fifteen minute drive away.

This brand-new development of luxury villas is situated in the urbanisation La Herrada, on the outskirts of Los Montesinos. The current phase III of the development consists of 6 villas, with completion scheduled 8 months after signing of the purchase contract.
Each villa has a spacious and bright open space living area with American kitchen, one double bedroom with en-suite bathroom, and one cloakroom on the ground floor, and two further double bedrooms and a bathroom on the first floor. On the first floor there is a large terrace with access from both bedrooms. There is the option to have a roof terrace, offering stunning views over the surrounding countryside.
The available plots vary in size between 201 m2 and 409 m2, are fully enclosed, and have their own car parking space. Each plot also has the option to have its own 5 x 3 m private pool.
Included in the price are underfloor heating and shower screens in all the bathrooms, all kitchen appliances (fridge freezer, oven, hob, extractor fan, washing machine and dish washer), electric shutters, built-in wardrobes, and pre-installation for air conditioning.
Please contact us for the latest availability and floor plans.
About the area:
La Herrada is a quiet residential urbanisation, situated on the outskirts of Los Montesinos. The urbanisation has its own supermarket and a few bars and restaurants, and all the amenities of Los Montesinos are also within easy walking distance. Los Montesinos has a very lively atmosphere, with a good mix of Spanish residents and expats. The larger city of Torrevieja, the beautiful sandy beaches of the Guardamar del Segura, and a range of stunning golf courses are all just a short drive away.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This brand new 2 or 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment is situated in a small development of 18 properties with a beautiful communal area with swimming pool and off road parking only a few kilometres from the sea.
The apartment comprises of a lounge/dining room with patio doors leading out onto the sun terrace and private garden, an open plan kitchen with fitted appliances including oven, hob, extractor, fridge/freezer, dishwasher and microwave. There is a master bedroom with en suite and underfloor heating, another double bedroom and a guest bathroom also with underfloor heating. Both bedrooms have access to the rear sun terrace.
The apartment includes all kitchen appliances, LED lights in the bathrooms, kitchen and lounge and underfloor heating in both bathrooms.
There is a beautiful communal area with swimming pool and a choice of ground floor or penthouse options available.
We think: "This is a beautiful modern property and is great value for money, set in a great location close to all amenities and is just a few minutes from the Spanish town of Pilar de la Horadada and the sea."
Pilar de la Horadada is a bustling Spanish town with lots of choice for bars, shops and restaurants and only a few minutes from the beach. The Dos Mares shopping mall is also a few minutes drive away.

property.property-address: San Miguel de Salinas, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
These Brand new modern high quality detached Villas come with 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms and enjoy stunning sea and salt lake views. They are sold off-plan with a construction time of 20 months.
These beautiful Villas are in between San Miguel and Villamartin and only a short drive to the Villamartin plaza with all the restaurants, bars and a supermarket. In a 10 minute drive you are at La Zenia Boulevard, the biggest shopping centre on the Costa Blanca.
On the ground floor there is a large living room with an open plan kitchen, which leads you out into the private garden area with swimming pool, a double bedroom with en-suite and a guest bathroom.
On the first floor there is a large master bedroom with en-suite with access to a private sun terrace, two further bedrooms and a guest bathroom. There is an internal staircase which leads up to a large private solarium.
The villas comes with a lot of extras, there is underfloor heating in the bathrooms, mirrors and shower screen, all white goods, outdoor lights, electric gate and air conditioning pre-installation and even a lift.
We think: "This is a beautiful high quality villa, set in a great location close to all amenities and is just a short drive to golf and the sea."
San Miguel is a traditional Spanish town and is very popular with tourists and the population consists of Western European expatriate communities who have settled there over the last 15 years. It boasts lots of restaurants, shops and bars and its cobbled streets have numerous Spanish tapas bars for you to enjoy a glass of wine in the sun.

These 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments are located in Los Balcones and enjoy beautiful salt lake views. They are only a few minutes drive from the sea and a host of bars, shops and restaurants.
There are a few options available. Some are ready for October 2025 and a couple are ready for February 2026.
The properties consists of a lounge/diner , an open plan American style kitchen, with patio doors onto a sun terrace, a master bedroom with en-suite and underfloor heating, a further double bedroom and a guest bathroom.
Option of an underground parking space and a storage area for 15,000 EUR. Included in the price you get, electric shutters, glass shower screens, mirrors in the bathroom and exterior lighting. The kitchen comes with a sink and extractor hood. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning.
Please be aware that these prices are subject to changes. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The Los Balcones area is well established and close to a great range of amenities including bars, shops and restaurants and also the bustling Spanish town of Torrevieja is only a few minutes drive away.

These modern 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom detached villas are being built on the border of Cabo Roig and Campoamor. The location is ideal, being a short walking distance to the beach, supermarkets, shops and restaurants. They are sold off-plan and take 20 months to build.
This Sylvia model is situated on a plot of 500mÂ² with landscaped gardens and private pool included. The ground floor is comprised of a 44mÂ² open plan living/dining and kitchen space, a double bedroom with en-suite and a guest bathroom. The first floor consists of a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and a balcony, two more double bedrooms and a family bathroom. Stairs from this floor lead up to the large rooftop solarium with spectacular sea views. There are also 3 bedroom Silvia Model villas available. Please contact us for more information.
Also included in the price is pre-installation for ducted air conditioning and underfloor heating in the bathrooms.
We think - "These villas are very finished to a very high standard and are a short stroll to some of the most beautiful beaches on the south costa blanca."
The Cabo Roig area is very popular with tourists and has many nationalities moving into the area making it a modern cosmopolitan place to live. It has many amenities a short walk away including supermarkets, bars, shops and restaurants. There are also golf courses nearby and numerous beaches

This brand new development of 3 bedroom, 3.5 bathroom luxury detached villa are located in the heart of the charming Spanish town Ciudad Quesada where all the amenities are a stoneâs throw away. Quesada is well connected to the coastal road and Guardamar beaches are around a ten-minute drive away.
The property is distributed all on one level and comprises of a large living room/dining room with an open plan kitchen and separate utility room. Leading on from the kitchen there is a lavatory and 3 large double bedrooms all with ensuite, built-in wardrobes and patio doors leading to the terraces. The largest of the bedrooms, being the master bedroom also has a fantastic walk-in wardrobe/dressing room.
Patio doors lead out from the living room into the garden where there is a large terrace, a 7x3m private pool, a large driveway for 2 cars and rooftop solarium.
There is an option to add an underbuild where there is the possibility to add further bedrooms and bathrooms, a home office, gym or cinema.
We think -" These modern villas are fantastic value for money in a great location surrounded by all of the local amenities with stunning views of the lagoon."
The Quesada area is a well-established area and has a host of shops, bars and restaurants. It is a short drive from the Blue Flag beaches of Guardamar and also hosts its own water park.

A new release of very contemporary semi-detached villas walking distance to the beach and amenities of Los Alcazares. They are about to begin building and will be ready for the summer of 2025.
The properties come with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. There is an en-suite master bedroom on the ground level. Open plan living room, kitchen and diner and a downstairs W.C. On the upper level you have 2 double bedrooms and a shared guest shower room. Both of the bedrooms upstairs lead out to a large sun terrace. There is an option to add a roof solarium for an extra 19,900â¬. The pool is also optional at an extra price. Prices for a 6x3m swimming pool start at 16,900â¬. There is off-road parking for one car on the plot.
The location is excellent being a flat walking distance to all of the amenities of Los Alcazares and the coast. The properties are also walking distance to La Serena Golf course, which hosts a very nice restaurant and Golf Club overlooking the Mar Menor sea. Los Alcazares also have many restaurants, coffee shops and amenities to offer with easy access to the motorway and the local airports.

NEW RELEASE - These 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom penthouse apartments are under construction and ready for June 2025. The development is just a 5 minute drive to the town of Roldan and a 20 minute drive to the beach town of Los Alcazares.
The penthouse apartments comprise of an open plan kitchen-diner, a living room with patio doors going out to a sun terrace, then an external staircase going up to a roof solarium where you get the sun all day long. There is a double bedroom with a separate shower room and a master bedroom with en-suite shower room.
There is pre-installation of hot and cold air-conditioning, there is a large communal pool and outdoor gymnasium. There is also off-road parking for each apartment inside the complex.
For an extra 8000â¬ you can purchase a storage space.
Prices and availability are subject to change so please contact us for further information and floor plans.
Roldan is a small but vibrant town with a host of amenities, you are also close to several golf courses and just 15 minutes away from the stunning beaches of the Mar Menor.

These 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom ground floor apartments are under construction and ready for June 2025. The development is just a 5 minute drive to the town of Roldan and a 20 minute drive to the beach town of Los Alcazares.
The ground floor apartments comprise of an open plan kitchen-diner, a living room with patio doors going out to a sun terrace, two double bedrooms with a separate shower room and a master bedroom with en-suite shower room.
There is pre-installation of hot and cold air-conditioning, there is a large communal pool and outdoor gymnasium. There is also off-road parking for each apartment inside the complex.
For an extra 8000â¬ you can purchase a storage space.
Prices and availability are subject to change so please contact us for further information and floor plans.
Roldan is a small but vibrant town with a host of amenities, you are also close to several golf courses and just 15 minutes away from the stunning beaches of the Mar Menor.

property.property-address: San Pedro del Pinatar, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.desc:
This is a newly released fantastic development of luxury apartments close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar and the beautiful beaches of the Mar Menor. Ready for June 2025.
The development consists of 3 blocks of apartments over 5 floors, comprising ground floors which are set higher up from the ground at 1.8m, 1st floors, 2nd floors, 3rd floors and Penthouses. There will be 51 properties, most of which are 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, each with a parking place in the basement.
These luxury apartments are being constructed using quality materials and finish with 100cm floor tiles inside and out. Fully fitted, equipped, and furnished bathrooms with suspended WCs and underfloor heating, fitted and equipped kitchen with Bosch or similar white goods, centrally controlled Hot and Cold Airconditioning and Electric shutters. The bedrooms are equipped with designed built-in wardrobes and the masters each are ensuite, all included in the price.
The apartments also benefit from a communal garden and heated infinity pool.
Prices are â¬299.000 for an incredible penthouse.
Prices and availability are liable to change without notice so please get in touch with us for plans and up-to-date information. Completions are expected in December 2025.
We have a show house from the same builder with similar finishes to view.
Located close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar which is a lovely coastal town in the Murcia Region, with all the amenities you could wish for all-year-round living and close to the stunning beaches of both the Mediterranean and Mar Menor and protected natural parks. Several golf courses and shopping malls are close by, and the town is serviced easily by (ALC) Alicante airport in 45 minutes or Murcia (RMU) in 35 minutes.

These 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom detached villas are walking distance to the Roda golf club and a 6 minute drive to the beach town of Los Alcazares. They will be completed by February 2025.
The properties are comprised over 2 levels and also a roof solarium to enjoy sunshine all year round. You have a double bedroom and shower room on the ground level and two double bedrooms and a guest shower room on the upper level. The upper level has a large terrace coming off the bedrooms with views towards the gold course. There kitchen and diner is open plan with patio doors leading out to the private swimming pool and terrace.
Included in the price is a fully fitted kitchen with oven, hob, microwave and extractor fan. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. There is off-road parking for one car.
Los Alcazares is a great Spanish beach town. Full of amenities, restaurants and coffee shops. There are nice walks to do alongside the coast. Just a 30 minute drive from Murcia airport. Roda Golf is one of the many popular Golf Resorts in the Murcia region.

property.property-address: Santiago de la Ribera, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.desc:
SPECIAL OFFER - Reduced to â¬352,000 from â¬373,000!!!! - This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom detached villas is walking distance to the beach and amenities of Santiago de la Ribera. They will be completed by August 2025.
The properties are comprised over 2 levels and also a roof solarium to enjoy sunshine all year round and sea views towards La Manga. You have a double bedroom and shower room on the ground level and two double bedrooms and a guest shower room on the upper level. There kitchen and diner is open plan with patio doors leading out to the private swimming pool and terrace.
Included in the price is a fully fitted kitchen with oven, hob, microwave and extractor fan. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. There is off-road parking for one car.
Santiago de la Ribera is a great Spanish beach town. Full of amenities, restaurants and coffee shops. There are nice walks to do alongside the coast. Just a 30 minute drive from Murcia airport.

THIS IS A VERY SPECIAL RESORT! Nestled around the Santa Rosalia Lake with beach areas to relax, several sports and leisure facilites including a Golf course, an abundance of trees, plants and pedestrian walking paths, a sustainable high-tech water irrigation system to maintain all of the green areas that this resort has to offer. The lake has more than 16,000mÂ² of turquoise water with world-leading pool filtration system for large lakes and lagoons for swimming and water sports.
There are plenty of paths for running, walking and cycling. You will find charming spots for relaxing and yoga. Then there is also the Beach Club which is perfect for Al-Fresco dining and enjoying a cocktail or drink. What more do you need to enjoy your time here in Murcia?
There are limited property options due to high demand. Please contact us for the latest availability. The properties are under construction and due to be delivered in 2026.
The 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom penthouse options come with terraces of 77mÂ². There is an en-suite double bedroom, two more double bedrooms and a guest shower room. There is an open-plan living and dining area which leads outside for Al-Fresco dining.
The properties include electric shutters, hot and cold ducted air-conditioning, a designated garage space and storage room in the underground communal car park.
The Resort is located in the area of Torre de Pacheco just a 6 minute drive from the beaches of Los Alcazares, where you have a host of amenities, restaurants and shops.

We are delighted to bring you a new development of fantastic modern 2 or 3 bedroom villas on a luxury complex of villas with private pools, finished gardens and private rooftop solariums in Roldan. These under construction and ready for June 2025
The properties comprise of 2 bedroom and 2 bathrooms on one level or a 3 bedroom 3 bathroom model over two floors. Both with fully fitted bathrooms and the master bedroom being en-suite. With a contemporary style and an open plan living/dining room and kitchen with an island. The kitchen is equipped with all appliances, indoor and outdoor LED lighting and pre-installed for Hot and Cold A/C.
The development is located in Roldan, within a gated and security-controlled resort of 300.000m2, surrounded by all services, sports facilities and close to several Golf Courses.
The property will meet the highest standards and include a private swimming pool with a seated bench and pre-installed heating system and a solar shower, summer kitchen in the solarium, fully finished and landscaped garden.
Please note prices and availability are liable to change without notice, so please contact us for up-to-date information and floor plans.

This is the first phase of a new development of 24 townhouses with private pool that are currently under construction in a residential area of San Javier. The townhouses are built on one level and have a private roof terrace. They are under construction and ready for March 2025.
Each villa has a spacious living room with patio doors giving access to the garden and pool area, an open plan kitchen, and two double bedrooms, each with their own en-suite bathroom.
The gardens are tiled with, with areas of artificial grass, and are fully fenced for optimal privacy. There is off-road parking space and a private pool. The 67 m2 roof terrace is fully tiled and is fitted with a summer kitchen.
All whitegoods are included in the price (fridge-freezer, hob, oven, extractor-fan, microwave, and dishwasher), as are the aero-thermic boiler, and the pre-installation for air conditioning.

It is an area that has a stable permanent population, which also makes it very popular for those seeking full-time residence. There is an excellent infrastructure with plenty of shops, bars and restaurants.

These 3 bedroom villas are ready for you to reserve and will be constructed within 12 months of signing the contract.
They are distributed on one level with a rooftop solarium. Each property has a master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom , plus two further bedrooms and guest bathroom, both bathrooms are fully equipped with shower screens and mirrors, all the bedrooms have fitted and lined wardrobes with drawers.The kitchen and living area are open plan with kitchen appliances included in the price. The penthouse apartments consist of an open plan kitchen/diner, lounge, three double bedrooms and two shower rooms of which one is an en-suite master bedroom. There is a lot of outside space having a 56mÂ² roof solarium and a 26mÂ² terrace.

You drive into an 160 m2 underbuild, which offers ample space for multiple cars, for extra accommodation, or for entertainment. An internal staircase leads into the spacious living room, with patio doors giving direct access to the large terrace and pool area, an open plan kitchen, double bedroom and a bathroom with shower. The first floor has two double bedrooms and a second bathroom with shower. An external staircase then leads onto a 45 m2 private roof terrace, offering sea views.
Included in the price are: all whitegoods (oven, hob, fridge-freezer, extractor, dishwasher and microwave), all internal and external LED lighting , air conditioning and private pool .
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
About the location: Los Belones is a typical Spanish village, just 2 kilometers from the Mar Menor seafront, with a lovely promenade, marina, supermarket, several bars and restaurants , , a tennis club with bar/restaurant, padel tennis courts and a gym. Close by you have the famous La Manga Club resort with 3 golf courses, the beautiful fishing village of Cabo de Palos with a wealth of fantastic restaurants, stunning beaches for snorkeling and the best diving in the Mediterranean, and a fantastic national park Cala Blanca, with hiking routes and beautiful beaches. A truly privileged location!

property.property-address: San Pedro del Pinatar, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.development: Las Dunas San Pedro Phase II
property.desc:
Residencial las Dunas of a small development of high-quality villas with private pools and rooftop solarium's in a great location close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar.
The villas comprise 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. On the ground floor, there is a large open plan kitchen with breakfast bar, dining and living room with large patio doors leading to the front terraced area and private pool. The kitchen is fully furnished and equipped with white goods with a back door that takes you to a utility area at the rear of the property. There is a good-sized ground-floor bedroom with patio doors leading to the terrace and a family bathroom is also on this floor. Stairs lead up with LED lighting built into the wall to give a lovely mood light. On the first floor, there is a master bedroom with a private suite, balcony and walk-in wardrobe that is fully furnished as are the built-in wardrobes in all of the bedrooms. Another large guest bedroom and further bathroom make up the first floor. Stairs continue up inside the property to the rooftop solarium large enough for dining, seating and sunbathing!
Prices start from 389,900 euros
Prices and availability are liable to change without notice so please contact us for floor plans and up-to-date information.
Located close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar which is a lovely coastal town in the Murcia Region, with all the amenities you could wish for all-year-round living and close to the stunning beaches of both the Mediterranean and Mar Menor and protected natural parks. Several golf courses and shopping malls are close by, and the town is serviced easily by (ALC) Alicante airport in 45 minutes or Murcia (RMU) in 35 minutes.

We are pleased to introduce a new development of high quality, modern, detached one-level villas with private pools and huge rooftop solariums.
These exclusive independent one-level villas stand out for their luxury and comfort, each with its own private pool, ample open spaces, and an exclusive solarium. They have 2 and 2 bathrooms with the master being en-suite. The interiors are elegant and functional, boasting high-quality flooring, bathrooms, and kitchens tiled with good quality ceramic tiles and a fully fitted kitchen including all appliances an island and a breakfast bar. The bedrooms include fully fitted wardrobes and each villa has pre-installation for hot and cold air conditioning.
The exteriors are no less impressive, with a fully landscaped garden and a private pool with a purification system and LED spotlights, an outdoor shower next to the pool, perfect to enjoy on warm summer nights. In addition, each villa has its own off-street parking space.
Currently priced for a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom villa from â¬280,000.
Completions are expected at the end of the summer 2025. Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
Torre Pacheco is a vibrant town with all the amenities you would need within walking distance and just a 10-minute drive to the coast and the beautiful beaches of the Mar Menor. Golf courses are plenty in Murcia and you would have several to choose from close by with the additional benefit of only being 20 minutes from Murcia International Airport.

property.property-address: Santiago de la Ribera, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.desc:
This is a brand new project of attached Villas with private pools in a fantastic location just 100m from the beach in Santiago de la Ribera.
This new development will consist of just 11, 3-bedroom, 3-bathroom villas with private pools, terraced areas and a large rooftop solarium in each property.
Each property has a similar layout with one bedroom and bathroom on the ground floor, a contemporary open-plan living area with a built-in kitchen and island, a large living space with patio doors leading out to the front terraced area and your private pool. The first floor consists of a master bedroom with large built-in wardrobes and has an en-suite and access to a private first-floor balcony. A second guest bedroom and a shared bathroom with steps leading up to the rooftop solarium for guaranteed all-day sun!
Completions are expected in September 2025. Prices and availability are liable to change without notice so please contact us for plans and up to date information.
Santiago de la Ribera town centre is a short walk away with a host of great bars, restaurants and supermarkets. On the shores of the Mar Menor, the largest Salt Lake lagoon in Europe, famed for its shallow warm waters, perfect for families and water sport enthusiasts alike. Great transport links via the AP7 motorway take you to the new Murcia International Airport in 30 minutes and Alicante Airport in just 45 minutes.

Levansur V is a luxury development of 60 modern apartments distributed between four blocks with a communal pool, heated pool and communal sports and play areas. Located within the exclusive new Santa RosalÃ­a Lake and Life Resort in the Murcia Region.
We are proud to announce the release of these new apartments in Santa Rosalia Lake and Life Resort. The development has a communal area with a swimming pool and a heated pool surrounded by green areas. The apartments have an open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area with large patio doors leading out to your private terrace. Two bedrooms, the master being en-suite and an additional family bathroom. Different sizes of terraces are available with ground floors enjoying oversized terraces and direct access to the communal areas. First and second floors with generous terraces overlooking the pool and resort. There are also penthouses with private solariums that will have fantastic views overlooking the whole resort and local hills.
Features included in the price: Parking and Storage Room in the basement with a lift. Underfloor heating in both bathrooms. Pre Installed Ducted Air Conditioning. Highly efficient heat pump system for hot water. Kitchen appliances: Oven, Microwave, Hob Extractor, Fridge Freezer, Dishwasher. Interior and Exterior LED lights. Electric blinds in the Bedrooms.
*Please note that introductory offers, prices and availability are liable to change without notice. So please contact us for the current status.
The homes are set around a spectacular central park, exclusively for owners. Two of which have been expertly designed with several sports and leisure areas. There are around 4,000 trees, mainly indigenous Mediterranean species, irrigated by a high-tech water collection system making it a sustainable place to live. Its 700,000-square-metre site is protected by perimeter fencing. Around-the-clock access control and security services. The jewel of La Reserva is the lagoon, an ideal spot to rest on its sandy beaches and relax in the sun. Sparkling waters entice you in for a cooling dip or some water sports. Come and spend evenings here with your children, have a beer with friends and enjoy some Mediterranean cuisine while the sun sets over the endless turquoise waters. The lagoon, with more than 16,000 square meters of sparkling water, is Europeâs largest man-made lagoon. The lagoon uses Crystal Lagoons technology, the world-leading pool filtration system for large lakes and lagoons for bathing. Santa RosalÃ­a Lake and Life Resort have plenty of paths for running, walking and cycling. You will find charming spots for relaxing, yoga, reading a good book or having a family picnic. Challenge your friends to some Adventure Golf, Disc golf and petanque, watch the kids let off some steam in the playground, get some exercise outdoors or have a cocktail at the Beach Club.

This is a brand new development of just 6 exclusive single-storey properties with private pools, rooftop solariums and off-street parking close to the beach in Mar de Cristal. They are all now KEY READY so you can move straight in.
Accommodation comprises 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms with the large master bedroom benefiting from patio doors leading to the pool and terrace and enjoys a walk-in wardrobe and an en-suite bathroom. Two further generously sized guest bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a large family bathroom. The kitchen is open plan with a lovely island and breakfast bar. The dining/living room has dual-aspect patio doors and windows that are floor-to-ceiling height making them very bright and airy. The kitchens are fully equipped with all white goods and high-quality materials have been used throughout. There is pre-installation for hot and cold AC through ducting and the double-glazed windows and patio doors are energy efficient, keeping the property cool in the summer and warm in the winter.
Externally, the garden is fully landscaped with planting, irrigation, tiled and some artificially grassed areas around your private pool, which is included in the price. There are external steps leading up to a large 76m2 private solarium with fantastic views of the surrounding hills and towards the sea. The Villas also have a large storage room and an external WC close to the pool.
Prices start from 549.000 euros and corner plots from 585.900 euros.
Mar de Cristal is a small coastal village on the shores of the Mar Menor, with a lovely promenade, home to several bars and restaurants all within walking distance. There is also a popular sports centre with 8 Padel tennis courts, a large outdoor pool, a gym and a popular bar. La Manga Club resort with 3 golf courses is close by and the popular fishing village of Cabo de Palos with dozens of excellent frontline restaurants and is home to several dive centres as we enjoy the best diving in the Mediterranean at the local marine reserve. Alicante airport is an hour away and the newly opened Murcia International airport is just a 25-minute drive.

We are delighted to bring you a new development of fantastic modern 2 bedroom villas on a luxury complex of villas with private pools, finished gardens and private rooftop solariums in Roldan. These are KEY READY to move straight into.
The properties comprise of 2 bedroom and 2 bathrooms on one level. Both with fully fitted bathrooms and the master bedroom being en-suite. With a contemporary style and an open plan living/dining room and kitchen with an island. The kitchen is equipped with all appliances, indoor and outdoor LED lighting and pre-installed for Hot and Cold A/C.
The development is located in Roldan, within a gated and security-controlled resort of 300.000m2, surrounded by all services, sports facilities and close to several Golf Courses.
The property will meet the highest standards and include a private swimming pool with a seated bench and pre-installed heating system and a solar shower, summer kitchen in the solarium, fully finished and landscaped garden.
Please note prices and availability are liable to change without notice, so please contact us for up-to-date information and floor plans.

The apartments are larger than usual, with build sizes starting at 79m2 and terraces starting from 22 m2. They have an open plan living room/kitchen, with direct access to the terrace through high-quality patio doors. Everything is within walking distance, with several supermarkets just a short walk away, the town centre with a host of bars and restaurants just 600m away and the promenade and beaches 800m away. Los Alcazares is a lovely coastal town on the Mar Menor and is not only a popular holiday destination but also suitable for all year residence.

property.property-address: Santiago de la Ribera, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.desc:
LAST ONE REMAINING, KEY READY AND FULLY FURNISHED !!!!
15 MINUTE WALK FROM THE BEACH...... La Pinada is a brand new luxury development of 24 modern apartments consisting of 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom properties located in the Spanish town of Santiago de la Ribera close to the town centre and a short walk from the beautiful beach and promenade. The Dos Mares shopping centre is a few minutes drive away.
There is a choice of ground floor with private garden and penthouse apartments with a private rooftop solarium. There is also a beautiful communal area with swimming pool and each property has off road parking.
This penthouse apartment comprises of an open plan lounge area with patio doors which lead out onto the sun terrace, there is off road parking, a modern kitchen with oven, hob and extractor, a master bedroom with fitted wardrobes and en suite, two further double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a guest bathroom.

Santiago de la Ribera is well established and has a mixed population of Spanish and Western European with a bustling town centre and close to the beautiful beach. The Spanish town of Lo Pagan and the Dos Mares shopping mall are also just a few minutes drive away.

property.property-address: Cumbre del Sol, Costa Blanca North
property.desc:
These 2 bedrooms, 2 bathroom new build apartments are currently under construction and ready for July 2025, with a modern architecture and located in the sea front residential area of Cumbre del Sol nestled between Moraira and Javea.
The properties comprise of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an open plan kitchen, living room with outside space. Some have sea views towards Moraira and Calpe but the majority have valley views.
There are various models to choose from; ground floor, mid floor and top floor, some with terraces and gardens or both.
All apartments come with under-floor heating and hot and cold ducted air conditioning. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The communal areas are designed for relaxing, with a communal swimming pool surrounded by large terraces to enjoy the sun, a playground for kids, a social club, communal gardens and parking areas. Within a short distance to Cala del Llebeig, Moraira and all the services that Residential Resort Cumbre del Sol has to offer.

These are very special boutique villas that will be built within an Eco-Village, in the hill tops of Lliber. Here you can experience a lifestyle, full of services that promote healthy living. The villas are designed for those who value a pollution-free environment and a community centered lifestyle.
Within the community here you and your family members and friends can enjoy the private hikes, cycling tracks, wine club, spa, picnic area, yoga decks and outdoor gymnasium. The community areas are pet friendly.
The villas feature spacious terraces, private pools and gardens that combine indoor and outdoor living. Residents can enjoy panoramic views of the vineyards and the Sierra del Castillo de la Solana mountain range.
Choose between two villa models, each with three bedrooms, three bathrooms and customised layouts. Enjoy the modern interior design with natural tones, warm colours and wooden elements evoking Mediterranean tradition.
These homes are perfect for those seeking an environmentally friendly lifestyle without sacrificing modern comforts. With facilities for work and leisure within walking distance, the villas are ideal for families and professionals who prioritise sustainability, health and wellbeing.
Contact Home EspaÃ±a for more information and embrace a new sense of well-being in harmony with nature. Just a 20 minute drive from the beautiful coastline. A 2 minute drive from the local villages of Jalon and Lliber.

Home EspaÃ±a are very proud to be able to offer you these fantastic 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, detached villas with sea views and private swimming pools. These 10 villas will be constructed and ready for March 2025. Located just a 5 minute drive from the town of Pedreguer and less than 15 minutes from the beaches and town of Denia.
There are 10 villas to choose from and they all consist of an open-plan kitchen, diner and living room, 3 double bedrooms, one of which is with an en-suite shower room and a second separate shower room. Patio doors lead out to the pool terrace which offers amazing sea and valley views.
Some of the villas are accessed via a staircase and there is an option to have a lift installed at an extra cost.
Pedreguer is a small town with all of the necessities such as bars, restaurants, a school, medical centre, etc. It takes a short 5mminute drive to the shopping centre Portal de La Marina and just 15 minutes by car to the closest beach in Denia or Javea. The airports of Valencia and Alicante are both an hour's drive away.

These last remaining 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments are to be built in front line of the beautiful of Playa del Torres in the area of Villajoyosa with open sea views and direct access to the beach. The complex is situated just a 3 minute drive to Villajoyosa town and a 4 minute drive Benidorm. They will be built into elegant white tower blocks with a maximum of 6 floors with spacious green areas in between.
This is an enclosed private residencial complex with a total of 71 homes. There are various apartments to choose from with different sea views, terrace sizes and levels. They all come with an open plan living/dining and kitchen, a master bedroom with en-suite shower room, a separate double bedroom and a separate shower room. The terraces are large and spacious. There are apartments, duplexes and penthouses to choose from. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The kitchens come fully equipped with ceramic hob, extractor fan, oven and microwave. The properties all come with full installed hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from having a communal pool area and lifts to all levels. There is maximum security here with video surveillance system.
There is a pedestrian walkway around the coves between Villajoyosa and Finestrat with spectacular views. Villajoyosa is a pretty town known for its colourful beach houses and vibrant town with plenty of restaurants to choose from. Benidorm also have a very large host of services and facilites. Alicante airport is only a 30 minute drive away.

The site is currently under construction and you have the option to choose between a 3 bedroom townhouse or a 2 or 3 bedroom apartment.
The townhouses are comprised over two levels and also another level to a roof solarium as well as a terrace and garden, offering the most outside space. On the lower garden level there is a summer kitchen and outdoor toilet.
Included in the price you will get fully installed hot and cold air-conditioning, solar panels and a fitted kitchen with hob, extractor and oven. There is a communal pool, bicycle storage and pre-installation for electric cars. The site has an Enery Rating: A.
Please contact us for the latest availability and floor plans.
There are three 18 hole golf courses and two luxurious hotel complexes in the area, Asia Gardens Hotel Thai Spa and the MeliÃ¡ Villaitana Golf. It is just a 10 minute drive from the fantastic beaches of Benidorm and just 45 minutes from Alicante airport.

A very special and unique complex which is a residential development that aspires to become a sustainable, healthy, and respectful community. Full of areas to exercise, do yoga and enjoy the natural landscape and the sea. The beautiful beaches of El Vergel are just 500m away.
The Eco Village will be yours to enjoy in the year 2026. It is being built by a very reputable developer that has already many projects being built in the whole region of the Costa Blanca and Alicante.
The project has been designed with brilliant sustainable strategies: rainwater will be collected for water irrigation and reuse systems that will give life to a lush sustainable ecosystem; refreshing gardens with native species that require minimal maintenance; large surfaces of solar panels for self-consumption energy, even multiple charging stations for electric cars. There is parking on the ground level of the complex which is secured. There is also an exclusive beach-house only for the residents where they can store their bicycles and belonging to enjoy a day by the sea.
There are 2 and 3 bedroom apartments available. First floor to Penthouse. All of the apartments have ample terraces to enjoy the light and sunshine with privacy. There are also 2 and 3 bedroom townhouses and semi-detached houses.
Please contact us for the latest availability.
Luxury is having everything you need while respecting the surrounding ecosystem.

The kitchens come fully fitted with a hob, oven, extractor fan and microwave. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from a gymnasium, a Jacuzzi, a communal pool, a children's play area and bicycle parking. Parking and Storage is included in the price.

It has a large town centre with Spanish charm, yet with so much to offer as a holiday destination. A fantastic long sandy beach and beautiful marina as well as a historical castle. There are plenty of schools in the area if you are looking to relocate with a young family. Come to Denia and see it for yourself!

Home EspaÃ±a is happy to present this luxury new build villa on a plot of 1134mÂ², with 810mÂ² built-up area, with views of the sea and the mountains, located in one of Javeas most popular residential areas.
Entering the external gates, the villa boasts a spacious double carport with the main access to the house at basement level. The feature four-person elevator serves all three floors of the villa. On the ground floor we are greeted by a spacious open plan living/dining room, an open kitchen with a separate laundry/storage room, a double guest en-suite bedroom, and a separate guest toilet. From this level we reach the pool and terrace.
The full-height double glazed windows provide plenty of natural light and breathtaking views. Both floors, ground and first level, have an incredible outdoor area with large terraces that allow you to enjoy the views of the mountains and the sea.
On the basement level, we find a heated indoor swimming pool which is infiltrated by natural light from the outdoor pool. There is also a separate shower room, a home cinema, another guest bedroom with en-suite, and a storage room.
The villa benefits from a home automation system, a fully equipped Sony system home cinema, an indoor swimming pool with spa jacuzzi and showers, SAT TV, underfloor heating, ducted air-conditioning, and much more.

Javea is well known for its sandy beaches and its El Cap de la Nau natural reserve. It takes just one hour's drive to the airports of Valencia and Alicante.

This 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom villa has a unique design and layout on an elevated plot that allows the property to enjoy both a view of the sea and the inland valley of the North Costa Blanca.

The main town of Oliva is a short 5-minute drive away and there you will find all the necessary amenities including supermarkets, restaurants, schools, a medical center, and much more.

The three-storey building with a lift, offers two-bed and one-bed apartments where some of them benefit from a large ground floor terrace, others from balconies, and the 3rd-floor apartments have a private solarium. All properties are east-facing and have morning sun. The ground floor gardens have south facing gardens that get the sun and the penthouses have roof solariums that have sun all day.
The expected completion is in September 2024.Â All properties have a parking space included and the villas have two spaces.
Feel free to ask us for more information and to arrange an appointment to view them.

There are plenty of schools in the area if you are looking to relocate with a young family. Come to Denia and see it for yourself!
