An opportunity to have a modern luxury villa built on the hilltop of the Montgo mountain in Denia with incredible panoramic views towards the sea and the castle of Denia. It is less than a 10 minute drive to the town and beach of Denia. This villa will be constructed with 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms.
The property on the main level comprises of a large open plan kitchen-diner with cooking island. This leads into the living room where patio doors take you outside to the pool area and the sea views are seen from every angle. There are two large double bedrooms, one en-suite and one with a separate shower room.
Then a staircase takes you down to the lower level of the house where there are two more double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms.
The price includes a private pool, fully integrated white goods, fully installed hot and cold air conditioning, solar panels for hot water and off-road parking for two cars with automatic gate.
There are many fine dining restaurants as well as cobbled streets full of tapas bars and restaurants which ensure you will never run out of choice. A great place to come and live or have a holiday.

A beautiful luxury 5 bedroom villa to be built offering sea views and open views towards Moraira, very well located in a quiet urbanisation within walking distance of the beautiful beaches and the center of Moraira.
The house is distributed on 3 floors with a fully installed lift to all levels with a large bright living room next to the open kitchen with cooking island, a guest toilet, a double bedroom with bathroom en-suite. The living room leads out to an infinity pool, with a large terrace and barbecue area. Upstairs we find 3 spacious double bedrooms all with en-suite bathrooms. Finally in the basement, you access the double garage and laundry room.
Included in the price is a fitted kitchen with Siemens appliances, complete bathrooms, LED lighting, aero-thermal system for hot water and underfloor heating, hot and cold ducted air-conditioning throughout the house, solar panels, fitted wardrobes, electric blinds, pre-installation for alarm and security cameras, private pool, barbecue area, laundry room, double garage, finished garden. Automatic doors for car port. Energy classification A. South orientation.

An amazing opportunity to have a luxury villa built this 2.5km from the sandy beach La Fossa de Calpe with beautiful panoramic views over the Mediterranean sea and towards the Ifach rock.
Distributed over two floors, this modern villa offers all you need in terms of space and comfort.
The garage or main entrance gives access to the living area consisting of a bright living room that connects with a fully equipped kitchen with an island. In addition, we find a laundry room, toilet and the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and fitted wardrobes. Both the living room and the bedroom have direct access to the partially covered solarium with swimming pool. On the first floor there are 3 more bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and fitted wardrobes. All bedrooms have sea views.
Equipped with all amenities, this property comes with hot and cold ducted air-conditioning, under-floor heating, garage for 1 car and off-road parking for several vehicles.
Calpe is a fantastic beach town with all year round services and just an hour's drive from both Valencia and Alicante airports.

This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment is part of a fantastic luxurious complex, walking distance to the town and the popular marina with a fantastic variety of restaurants and amenities to chose from. You are also a short walk to La Marineta beach. The apartment will be finished in March 2025.
The kitchens come fully fitted with a hob, oven, extractor fan and microwave. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. Also there is under floor heating. The complex benefits from a gymnasium, a Jacuzzi, a communal pool, a children's play area and bicycle parking. Parking and storage is included in the price.

It has a large town centre with Spanish charm, yet with so much to offer as a holiday destination. A fantastic long sandy beach and beautiful marina as well as a historical castle. There are plenty of schools in the area if you are looking to relocate with a young family. Come to Denia and see it for yourself!

This brand new modern 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom villa is only 8 months away from being finished. The location is just a 10 minute walk to the town of Denia and a 15 minute walk to the Marina.
The villa is under construction and due to be completed within 8 months from signing the contract.
This villa has been designed to a high spec, with lots of natural light and spacious open areas. The property will be distributed over two levels and comprises of 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. Two bedrooms will be downstairs and two bedrooms upstairs.
The price includes private swimming pool, off-road parking for three cars with an automatic gate and Mediterranean garden.
Denia is one of the more livelier areas of the North Costa Blanca which is busy all year round. You have a town centre with a great selection of fashion boutiques, shops, cafes and restaurants which becomes pedestrianised in the early evenings.
The port of Denia is fantastic if you fancy a trip to the Balearic islands such as Ibiza or Mallorca. There is also a nice selection of bars and restaurants on the port side. There are many fine dining restaurants as well as cobbled streets full of tapas restaurants. A great place to come and live or have a holiday.

This brand new modern villa is ready to be constructed with a licence in place. The property comes with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and very nice sea views. Just a 7 minute drive into the centre of Denia and 5 minutes to the Marina and Les Rotas. The Marineta beach is within a 30 minute walking distance.
This modern villa will be distributed all on the one level making it a suitable home for anyone who doesn't want the use of stairs. The plot is flat and has the advantage of sea views from the pool area and living area.
The price includes a private pool, fully installed hot and cold air-conditioning through a ducted system, fitted bathrooms and fitted kitchen.
Denia is one of the more vibrant beach towns of the North Costa Blanca with all of the services you need in terms of shops and trades. It also have the ferry taking you to the Balearic Islands and is in between two large airports.

This 3 bedroom 4 bathroom plot and build project has been designed to completely look out towards the Mediterranean with incredible sea views and offers a unique panoramic view over the North Costa Blanca coastline. This is a plot with a project with a build time of 18-24 months.
It is located at the Cumbre del Sol urbanization in Benitachell, between Javea and Moraira, one of the most sought after destinations on the North Costa Blanca, ideal for year-round living as well as enjoying holiday periods.
The plot totals 823mÂ², with 542Â² of living space over three floors, with a total of three bedrooms with their own en-suite bathrooms and room terraces, large kitchen with island, living room, guest toilet, open-plan basement area, machine room, garage for two cars and spacious pool terrace.
The interior of the house is of a singular design with modern finishes, that pay special attention to detail. The entrance, which leads through a spacious hall, is situated on the upper floor, where there are two bedrooms, both with en-suite bathrooms, spacious wardrobes and private terraces, plus a garage for two cars and a modern design staircase which leads down to the main floor.
The ground floor houses the main attraction of this property: its fabulous outdoor area, a spacious terrace with an infinity pool, for sunbathing and dining outdoors, whilst enjoying the spectacular sea views.
The large glass doors in the living room open out on to the terrace, creating a warm, light-filled space, that flows into the dining room and the large open-plan kitchen, equipped with state-of-the-art appliances. The main floor is also where the master bedroom is situated, with its walk-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom, plus a guest toilet.
On the lowest floor, there is an open-plan space, which can be finished off as a guest apartment, gym, office, games room, or any other use that the owner wishes to give to this useful space.

These newly constructed apartments are ready the middle of 2025 and are in a fantastic location walking distance to the Old Town of Javea and the Port.
There are 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms remaining. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The kitchens come fully fitted with a hob, oven, extractor fan and microwave. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from a gymnasium, a Jacuzzi, a sauna, an indoor heated pool, an outdoor communal pool, a children's play area and bicycle parking.
Javea is one of the most popular beach resorts on the Costa Blanca. With its beautiful promenades, port area and old town, it has a lot to offer. The area is busy all year round and has a large host of restaurants, cafes and bars. The beach offers water sports and boat excursions in the high season. Javea has its own golf course and is just under an hour away from Alicante airport.

These fantastic two-bedroom, two-bathroom new build apartments are the best value for money on the coast of GandÃ­a, just a 40-minute drive from the city of Valencia. The best feature of these apartments is the ample terraces, which allow the maximum amount of light to enter the entire property. All of the 2 bedroom Key Ready apartments are sold now and a new release are available ready for December 2025.
All properties come with a garage and storage space included in the price. Most of the apartments have panoramic sea views. The resort is wheelchair friendly with lifts and pathways to all properties. The kitchen equipment includes the following white goods: Extractor, Oven, Induction Hob and Fridge
By taking advantage of these great prices, you will have the opportunity to watch the development grow into a popular resort, with all the facilities needed to keep you relaxed and entertained. There is access to a social club and a communal swimming pool area, a fitness centre and other sports facilities as well as a green area with outdoor gym equipment.
Close to the complex, there is a protected natural park with natural marshland, orange groves, orchards, as well as mountains, adding to the pleasant views. The nearest village nearby is Xeresa, which is just a 5-minute drive from the resort. Also, close by are the blue-flag beaches of Gandia. Nearby you can enjoy equestrian sports facilities and golf courses. Valencia and Alicante airports are easily accessible by car, train, or bus.

These frontline beach apartments are due to be constructed by July 2025 and yours to own being a stone's throw away from the sand and sea. Walking distance to amenities and restaurants and just 9km from the lively beach town of Denia.
The properties are comprised of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, but there are also 2 bedrooms available, ground floor apartments with large terraces and penthouses. Please contact us for the latest availability as they are selling quickly. The properties come with a fully fitted kitchen with hob, extractor and oven included. Pre-installation of hot and cold air-conditioning. Electric blinds in the bedrooms and living room.
In the communal area you have a large adult pool and a children's pool. There is also outside parking for bicycles. You can purchase a underground car parking space for â¬12,000 plus IVA. There is pre-installation of electric car chargers.

LAST REMAINING villa with three bedroom and two bathrooms in the traditional village of Alcalali in the heart of Jalon Valley.
The property is under construction and will take 10 months to complete.
This Ibiza-style detached villa offers an open-plan kitchen, a large living/dining room with patio doors leading into the private swimming pool terrace, and an easy-to-maintain garden. On the same level, we have a complete bathroom and an extra room for storage.
We access the first floor via an internal staircase, on this level there are three double bedrooms and a family bathroom. The master bedroom is ensuite, has a walk-in wardrobe and an amazing private terrace.
The property also benefits from a garage with enough space for two cars, hot and cold air-conditioning, solar panels, and double-glazed windows.

LAST REMAINING SOUTH FACING apartment looking into the development, walking distance to the town and the popular marina with a fantastic variety of restaurants and amenities to chose from. This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment has a 26mÂ² terrace and is looking south into the communal garden area. The last one left!
The kitchens come fully fitted with a hob, oven, extractor fan and microwave. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. There is also underfloor heating. The complex benefits from a gymnasium, a Jacuzzi, a communal pool, a children's play area and bicycle parking. Parking and storage is included in the price.

The complex is located in a prime location in Denia, walking distance to the town and the popular marina with a fantastic variety of restaurants and amenities to chose from. There are 155 apartments in total distributed over 4 blocks. Please contact us for the latest availability.

These 4 villas are due to be constructed and part of a gated residential area, within walkable distance to the town centre of Denia. The price includes a private pool but you also have use of a large communal pool just a short walk from the villas. The villas are to be sold off-plan and will be ready for September 2025.
The villas comprise of an open-plan living, dining and kitchen area with patio doors that open up into the outside garden area. Upstairs are 3 double bedrooms, 1 of which is en-suite. Off-road parking for one car and a small plunge pool included in the price.

Within walking distance to the very popular beach town of Denia. It is Key Ready so you can move in straight away.
The main living accommodation is distributed over two levels with an external staircase taking you to the roof solarium. The ground floor comprises of an open-plan living/dining room with patio doors leading out to the garden area, an American style kitchen, a double bedroom and a separate shower room. On the first level are two double bedrooms each with en-suite bathrooms and then an internal staircase takes you to the private roof solarium where you have fantastic mountain views and sunshine all day.
The properties come with fully installed hot and cold air conditioning. There is also the option to convert this townhouse into a two bedroom house and have a larger living/dining area downstairs. There is off-road parking within the complex. Please contact us for the latest availability.

property.property-address: Cumbre del Sol, Costa Blanca North
property.desc:
These 2 bedrooms, 2 bathroom new build apartments are currently under construction, with a modern architecture and located in the sea front residential area of Cumbre del Sol nestled between Moraira and Javea.
The properties comprise of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an open plan kitchen, living room with outside space. Some have sea views towards Moraira and Calpe but the majority have valley views.
There are various models to choose from; ground floor, mid floor and top floor, some with terraces and gardens or both.
All apartments come with under-floor heating and hot and cold ducted air conditioning. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The communal areas are designed for relaxing, with a communal swimming pool surrounded by large terraces to enjoy the sun, a playground for kids, a social club, communal gardens and parking areas. Within a short distance to Cala del Llebeig, Moraira and all the services that Residential Resort Cumbre del Sol has to offer.

These 2 bed 2 bath KEY READY apartments in Calpe located just a few meters from the beach, overlooking the salt lakes and the famous Ifach rock, walking distance to the town surrounded by all desirable facilities such as restaurants, supermarkets, shops, bars and banks.
Both buildings will have 15 floors and there will be 85 apartments with two or three bedrooms, two bathrooms, living-dining room with a fully fitted open kitchen, large windows and partially covered terraces with sea views from half of the height of the building. You can customize the apartment to your taste by choosing between several choices of materials provided by the Developer.
Included in the price is video intercom, TV connection, telephone and internet connection, built-in wardrobes and fully installed hot and cold air-conditioning.
The communal area has gardens, a large swimming pool, a paddle tennis court and an indoor recreation area. To admire the sunset, each building has its own common space with sea views, a gym, terrace and gourmet area on the 9th floor. There are underground parking spaces and storage rooms for each apartment which come at an extra â¬20,000.
The apartments are due to be completed in the first quarter of 2023. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The vibrant town of Calpe offers many amenities including many fine restaurants and bars to choose from. In the early evening, the town becomes pedestrianised and the restaurants spill out onto the streets giving the whole town a party atmosphere. Many festivals take place throughout the year where you can experience the Spanish culture and traditions. The working port has a regular ferry service to Benidorm should you wish to explore the city. Water sports are available in the summer months including jet skiing and surfing and of course for those golf enthusiasts, the three golf courses in Finestrat are just a short drive away.

LAST REMAINING Â apartments left. This 6th floor 3 bedroom apartment is ready to move into with partial sea views. The complex is being built right in the town centre and walking distance to the sandy beaches and town of Calpe.
They are under construction and ready for December 2025.
This apartment has an open plan fitted kitchen with an oven, hob and extractor included in the price. There are three double bedrooms, one with an en-suite bathroom and a separate shower room. The properties benefit from fully installed hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from a communal swimming pool, a children's play area and underground parking. There is also a gymnasium and indoor heated pool. It is just 100m from the beach of Calpe. Please contact us for the latest availability.
Calpe is one of the livelier areas of the north Costa Blanca and is busy all year round. The town centre with a great selection of fashion boutiques, shops, cafes and restaurants becomes pedestrianized in the early evenings and the restaurant tables spill out into the street giving it a real buzz. It is only a 45 minute drive to Alicante airport.

This brand new modern 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom townhouses is under construction and ready for December 2024.
The complex has a large communal pool and private gardens for each house. There are many options to choose from with different orientations and views but all of them have a private roof solarium with amazing views to the Montgo mountain. You are in a slightly elevated position with a gentle slope down to the town centre of Denia. You can walk to the centre in 20 minutes or just 5 minutes by car. There is off-road parking within the complex.
The main living accommodation is distributed over 2 levels with another internal staircase taking you to the roof solarium. The ground floor comprises of an open-plan living/dining room with patio doors leading out to the garden area, an American style kitchen, a double bedroom and a separate shower room. On the first level are two double bedrooms both with en-suite bathrooms and then an internal staircase takes you to the private roof solarium where the sun is shining all day long.
The properties are fully installed with hot and cold air-conditioning and an option to have gas central heating. There is also the option to convert this townhouse into a 2 bedroom house and have larger living/dining area downstairs. Please contact us for the latest availability.
Denia is one of the more livelier areas of the North Costa Blanca which is busy all year round. You have a town centre with a great selection of fashion boutiques, shops, cafes and restaurants which becomes pedestrianised in the early evenings.
The port of Denia is fantastic if you fancy a trip to the Balearic islands such as Ibiza or Mallorca. There is also a nice selection of bars and restaurants on the port side. There are many fine dining restaurants as well as cobbled streets full of tapas restaurants. A great place to come and live or have a holiday.

This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a property that is already underway and due for completion for December 2022. The plot is located in Monte Solana with stunning south facing mountain views. This particular model is being built on a 900mÂ² plot in Pedreguer and the price includes the plot, the build, a private pool of 8x4m. There is pre-installation of air conditioning, a fitted kitchen and off-road parking also included in the price. There is an underbuild which can be used as extra living accomodation.
Monte Solana is a residential area just a 5 minute drive from the town of Pedreguer and only a 15 minute drive to the beach town of Denia.

This is a fantastic opportunity to have a house built on a selection of plots that are available to view in Denia, Pedreguer, Monte Pego and La Sella.
For this particular model on a 800mÂ² plot in Pedreguer, the price includes the plot, the build, a private pool of 8x4m, garage and fencing.
There are a selection of models to choose from. Starting with the smallest model which is a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom villa all on one level starting at â¬475,000 with a private pool included in the price. There are different types of models available but the builder can also adapt the property and build a bespoke property to suit your needs.
There is pre-installation of air conditioning, a fitted kitchen and off-road parking also included in the price.
Please contact us for the latest availability. There are a limited amount of plots available.
There is also finance available (subject to credit checks). Contact us for a pre-approval mortgage in Spain.

This is a fantastic opportunity to have a house built on a selection of plots that are available to view in Denia, Pedreguer, Monte Pego and La Sella.
For this particular model on a 900mÂ² plot in Pedreguer, the price includes the plot, the build, a private pool of 8x4m and fencing.
There are a selection of models to choose from. Starting with the smallest model which is a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom villa all on one level starting at â¬469,000 with a private pool included in the price. There are different types of models available but the builder can also adapt the property and build a bespoke property to suit your needs.
There is pre-installation of air conditioning, a fitted kitchen and off-road parking also included in the price.
Please contact us for the latest availability. There are a limited amount of plots available.
There is also finance available (subject to credit checks). Contact us for a pre-approval mortgage in Spain.

This 496mÂ² villa is an example of what can be built for you in one of three locations in Moraira. The properties will be built on a minimum plot of 826mÂ² and have all modern conveniences; a private 35 mÂ² pool, a high specification kitchen, modern design bathrooms and customisation options are available prior to construction for a bespoke villa that fits any specification.
This particular design comes with 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms and 1 guest toilet. It is comprised of a large living room/dining room with open plan kitchen, down the corridor you have a separate toilet that leads you down the hall to 3 double bedrooms and 3 en-suite bathrooms which can be easily made into 4 bedrooms.
This model is one of the many designs that this reputable developer has to offer. The idea is to offer a completely bespoke product so that the property can be designed to suit all necessities and requirements.
Moraira is small coastal town situated in the beautiful mountainous north-eastern tip of the Costa Blanca. The resort is conveniently placed between the airports of Alicante and Valencia. The surrounding region has a quiet and relaxing atmosphere, with beautiful and unspoilt scenery and many small villages to explore.
The town itself has pleasantly grown from a small fishing village to an attractive holiday and retirement resort, retaining its considerable charm that attracts visitors from all over Europe.
Moraira has an impressive marina, an excellent variety of local shops, markets, harbourside fish restaurants and bars and best of all has still managed to preserve its Spanish character.

These new build villas in the popular La Finca Golf resort are under construction. This particular villa is ready for May 2024.
The property has the living area on the ground level, two bedrooms and two bathrooms on the upper level. There is a small basement that can be used as a gym or cinema room. There is also access to a large private roof solarium where you get views and sunshine all day long.
Included in the price is pre-installation of air-conditioning and a 6x3m private swimming pool. There is also off-road parking for one car. Please contact us for the latest availability, floor plans and full building specifications.
Las Finca golf resort is a well-established area with beautiful surroundings and great views of the countryside. It also has a great mixture of all year-round residents and visiting tourists with the Spanish towns of Algorfa and Los Montesinos a short drive away.

A NEW RELEASE of apartments located on La Finca Golf and are ready to move into for from the spring of 2025.
There are ground floor apartments with private gardens. They come with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and an open plan kitchen/diner that has patio doors leading onto a private terrace.
The properties come with electric shutters, pre-installation of hot and cold air-conditioning, exterior lighting, landscaped garden with irrigation system, off-road parking and the use of a communal pool.
Please note that the prices and availability are subject to change, so please contact us for more information and a floor plan.
Located just 4 minutes from Algorfa, in Costa Blanca South, makes the perfect place for those who want to enjoy the Mediterranean lifestyle; proximity to the beach, golf and mountains, surrounded by tranquility.
Just a few minutes away from the most beautiful beaches of the southern Costa Blanca, the Laguna Rosa de Torrevieja or the Dunes of Guardamar del Segura. Its proximity and easy access to the AP-7 highway and main national roads connect you with numerous towns such as Orihuela, Cartagena, Elche, Murcia and Alicante. The airports of Alicante and Murcia are less than a 30 minutes drive away.

This new development of 12 south facing apartments has just been released. They are under construction and will be ready for March 2025. Just a 15 minute walk from all of the amenties of Villamartin and a 10 minute drive from the beach.
All the apartments have two bedrooms and two bathrooms. The ground floor apartments have a private garden.
Upon entrance, the properties have a spacious living room, with patio doors giving access to the balcony, an open-plan kitchen, a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a second double bedroom, and a second bathroom.
The development is fully fenced, with landscaped communal gardens and a beautiful communal pool. The apartments have a parking place and a storage room in the underground garage included. There is also off-road outdoor parking within the fenced part of the development.
The properties are equipped with a Home Automation System, with remote control of shutters, lights and alarm.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
Location: The Villamartin area is very popular with tourists and most of the population consists of European expatriates who have settled there in the last 10 years, virtually transforming the village into a modern-looking town. There are also other golf courses nearby and numerous beaches.

Ready for January 2025, this LAST REMAINING 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom penthouse apartment could be yours to own and just 200m from the sea, with a roof top communal swimming pool and a 70mÂ² sun terrace.
The property comprises of three bedrooms and two shower rooms, of which one is an en-suite. There is an open-plan living room and kitchen diner which has lots of light and space. Ready for the first quarter of 2025.

property.property-address: San Miguel de Salinas, Costa Blanca South

A staircase leads up to a large double bedroom with an en-suite and a private rooftop solarium.
There is also a 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom option available.

The towns of Torrevieja and Orihuela are a short drive away. The properties are walking distance to the Vistabella Golf Club, which is an 18 hole course and is 6000 m long. There is a supermarket and local amenities within a 10 minute walking distance.

The apartments are comprised of an open plan lounge/dining room and kitchen with patio doors leading onto the sun terrace with open panoramic sea views. There is a master bedroom with en suite, second bedroom and a guest bathroom. There is also a 3 bedroom option available.
These marvellous apartments come with secure underground parking with a storage room included in the price.
This exclusive development has 3 communal swimming pools, 1 of which is heated for all year round use, secure underground parking with storage room and lifts to all floors, an outside sports area and stunning landscaped gardens.
Prices are subject to change depending on availability. Please contact us for the latest up -to-date prices.

This brand-new development of luxury villas is situated in the popular Villamartin area of Orihuela Costa. A 15 minute walk to a host of restaurants and amenities and just a 10 minute drive to the beach. They will be built and ready for October 2024.
The detached villas have a bright and spacious living room with open plan kitchen. There is 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom on the ground floor, and 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom on the first floor.
The gardens are landscaped to your own individual design, with tiled sunbathing areas, and with exterior lighting. Some of the villas will also have a private parking space within their own garden, and others will have a designated parking space in the communal car park.
A beautiful communal pool is going to be available within the development, which is going to be surrounded by sun terraces and garden areas. There is an option for a private pool and this is an extra costs.
Each property will be protected by a fully installed alarm system and by an elegantly finished armoured front door. There is also an advanced home automation system with which you will have control over the motorized shutters and 3 light points. Pre-installation for air conditioning is also included.
Prices and availability are subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.

The area has an abundance of local amenities and is very popular with ex-pats, choosing it for its high-quality lifestyle. Within the wider Orihuela Costa area there are two more golf courses and various commercial areas with plenty of shops, bars, and restaurants. The beautiful white sandy beaches that the area is so famous for are only a short drive away, and so is the fantastic shopping centre Zenia Boulevard.

The city centre and the beautiful beaches are also only a few kilometres away.
The villas are built to rder within 12 months.

We think - "These high quality modern villas are situated in an excellent location being close to the shopping mall, city centre and the beaches."

Private swimming pool. The kitchen is completely furnished and equipped with a ceramic hob, extractor fan, oven, microwave, fridge and integrated dishwasher. These 10 villas will be constructed and ready for March 2025. Located just a 5 minute drive from the town of Pedreguer and less than 15 minutes from the beaches and town of Denia.
There are 10 villas to choose from and they all consist of an open-plan kitchen, diner and living room, 3 double bedrooms, one of which is with an en-suite shower room and a second separate shower room. Patio doors lead out to the pool terrace which offers amazing sea and valley views.
Some of the villas are accessed via a staircase and there is an option to have a lift installed at an extra cost.
Pedreguer is a small town with all of the necessities such as bars, restaurants, a school, medical centre, etc. It takes a short 5mminute drive to the shopping centre Portal de La Marina and just 15 minutes by car to the closest beach in Denia or Javea. The airports of Valencia and Alicante are both an hour's drive away.

These last remaining 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments are to be built in front line of the beautiful of Playa del Torres in the area of Villajoyosa with open sea views and direct access to the beach. The complex is situated just a 3 minute drive to Villajoyosa town and a 4 minute drive Benidorm. They will be built into elegant white tower blocks with a maximum of 6 floors with spacious green areas in between.
This is an enclosed private residencial complex with a total of 71 homes. There are various apartments to choose from with different sea views, terrace sizes and levels. They all come with an open plan living/dining and kitchen, a master bedroom with en-suite shower room, a separate double bedroom and a separate shower room. The terraces are large and spacious. There are apartments, duplexes and penthouses to choose from. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The kitchens come fully equipped with ceramic hob, extractor fan, oven and microwave. The properties all come with full installed hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from having a communal pool area and lifts to all levels. There is maximum security here with video surveillance system.
There is a pedestrian walkway around the coves between Villajoyosa and Finestrat with spectacular views. Villajoyosa is a pretty town known for its colourful beach houses and vibrant town with plenty of restaurants to choose from. Benidorm also have a very large host of services and facilites. Alicante airport is only a 30 minute drive away.

A very special and unique complex which is a residential development that aspires to become a sustainable, healthy, and respectful community. Full of areas to exercise, do yoga and enjoy the natural landscape and the sea. The beautiful beaches of El Vergel are just 500m away.
The development will be ready in 2026. It is being built by a very reputable developer that has already many projects being built in the whole region of the Costa Blanca and Alicante.
The project has been designed with brilliant sustainable strategies: rainwater will be collected for water irrigation and reuse systems that will give life to a lush sustainable ecosystem; refreshing gardens with native species that require minimal maintenance; large surfaces of solar panels for self-consumption energy, even multiple charging stations for electric cars. There is parking on the ground level of the complex which is secured. There is also an exclusive beach-house only for the residents where they can store their bicycles and belonging to enjoy a day by the sea.
There are 2 and 3 bedroom apartments available. First floor to Penthouse. All of the apartments have ample terraces to enjoy the light and sunshine with privacy.
There will also be 2 and 3 bedroom Townhouses and Semi-Detached Houses. Please contact us for the latest availability.
Luxury is having everything you need while respecting the surrounding ecosystem.

These 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom luxury villas are to be constructed by the summer of 2025. The properties are built over two levels and located in a the tranquil and popular area of Portixol in Javea.
There are 3 plots to choose from, subject to availability. All the villas come with solar panels, fully fitted hot and cold air conditioning, a fireplace, outdoor kitchen, off-road parking for 2 cars and pre-installation of heating for the swimming pool. The kitchens come fully equipped with top brand appliances.
If there is anything that makes Javea stand out, it is its wonderful beaches and coves, with crystal-clear waters. Beautiful coves such as Granadella, Ambilo or Portitxol makes Javea one of the most paradisaical corners of the Mediterranean.

These brand new modern 5 bedroom, 3 bathroom villas are to be sold off plan and built bespoke to suit all requirements. There are three plots to choose from and they are located in a peaceful residential area, but only a 5 minute drive from the coast and town centre of Denia.
One of the properties is already under way and will take 10 months to complete.
The properties come with fully installed of hot and cold air conditioning, a fireplace and an option to have gas central heating. The price includes a private swimming pool, an option for storage and off-road parking. 4 and 5 bedroom options available. Please contact us for the latest availability.
Denia is one of the more livelier areas of the North Costa Blanca which is busy all year round. You have a town centre with a great selection of fashion boutiques, shops, cafes and restaurants which becomes pedestrianised in the early evenings.
The port of Denia is fantastic if you fancy a trip to the Balearic islands such as Ibiza or Mallorca. There is also a nice selection of bars and restaurants on the port side. There are many fine dining restaurants as well as cobbled streets full of tapas restaurants. A great place to come and live or have a holiday.

We are proud to offer this very high-spec villa which is already under construction and due for completion at the end of 2024. The villa comes with four bedrooms and three bathrooms and has spectacular sea views and winter sun. The area of La Pedrera is well known because of its natural and peaceful surroundings yet with a close proximity to the centre of Denia.
The first floor consists of three bedrooms, one which has an en-suite bathroom and dressing room, two bathrooms, a lift, a large terrace with unobstructed sea views.
On the lower floor there is a living-dining room connected to an open-plan kitchen, a complete bathroom, a double bedroom and a laundry room. In addition, this floor has an interior courtyard garden that provides the house with plenty of natural light. Outside, on the same level, there is a barbecue, an 8x4 swimming pool with saline chlorine system, and a garden with Mediterranean plants.
The materials chosen for this house are of high quality. The house will have porcelain floor tiles, solar panels for hot water, suspended sanitary ware, designer kitchen with island, fully installed and integrated kitchen appliances, total plot enclosure with motorised door, landscaped plot, automatic irrigation system, underfloor heating, ducted air-conditioning installation and LED interior lighting. In addition, the property will have a lift connecting the two floors.
Please contact us to arrange to see the site and to meet with the construction team.
Denia is still an undiscovered treasure with more and more international tourists coming over each year. It has a large town centre with Spanish charm, yet with so much to offer as a holiday destination. A fantastic long sandy beach and beautiful marina as well as a historical castle. There are plenty of schools in the area if you are looking to relocate with a young family. Come to Denia and see it for yourself!

A high-spec design 3 bed, 2 bath villa to be built in Pedreguer. The plot is located in Monte Solana with stunning south facing mountain views.
This particular model is being built on a 800mÂ² plot in Pedreguer and the price includes the plot, the build, a private pool of 8x4m. There is pre-installation of air conditioning, a fitted kitchen and off-road parking also included in the price.
Monte Solana is a residential area just a 5 minute drive from the town of Pedreguer and only a 15 minute drive to the beach town of Denia.

This is a luxury property under construction with 5 bedrooms and 6 bathrooms with stunning sea views.
Situated within a gated community with private access consisting of 30 modern design detached villas just a short drive from the stunning and picturesque town of Altea.
The houses stand out for their natural light and large interior spaces, with layouts offering 5 bedrooms and 6 bathrooms, an open kitchen, two living rooms and dining rooms a terrace, swimming pool, barbecue, a private garage and a lift.
These independent houses are built with high-tech quality materials and exquisite finishes, located in one of the best locations in northern Costa Blanca, next to the Don Cayo Golf Club, La Olla Beach and the Campomanes Marina.
It is just 8km from Altea town centre and next to Altea la Vella. These villages are traditionally known for their quality of life, services and cultural and artistic activities, where you can practice a variety of sports and attend cultural events which bring to life the rich heritage of the area, also offering variety of restaurants with excellent cuisine. They also have direct access from the Mediterranean motorway AP7.
Please contact us for the latest availability.

This is a fantastic opportunity to have a house built on a flat plot of 800mÂ² in a residential area in Beniarbeig with open views towards the mountains. The location is just a 10-minute walk to the village with lots of amenities and restaurants. It is also only a 15-minute car journey from the vibrant and lively beach town of Denia.
For this particular model on a 800mÂ² plot, the price includes the plot, the build and a private 6x3 metre pool. The property has three bedrooms and two bathrooms, one being en-suite with a separate dressing area, a separate W.C, an open-plan kitchen, electric shutters, fully installed hot and cold air-conditioning and a private garage.
This is the model designed for this plot by the Arquitect but the client can also adapt the property internally to suit their needs.
Beniarbeig has successfully managed to retain its traditional Spanish identity, making owning a property there ideal for those who want a taste of traditional Spanish life, yet are not too far from the more international towns of Moraira, Javea or Denia.
There is a healthy expat community and itÂ´s easy to see how they have fallen in love with the local area and the locality of being so close to the gorgeous Costa Blanca beaches and coastline, which is just a 10 minute drive away.

We are happy to offer you a selection of plots in the Monte Solana area of Pedreguer. Just a short 3 minute drive to the village of Pedreguer and all of its amenities. It is also less than a 15 minute drive to the bustly beach town of Denia. Many of the plots are south facing with mountain views.
Prices start from 550,000 EUR to build a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom villa on one level with a privaye 8x4m swimming pool and the build time is 12 to 15 months. The properties come with off-road parking, pre-installation of ducted hot and cold air-conditioning, a private pool, fitted kitchen and bathrooms.
Please contact us to view the location of the plots and to get a quote to build a brand new home in this peaceful residencial location.

An amazing opportunity to have a luxury villa built with beautiful panoramic views over the Mediterranean sea and towards the Ifach rock.
This property is distributed over 3 floors with an elevator installed inside the house to all levels. On the upper floor there are two bedrooms, both with an en-suite bathroom, a dressing room and living room. Both bedrooms have a private terraces. On the main floor there are two more bedrooms, also with en-suite bathrooms, a large living room, an open kitchen with cooking island, a second living room, guest toilet, storage room and laundry room with access to a patio.
The ground floor is with two guest bedrooms, a bathroom, a lounge and a kitchen, as well as a gym, indoor pool, shower room and relaxation area.
Around the house we find several terraces and the beautiful outdoor pool. Attached to the house is a large garage with space for 3 vehicles.
The house offers all the comforts such as underfloor heating pre-installation of alarm and cameras, air-ventalation throughout and pre-installation for smart system.
Calpe is a fantastic beach town with all year round services and just an hour's drive from both Valencia and Alicante airports.

A great opportunity to own an amazing 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom, contemporary villa which is due to be finished by the end of summer 2023. It has stunning panoramic sea views towards Calpe.
It is located close to the La Fustera area of the Benissa Coastal, just a short drive to the small cove beach of Gran Sol area where you will find amenities and a supermarket. Only a 10 minute drive to the large beach town of Calpe.
The house will be distributed over 3 floors with wonderful panoramic views of the sea. On the ground floor there is the living dining room, the kitchen with utility room, 2 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, a guest toilet and the terrace. On the first floor there is a bedroom, a bathroom and a terrace. In the semi-basement there is a living room, kitchen and bathroom, it is connected to a covered terrace and the private pool.
The villa benefits from a kitchen that is fully equipped with Siemens appliances, LED lighting, underfloor heating, hot and cold air/conditioning throughout, solar panels for hot water and electric shutters.
Outside you can enjoy the Mediterranean life with the infinity pool, large terraces with a barbecue area and the garden with an automatic irrigation system. Due to its south orientation you can enjoy beautiful views, open to the sea and the coast. A truly luxury property that offers everything you need to enjoy living near the sea.

The town of Benissa is a 6 minute drive away.

There will be a bedroom and bathroom on the ground level and 2 double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms upstairs.
The price includes private swimming pool, off-road parking for one car with an automatic gate and Mediterranean garden.
Denia is one of the more vibrant beach towns of the North Costa Blanca with all of the services you need in terms of shops and trades. It also have the ferry taking you to the Balearic Islands and is in between two large airports.

These luxurious front line apartments are under 1km away from Denia centre, making this a highly desirable location.
LAST REMAINING APARTMENT. Ready for September 2024.
The price includes fully installed hot and cold air-conditioning, fully integrated white goods, secure underground parking, storage and communal swimming pool.
This is the closest plot remaining 800m to Denia which is front line to Las Marina beach. Do not miss out on this fantastic opportunity and please contact us for more information and availability.

This 3 bedroom 4 bathroom plot and build project has been designed to completely look out towards the Mediterranean. This is a plot with a project with a build time of 18-24 months.
The upper floor houses the entire house, which provides extra comfort. The night area consists of three en-suite bedrooms bathed in natural light that preserve a great deal of privacy with respect to the day areas. The living room, dining room and kitchen are linked to the exterior, thanks to the use of glass walls that favour a permanent visual connection with the sea. The terrace of more than 70mÂ² is dominated by an infinity pool. The house is complemented by a multi-purpose basement with two porches and a garage.
The geometric shapes that outline the exterior structure are clad in glass and sheets of natural stone in grey, which contrasts with the white of the faÃ§ade. The cube that houses the terrace of the master bedroom stands out, jutting out and directly overlooking the sea.

These newly constructed apartments are ready the middle of 2025 and are in a fantastic location walking distance to the Old Town of Javea and the Port.
There are 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms remaining. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The kitchens come fully fitted with a hob, oven, extractor fan and microwave. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from a gymnasium, a Jacuzzi, a sauna, an indoor heated pool, an outdoor communal pool, a children's play area and bicycle parking.
Javea is one of the most popular beach resorts on the Costa Blanca. With its beautiful promenades, port area and old town, it has a lot to offer. The area is busy all year round and has a large host of restaurants, cafes and bars. The beach offers water sports and boat excursions in the high season. Javea has its own golf course and is just under an hour away from Alicante airport.

These fantastic two-bedroom, two-bathroom new build apartments are the best value for money on the coast of GandÃ­a, just a 40-minute drive from the city of Valencia. The best feature of these apartments is the ample terraces, which allow the maximum amount of light to enter the entire property. These will be ready for December 2025.
All properties come with a garage and storage space included in the price. Most of the apartments have panoramic sea views. The resort is wheelchair friendly with lifts and pathways to all properties. The kitchen equipment includes the following white goods: Extractor, Oven, Induction Hob and Fridge
By taking advantage of these great prices, you will have the opportunity to watch the development grow into a popular resort, with all the facilities needed to keep you relaxed and entertained. There is access to a social club and a communal swimming pool area, a fitness centre and other sports facilities as well as a green area with outdoor gym equipment.
Close to the complex, there is a protected natural park with natural marshland, orange groves, orchards, as well as mountains, adding to the pleasant views. The nearest village nearby is Xeresa, which is just a 5-minute drive from the resort. Also, close by are the blue-flag beaches of Gandia. Nearby you can enjoy equestrian sports facilities and golf courses. Valencia and Alicante airports are easily accessible by car, train, or bus.

All the necessary amenities can be reached within walking distance and the beach and port are just a short stroll away.
For more information, please contact us.

These frontline beach apartments are due to be constructed by July 2025 and yours to own being a stone's throw away from the sand and sea. Walking distance to amenities and restaurants and just 9km from the lively beach town of Denia.
The properties are comprised of 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, but there are also 2 bedrooms available, ground floor apartments with large terraces and penthouses. Please contact us for the latest availability as they are selling quickly. The properties come with a fully fitted kitchen with hob, extractor and oven included. Pre-installation of hot and cold air-conditioning. Electric blinds in the bedrooms and living room.
In the communal area you have a large adult pool and a children's pool. There is also outside parking for bicycles. You can purchase a underground car parking space for â¬12,000 plus IVA. There is pre-installation of electric car chargers.

This is a brand-new development of just three detached villas of three and three bedrooms, with a private swimming pool, terrace, and private garden located in the charming town of Alcalali in the heart of Jalon Valley. The 3-bedroom villa has the license in place and will be ready in 12 to 16 months.
The villas are distributed over two floors. On the ground floor, there is a good-sized bedroom and a shared bathroom, a separate kitchen with all white goods included, and a living room with a patio door to a nice terrace overlooking the private swimming pool. On the first floor, there are two double bedrooms, a family bathroom, and a large terrace with views of the mountains. The master bedroom will also be an ensuite. Outside there is a private and easy-to-maintain garden and secured parking space for two cars.
There is the option of adding Solar Panels for an extra cost and having input into the design. Please contact us for more details.
Alcalali is a traditional Spanish village but very popular for walkers and cyclists as well as for its bars and restaurants. It also has its own theatre, museum, school, and sports complex. It is famous for the Festlali, a blossom trees festival. Alcalali is perfect for nature lovers but also is one step away from Denia, Calpe, Moraira, and their sandy beaches.

property.property-address: Cumbre del Sol, Costa Blanca North
property.desc:
These 2 bedrooms, 2 bathroom new build apartments are currently under construction, with a modern architecture and located in the sea front residential area of Cumbre del Sol nestled between Moraira and Javea.
The properties comprise of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, an open plan kitchen, living room with outside space. Some have sea views towards Moraira and Calpe but the majority have valley views.
There are various models to choose from; ground floor, mid floor and top floor, some with terraces and gardens or both. All apartments come with under-floor heating and hot and cold ducted air conditioning. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The communal areas are designed for relaxing, with a communal swimming pool surrounded by large terraces to enjoy the sun, a playground for kids, a social club, communal gardens and parking areas. Within a short distance to Cala del Llebeig, Moraira and all the services that Residential Resort Cumbre del Sol has to offer.

These 3 bed 2 bath KEY READY apartments are in Calpe located just a few meters from the beach, overlooking the salt lakes and the famous Ifach rock, walking distance to the town surrounded by all desirable facilities such as restaurants, supermarkets, shops, bars and banks.
Both buildings will have 15 floors and there will be 85 apartments with two or three bedrooms, two bathrooms, living-dining room with a fully fitted open kitchen, large windows and partially covered terraces with sea views from half of the height of the building. You can customize the apartment to your taste by choosing between several choices of materials provided by the Developer.
Included in the price is video intercom, TV connection, telephone and internet connection, built-in wardrobes and fully installed hot and cold air-conditioning.
The communal area has gardens, a large swimming pool, a paddle tennis court and an indoor recreation area. To admire the sunset, each building has its own common space with sea views, a gym, terrace and gourmet area on the 9th floor. There are underground parking spaces and storage rooms for each apartment which come at an extra â¬20,000.
The apartments are due to be completed the first quarter of 2023. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The vibrant town of Calpe offers many amenities including many fine restaurants and bars to choose from. In the early evening, the town becomes pedestrianised and the restaurants spill out onto the streets giving the whole town a party atmosphere. Many festivals take place throughout the year where you can experience the Spanish culture and traditions. The working port has a regular ferry service to Benidorm should you wish to explore the city. Water sports are available in the summer months including jet skiing and surfing and of course for those golf enthusiasts, the three golf courses in Finestrat are just a short drive away.

LAST REMAINING, apartments left. This 13th floor 3 bedroom penthouse is ready to move into with sea views. The complex is being built right in the town centre and walking distance to the sandy beaches and town of Calpe. Under construction and ready for December 2025.
This apartment has an open plan fitted kitchen with an oven, hob and extractor included in the price. There are three double bedrooms, one with an en-suite bathroom and a separate shower room. The properties benefit from fully installed hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from a communal swimming pool, a children's play area and underground parking. There is also a gymnasium and indoor heated pool. It is just 100m from the beach of Calpe. Please contact us for the latest availability.
Calpe is one of the livelier areas of the north Costa Blanca and is busy all year round. The town center with a great selection of fashion boutiques, shops, cafes and restaurants becomes pedestrianized in the early evenings and the restaurant tables spill out into the street giving it a real buzz. It is only a 45 minute drive to Alicante airport.

LAST REMAINING apartments left. This 5th floor 2 bedroom apartment is ready to move into. There are 42 apartments in total from the first floor to the 8th floor with a lift to all levels. The complex is being built right in the town centre and walking distance to the sandy beaches and town of Calpe. Under construction and ready for December 2025.
This apartment has an open plan fitted kitchen with an oven, hob and extractor included in the price. There are two double bedrooms, one with an en-suite bathroom and a separate shower room.
The properties benefit from fully installed hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from a communal swimming pool, a children's play area and underground parking as well as a gymnasium and indoor pool. It is just 100m from the beach of Calpe. Please contact us for the latest availability.
Calpe is one of the livelier areas of the north Costa Blanca and is busy all year round. The town centre with a great selection of fashion boutiques, shops, cafes and restaurants becomes pedestrianized in the early evenings and the restaurant tables spill out into the street giving it a real buzz. It is only a 45 minute drive to Alicante airport.

23 bespoke quality homes to be built on plots near Tosalet in Javea, 7 minutes from the beach.
Cumbres del Tosalet is a beautiful housing complex located next to the prestigious El Tosalet urbanisation, a benchmark for high quality of life and Palladian architecture. Cumbres del Tosalet provides all the privacy you need, whilst also letting you make the most of the Mediterranean light. These are very modern villas, completely integrated with their surroundings, that will allow you to live with all comforts, as they are houses built to the highest standards of quality and with the very best materials. In addition, you will have options for all the technology and home automation services that you would expect from your home.
Cumbres del Tosalet has 23 plots with varying positions, which means that you can select the one that best suits your needs. All the villas are designed with an architecture suiting a contemporary lifestyle, which contrasts with their traditional, noble and high-quality materials such as Tosca stone or similar material, giving the villas added warmth and personality.
Furthermore, the villas are totally bespoke as per your preferences. We offer 4 basic villa models, all of which are completely adaptable to your needs, so that you can create the villa in which you really enjoy to live: with one or two floors, with extra day or night zones, all the bedrooms and other rooms that you need, parking spaces, swimming pools, gardens, etc. You are free to adapt, expand, integrate, widen, shrink, or redistribute however you see fit. Choose how you want to live, and together weâll create your ideal home.
All models are a minimum of 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, but you can change this to adapt your needs if you need more bedrooms. Please contact us for the latest availability on plots.
Cumbres del Tosalet is located just 7 minutes by road from the Playa Arenal area, with all amenities nearby: supermarkets, clinics and schools, as well as bars and restaurants where you can enjoy authentic Mediterranean cuisine. In addition, Cumbres del Tosalet is only a stoneâs throw from the magnificent beaches of La Granadella and Platja del Portitxol, an ideal location to enjoy all the pleasures of this spectacular Mediterranean enclave. JÃ¡vea offers plenty of options for leisure and relaxation: blue-flag beaches and numerous sports facilities such as gyms, golf and tennis courts, marinas and sites for fishing, sailing, surfing, diving, cycling and horse riding.
