This development offers 2 and 3 bedroom apartments and are located in Los Balcones area, within walking distance of shops and restaurants. They are only a few minutes drive from the sea and a host of bars, shops and restaurants.
Some are ready for October 2025 and others will be completed in February 2026.
There is a communal pool and an option to purchase a ground floor apartment with private terrace, or a penthouse apartment with a private roof solarium.
There is an option of an underground parking space and a storage area for 15,000â¬.
The Los Balcones area is well established and close to a great range of amenities including bars, shops and restaurants and also the bustling Spanish town of Torrevieja is only a few minutes drive away. The famous salt lakes can also be seen from some of the penthouse apartments.

This brand-new development consists of 35 high-quality apartments with 2, 3 or 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, all situated in a gated development with a lovely communal pool. There is a very good range of local amenities within easy walking distance.
The first apartments will be ready for December 2025. Ground floor apartments from â¬253.000, first floor apartments from â¬263.000 and penthouse apartments from â¬373.000. Please contact us for up to date availability and prices.
The complex is fully gated, and has a beautiful communal pool and is surrounded by landscaped communal gardens.
Included in the price are the aero-thermic boiler, electric shutters on all windows, shower screens in both bathrooms, fitted bathrooms, exterior lighting, the extractor hood in the kitchen, Johnson white goods in the kitchen and pre-installation for ducted air conditioning.
There is an option to buy a parking space in the underground garage with pre-installation for a electric car charger for â¬15.000 and a storage unit from â¬ 10.000. The top floor apartments all have a private 2.5 x 5 m pool with the option for a kitchen on the solarium.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
About the location:
Situated only 30 minutes from Alicante airport, and 15 minutes from the stunning white sandy beaches of Guardamar del Segura, this town is very popular with holiday makers and ex-pat residents. There are fantastic bars and restaurants within easy walking distance, two golf course and a water park less than 10 minutes away, and plenty of entertainment for the whole family to enjoy. This area is particularly popular with people looking to enjoy the pleasant winter climate and the health benefits that the salt lakes offer.

property.property-address: Guardamar del Segura, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This new development of luxury apartments with 3 and 4 bedrooms is situated in Guardamar del Segura, only 800 meters from the beach, and within easy walking distance of the town centre. The delivery date will be for December 2024.
Included in the price are the extractor hood in the kitchen, shower screens and mirrors in the bathrooms, aero-thermic boiler for hot water, pre-installation for ducted air conditioning, and electric shutters throughout.
There is the option to buy a parking space in the underground car park at an extra cost of â¬ 13.000, or a parking space outside at a cost of â¬ 6.000. The ground floor apartments have the option to have a private pool in the garden, at a cost of â¬ 18.000.
Guardamar del Segura is a pleasant and charming, typical Spanish, Mediterranean town. There is a medieval castle, several historical buildings going back to the times of the Moors, and the archeological site of an old roman settlement. The town centre offers a wide range of shops, bars and restaurants, and has a lovely promenade along the sea front, with stunning white sandy beaches. This is a very popular holiday destination, but also very suitable for permanent living.

property.property-address: San Miguel de Salinas, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This brand new development offers apartments and luxury villas that are being construction and ready for 2025 and 2026.
The apartments are ready for March 2025 and the villas can be built within 20 months.
Please contact us for availability on Key Ready villas.
Situated in between San Miguel de Salinas and Villamartin these properties are only a 10-minute drive to an array of bars, shops, restaurants and other local amenities. The famous Zenia Boulevard shopping center and the beaches of La Zenia are only around a 15- minute drive away also.
San Miguel is a traditional Spanish town and is very popular with tourists and the population consists of Western European expatriate communities who have settled there over the last 15 years. It boasts lots of restaurants, shops and bars and its cobbled streets have numerous Spanish tapas bars for you to enjoy a glass of wine in the sun.

These luxurious brand new 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom villas come with a private swimming pool. Ideally situated only 5 minutes walk from Campoamor beach and close to restaurants, bars and supermarkets. They are sold off-plan and take 20 months to build.
The villas are all built on one level with a 76mÂ² solarium on a 500mÂ² plot. They are comprised of a large living room, an open plan kitchen leading out to the garden area, a family bathroom and three double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, the master being en suite. There are also 2 bedroom Gemma model villas available. Please contact us now for more information.
The villas come with a lot of extras including off road parking, electric gate, electric sun blinds and pre installation for ducted hot and cold air conditioning. Underfloor heating comes at an extra cost of â¬12,000.
We think - "The position and plot size of this villa are excellent and you will struggle to find anything like it in the area."
The Cabo Roig area is very popular with tourists and has many nationalities moving into the area making it a modern cosmopolitan place to live. It has many amenities a short walk away including supermarkets, bars, shops and restaurants. There are also golf courses nearby and numerous beaches.

This development of 3 bedroom detached villas are in the lovely location in La Herrada on the outskirts of the town of Los Montesinos. They are only a short walk from bars, shops, restaurants and a short walk into the town centre where you will find many other amenities. They are built off-plan and ready within 12-14 months.
There is an option to add an underbuild to allow for further bedrooms, home office, gym or cinema room.
The area of Los Montesinos is well established and has a variety of shops, bars, restaurants, banks, pharmacies, doctors, dentists etc. The town hosts annual fiestas along with many other different events throughout the year, it is a short drive from the Blue Flag beaches of Guardamar and a short drive to Torrevieja also.

These apartments are under construction and ready for June 2026 and February 2027. The complex is in a fantastic location, walking distance to the beach and amenities of Punta Prima.
The development is fully gated for maximum security and offers extensive communal gardens, a large pool area with a main pool and separate heated pool, a childrenÂ´s pool, jacuzzi, gym, sauna, pÃ©tanque, chess table, table tennis table, paddle court, childrenÂ´s play area and a bicycle parking.
There will be 2 and 3 bedroom apartments available. The 2 bedroom apartments start at â¬ 324.000 and the 3 bedroom apartments start at â¬ 364.000.
Included in each apartment are underground parking and storage with direct elevators from garages and storage areas, pre-installation of charging for electric vehicles, vitroceramic induction hob, extractor hood, integrated oven and microwave, fridge-freezer and dishwasher ( both can be integrated ), underfloor heating in all bathrooms, hot and cold air conditioning.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
Punta Prima is part of the Orihuela Costa area, which offers clean and white beaches, beautiful golf courses, hundreds of bars and restaurants, and a fantastic all-year-round infrastructure. The dry Mediterranean climate guarantees plenty of sun, whilst the winter months offer the highest temperatures and lowest precipitations of all of mainland Spain. This area is very popular for both holiday use and permanent residency, and many ex-pats chose it for its high-quality lifestyle.

This development of 3 bedroom detached villas are walking distance to the Roda golf club and a 6 minute drive to the beach town of Los Alcazares. They are currently under construction and will be completed by February 2025.
The properties are comprised over 2 levels and also a roof solarium to enjoy sunshine all year round as well as views of the golf course.
Included in the price is a fully fitted kitchen with oven, hob, microwave and extractor fan. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. There is also a private swimming pool and off-road parking for one car.
Los Alcazares is a great Spanish beach town. Full of amenities, restaurants and coffee shops. There are nice walks to do alongside the coast. Just a 30 minute drive from Murcia airport. Roda Golf is one of the many popular Golf Resorts in the Murcia region.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
These LAST REMAINING 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom villa is KEY READY and situated in a small development of 18 properties with a beautiful communal area and swimming pool, off road parking and only a few kilometres from the sea.
The property comes with all kitchen appliances, all LED lighting and underfloor heating in both bathrooms. Fully installed air-conditioning and a summer kitchen on the solarium.
Pilar de la Horadada is a bustling Spanish town with lots of choice for bars, shops and restaurants and only a few minutes from the beach. The Dos Mares shopping mall is also a few minutes drive away.

These 3 bedroom villas are currently under construction and will be ready 12 months from signing of the sales contract.
The exterior faÃ§ade and all internal LED lighting is included. All plots will be landscaped with non-slip tiles around the pool and an off-street parking.
There are also multiple options to personalise these properties off-plan, with a choice of finishes.
Roldan is a small but vibrant town with a host of amenities, you are also close to several golf courses and just 15 minutes away from the stunning beaches of the Mar Menor.

property.property-address: San Pedro del Pinatar, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.desc:
Here we have a newly released development of just 12 premium apartments with a communal pool close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar.
There are 6 ground-floor models with a front terrace and 6 penthouses with front terrace and a large private rooftop solarium.
The layout internally is the same for all models.
These properties currently include all internal and external LED lighting, pre-installed hot and cold A/C throughout, a fully fitted kitchen with induction hob, oven, dishwasher, microwave and an off-street parking place are all included in the price. The penthouses also include a pergola with summer kitchen.
These are launch prices and are liable to change without notice, so please contact us for plans and current availability.
Located close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar you are within walking distance to all the amenities you could need and a host of great cafes and restaurants which is busy all year round. The stunning beaches of the Mar Menor and Mediteranean are a very short drive away as are several local golf courses. The town is well connected by motorways and you would reach Murcia International Airport in 30 minutes while Alicante is just 45 minutes away.

A development of KEY READY and Detached Villas
Included in the price are: all whitegoods (oven, hob, fridge-freezer, extractor, dishwasher and microwave), all internal and external LED lighting, private swimming pool, hot and cold airconditioning installed, included garage-basement 160 m2, solarium, terraced areas, garden and stunning sea views.
Los Belones is a typical Spanish village, just 2 kilometers from the Mar Menor seafront, with a lovely promenade, marina, supermarket, several bars and restaurants, a tennis club with bar/restaurant, padel tennis courts and a gym. Close by you have the famous La Manga Club resort with 3 golf courses, the beautiful fishing village of Cabo de Palos with a wealth of fantastic restaurants, stunning beaches for snorkeling and the best diving in the Mediterranean, and a fantastic national park Cala Blanca, with hiking routes and beautiful beaches. A truly privileged location!

property.property-address: Santiago de la Ribera, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.desc:
This is a development of 8 Semi-Detached villas that are KEY READY. Walking distance to the promenade and beach and the lovely coastal town of Santiago de la Ribera.
Each property has a private pool and includes off-street parking at the rear, interior and exterior LED lighting and kitchen appliances. There is also a rooftop solarium on the semi-detached properties.
Santiago de la Ribera town centre is a short walk away with a host of great bars, restaurants and supermarkets. On the shores of the Mar Menor, the largest Salt Lake lagoon in Europe, famed for its shallow warm waters, perfect for families and water sport enthusiasts alike. Great transport links via the AP7 motorway taking you to the new Murcia International airport in 30 minutes and Alicante airport in just 45 minutes.

This exclusive development of only six contemporary villas is situated only 3 kilometres from the beach, in an established area, and with a good range of local shops, bars, and restaurants on your doorstep.
These 3 bed, 2 bath villas are under construction and can be ready in 4 months time.
The outside area comes fully landscaped, with artificial grass areas, mature trees and shrubs, and tiled terraces.
Included in the price are: ducted air conditioning fully installed throughout the villa, LED lights inside and outside, kitchen appliances, electric shutters, off road parking with electric car sliding gate, domotica- smart home technology and private pool.
These prices are correct at time of listing but are liable to change without notice, so please contact us for up to date availability and floor plans.
San Javier is a popular holiday destination by the Mar Menor, with easy access to the beach offering a great selection of water sports. It is an area that has a stable permanent population, which also makes it very popular for those seeking full-time residence. There is an excellent infrastructure with plenty of shops, bars and restaurants.

This development of detached and semi-detached houses are under construction and available to purchase ready to move into.
One option is ready for December 2024 and then the whole complex will be complete.
The detached villas come with a private pool, the semi-detached houses have access to a large communal pool.
Situated on a large residential gated complex, within walking distance to the very popular beach town of Denia.
There are many options to choose from with different orientations and views but all of them have private roof solariums with amazing views to the Montgo mountain and towards the sea.
The properties come with fully installed hot and cold air conditioning. There is off-road parking for one or two cars.
Denia is one of the more livelier areas of the North Costa Blanca which is busy all year round. You have a town centre with a great selection of fashion boutiques, shops, cafes and restaurants which becomes pedestrianised in the early evenings. There are many fine dining restaurants as well as cobbled streets full of tapas restaurants. A great place to come and live or have a holiday.

This development is just a short drive away from Gandia town and the beach and offers Key Ready and Off-Plan apartments with sea views.
All properties come with a garage and storage space included in the price. The resort is wheelchair friendly with lifts and pathways to all properties. There are 1, 2 and 3 bed options and they all have spacious terraces.
There is access to a social club and a communal swimming pool area, a fitness centre and other sports facilities as well as a green area with outdoor gym equipment.
Close to the complex, there is a protected natural park with natural marshland, orange groves, orchards, as well as mountains, adding to the pleasant views. The nearest village nearby is Xeresa, which is just a 5-minute drive from the resort. Also, close by are the blue-flag beaches of Gandia. Nearby you can enjoy equestrian sports facilities and golf courses. Valencia and Alicante airports are easily accessible by car, train, or bus.

property.property-address: Cumbre del Sol, Costa Blanca North
property.desc:
This development is currently under construction, with a modern architecture and located in the sea front residential area of Cumbre del Sol nestled between Moraira and Javea.
All of the apartments comprise of 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms.
There are various models to choose from; ground floor, mid floor and top floor, some with terraces and gardens or both.
All apartments come with under-floor heating and hot and cold ducted air conditioning.
The communal areas are designed for relaxing, with a communal swimming pool surrounded by large terraces to enjoy the sun, a playground for kids, a social club, communal gardens and parking areas. Within a short distance to Cala del Llebeig, Moraira and all the services that Residential Resort Cumbre del Sol has to offer.

This is a very special Eco-Village development, in the hill tops of Lliber. Here you can experience a lifestyle, full of services that promote healthy living. The villas are designed for those who value a pollution-free environment and a community centered lifestyle.
Within the community here you and your family members and friends can enjoy the private hikes, cycling tracks, wine club, spa, picnic area, yoga decks and outdoor gymnasium. The community areas are pet friendly.
The villas feature spacious terraces, private pools and gardens that combine indoor and outdoor living. Residents can enjoy panoramic views of the vineyards and the Sierra del Castillo de la Solana mountain range.
Choose between two villa models, each with three bedrooms, three bathrooms and customised layouts. Enjoy the modern interior design with natural tones, warm colours and wooden elements evoking Mediterranean tradition.
These homes are perfect for those seeking an environmentally friendly lifestyle without sacrificing modern comforts. With facilities for work and leisure within walking distance, the villas are ideal for families and professionals who prioritise sustainability, health and wellbeing.
Contact Home EspaÃ±a for more information and embrace a new sense of well-being in harmony with nature. Just a 20 minute drive from the beautiful coastline. A 2 minute drive from the local villages of Jalon and Lliber.

property.property-address: Torre de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This small development of 4 luxury villas is currently being built in the centre of Torre de la Horadada, within easy walking distance of the beach and of a great selection of local bars and restaurants. These are KEY READY so you can move straight in.
Included in the price are: private pool (5 x 1.9 m), landscaped garden, electric blinds in all the bedrooms, home automation system, fully equipped kitchen, fully installed ducted air conditioning, video intercom, aero-thermic boiler, interior and exterior lights, and pre-installation for an outdoor barbecue on the roof terrace.
Torre de la Horadada is situated on the southernmost point of the Costa Blanca and is very popular with both holiday makers and permanent residents. You have the beautiful Mediterranean white sandy beaches, and the San Pedro salt lakes, famous for their medicinal properties, are also within easy walking distance. There is a good range of local amenities, with lots of shops, bars and restaurants.

property.property-address: San Miguel de Salinas, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
These brand new 2 or 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom penthouse and ground floor apartments are built to a very high standard and are situated on the Vistabella golf resort which has a beautiful 18 hole course and a host of bars, shops and restaurants. This is a new phase released and will be ready for December 2025.
The development will comprise of only 52 properties in 8 phases and has a large communal pool and communal garden area.
Vistabella Golf is a well established area with all round magnificent views, the local shops, bars and restaurants are only a few minutes walk away. The beautiful Guardamar beach is a short fifteen minute drive away.

property.property-address: San Miguel de Salinas, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
These brand new 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom detached villas are located on the Vistabella golf course situated between San Miguel and the Spanish town of Los Montesinos. These are built to order and will be ready 12 months after signing.
They are villas all on one level with their own private pool.
Vistabella Golf is a well established area with all round magnificent views, the local shops, bars and restaurants are only a few minutes walk away. The beautiful Guardamar beach is a short fifteen minute drive away.

property.property-address: San Miguel de Salinas, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
These stunning villas are located on the popular golfing area with its own host of amenities. The first phase of villas will be ready for July 2024.
There is also a 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom option available available for the beginning of 2025.
This complex is located on the Vistabella golf course between Los Montesinos and San Miguel and is only a fifteen minute drive from the beaches. The towns of Torrevieja and Orihuela are a short drive away. The properties are walking distance to the Vistabella Golf Club, which is an 18 hole course and is 6000 m long. There is a supermarket and local amenities within a 10 minute walking distance.

property.property-address: Torre de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This stunning new development of luxury apartments with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms is situated only 150 meters from the beach in Torre de la Horadada.
The apartments are situated in an established part of the town, with pleasant views over the rambla and down to the sea. They offer a very spacious living area, with patio doors giving access to the balcony, an open plan kitchen, 3 double bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms. All apartments have a parking space and a storage room in the underground garage.
Torre de la Horadada is a sought-after area that falls under the town hall of Pilar de la Horadada. Torre de la Horadada has a mixed population of local residents and expats. There are various white sandy beaches, including the fabulous Cala Higuericas. For entertainment there is the town square, which offers a great selection of bars and restaurants, the new shopping centre Plaza Nueva, and various other commercial areas. Lo Romero Golf Course is less than 10 minutes away by car.

property.property-address: Guardamar del Segura, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This brand-new development of apartments with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms is currently under construction in El Raso, near Guardamar del Segura. The first phase will be ready for delivery in June and September 2024.
The apartments have an open-plan living room/kitchen, with patio doors giving access to a spacious terrace, a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, two further bedrooms and a second bathroom. There is a choice of ground-floor apartments with private garden, middle floor apartments with balcony, and top-floor apartments with a private roof terrace. Each apartment comes with its own private parking space in the secure underground car park.
Included in the price are: all white goods in the kitchen, pre-installation for ducted air conditioning, spot lights in the kitchen, and shower screens in the bathrooms. The penthouse-apartments come with private Jacuzzi and summer kitchen on the roof terrace.
This development is fully gated for extra security, has stunning communal pools, gym area, spa with heated indoor pool, pÃ©tanque courts, childrenÂ´s playground, and a putting green to practice your golf skills.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
About the location: El Raso is an established residential area, on the borders of a salt lake, less than 3 kilometers from the white sandy beaches of Guardamar del Segura. There is a good range of shops, bars and restaurants within easy walking distance. The picturesque town of Guardamar is suitable for full-time living and offers a truly Mediterranean lifestyle. The nearby Alicante airport is only half an hourÂ´s drive away.

property.property-address: Dehesa de Campoamor, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This exclusive development of only four luxury villas is currently being built in Dehesa de Campoamor, just a few minutesÂ´ walk from the stunning white sandy beaches, the marina, and an abundance of shops, bars, and restaurants. The villas have a build size of 253 m2 and are situated on large plots of more than 500 m2 with a private pool.
There is a private lift from the underground garage, going up to both upper levels and to the roof terrace. It offers a stunning 2,5 km long white sandy beach, lined with fantastic international restaurants. There is a selection of golf courses no more than 15 minutesÂ´ drive away. Ready for January 2025, these 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments could be yours to own and just 200m from the sea and with a roof top communal swimming pool.

This part of Torrevieja and La Mata boats a large sandy beach and long promenades to take a stroll. Conveniently located just a 30 minute drive from Alicante airport.

This brand new development of 3 bedroom, detached villas are located in the heart of the charming Spanish town Ciudad Quesada where all the amenities are a stoneâs throw away. These villas are all on one level and ready for August 2025

The villa comprises of a large lounge/dining area with patio doors leading out into the private garden with swimming pool, a stylish open plan kitchen, a master bedroom with fitted wardrobes and en suite and there is also a guest bathroom on this level.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:

The first phase of the development will be ready in the first half of 2023. When finished, there will be a total of 245 apartments. From the third floor upwards, the properties will have sea views. The development will have two communal outdoor pools, surrounded by beautiful sub-tropical gardens. There will also be a heated indoor pool, with spa area, fitness room and sauna. On the roof top there will be communal lounge areas.

It is a part of the municipality called Orihuela Costa, where you have all the amenities that you need, as well as no less than 3 championship golf courses and the fabulous Zenia Boulevard shopping centre, all within a 10 minute drive.

Nearby Ciudad Quesada offers you a wider range of amenities, including shopping centre, water park, and a vibrant nightlife. property.property-address: San Miguel de Salinas, Costa Blanca South

There is a good range of local amenities on site, with supermarket, bars and restaurants, shops, etcetera. There are also padel and tennis courts available, as well as a bowls green. Nearby San Miguel de Salinas is only a 5 minutesÂ´ drive away, and the white sandy beaches of the Guardamar and Orihuela Costa are 20 minutes by car. Vistabella Golf is very popular with holiday makers, but is also permanent residence to a lot of ex-pats.

These apartments are KEY READY!
This gated development consists of 6 blocks of apartments, situated around a communal pool. The properties have 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. There are ground-floor apartments with a private garden, first or second floor apartments with a balcony, and top-floor apartments with a private roof terrace.

The beautiful white sandy beaches are just a 5 minute drive away, as is the local Lo Romero Golf Course.

The 2-bedroom ground floor apartments have a 50 m2 garden and the 2-bedroom top floor apartments have a 69 m2 roof terrace.
The development is fully gated and offers off-road parking and a beautiful communal pool surrounded by landscaped communal gardens.
This development is situated in a quiet part of Villamartin, yet only a short stroll away from the lively bars and restaurants of Villamartin Plaza, and from the well-known Villamartin golf course. The area has an abundance of local amenities and is very popular with ex-pats, choosing it for its high-quality lifestyle. Within the wider Orihuela Costa area there are two more golf courses and various commercial areas with plenty of shops, bars and restaurants. The beautiful white sandy beaches that the area is famous for are only a short drive away, and so is the fantastic shopping centre Zenia Boulevard.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This small development of KEY READY apartments with 2 or 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms is situated in the typical Spanish town of Pilar de la Horadada, very close to a large selection of shops, bars and restaurants.

These 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom detached villas with private pools are located in the very popular Los Alcazares beach town just a 20 minute walk to the beach and a 5-10 minute walk to amenities.

A new project released and ready for May 2025 frontline to the popular Serena Golf area of Los Alcazares. Don't miss out on reserving one of these 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments with golf views or sea views.

Included in the price are fully fitted kitchens and bathrooms, electric shutters in the bedrooms and LED lighting.

These are some houses that are KEY READY and you can move straight in. Then some of the properties will be completed in the summer of 2024.

It is an area that has a stable permanent population, which also makes it very popular for those seeking full-time residence. Roldan is a small Spanish village inland from the coast of Los Alcazares and the beaches can be reached within 15 minutes by car. It is also a close driving distance to Murcia Airport.

property.property-address: San Pedro del Pinatar, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.desc:

Located close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar which is a lovely coastal town in the Murcia Region, with all the amenities you could wish for all-year-round living and close to the stunning beaches of both the Mediterranean and Mar Menor and protected natural parks. Several golf courses and shopping malls are close by, and the town is serviced easily by (ALC) Alicante airport in 45 minutes or Murcia (RMU) in 35 minutes.

A new release of very contemporary semi-detached villas walking distance to the beach and amenities of Los Alcazares. They are about to begin building and will be ready for the summer of 2025.

The properties are also walking distance to La Serena Golf course, which hosts a very nice restaurant and Golf Club overlooking the Mar Menor sea. Los Alcazares also have many restaurants, coffee shops and amenities to offer with easy access to the motorway and the local airports.

This is a fantastic, brand new development of high-quality apartments with 2 or 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, situated close to amenities and beaches.

Everything is within walking distance, with several supermarkets just a short walk away, the town centre with a host of bars and restaurants just 600m away and the promenade and beaches 800m away. Los Alcazares is a lovely coastal town on the Mar Menor and is not only a popular holiday destination but also suitable for all year residence.

property.property-address: San Pedro del Pinatar, Murcia (Costa Calida)

property.desc:
Residencial las Dunas of a small development of high-quality villas with private pools and rooftop solarium's in a great location close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar.

On the ground floor, there is a large open plan kitchen with breakfast bar, dining and living room with large patio doors leading to the front terraced area and private pool. The kitchen is fully furnished and equipped with white goods with a back door that takes you to a utility area at the rear of the property. There is a good-sized ground-floor bedroom with patio doors leading to the terrace and a family bathroom is also on this floor. Stairs lead up with LED lighting built into the wall to give a lovely mood light. On the first floor, there is a master bedroom with a private suite, balcony and walk-in wardrobe that is fully furnished as are the built-in wardrobes in all of the bedrooms. Another large guest bedroom and further bathroom make up the first floor. Stairs continue up inside the property to the rooftop solarium large enough for dining, seating and sunbathing!
Prices start from 389,900 euros
Prices and availability are liable to change without notice so please contact us for floor plans and up-to-date information.
Located close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar which is a lovely coastal town in the Murcia Region, with all the amenities you could wish for all-year-round living and close to the stunning beaches of both the Mediterranean and Mar Menor and protected natural parks. Several golf courses and shopping malls are close by, and the town is serviced easily by (ALC) Alicante airport in 45 minutes or Murcia (RMU) in 35 minutes.

These FRONT LINE BEACH apartments are due to be constructed by July 2025 and yours to own being a stone's throw away from the sand and sea. Walking distance to amenities and restaurants and just 9km from the lively beach town of Denia.
The properties are comprised of 2 and 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, but there are also 2 bedrooms available, ground floor apartments with large terraces and penthouses. Please contact us for the latest availability as they are selling quickly.

The complex is a ten minute drive from the town of Denia and walking distance to many good restaurants in the area, close to beach and the village of Els Poblets.

These apartments are to be built in front line of the beautiful of Playa del Torres in the area of Villajoyosa with direct access to the beach. The complex is situated just a 3 minute drive to Villajoyosa town and a 4 minute drive Benidorm. They will be built into elegant white tower blocks with a maximum of 6 floors with spacious green areas in between.
The kitchens come fully equipped with ceramic hob, extractor fan, oven and microwave. The properties all come with full installed hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from having a communal pool area and lifts to all levels. There is maximum security here with video surveillance system.

Villajoyosa is a pretty town known for its colourful beach houses and vibrant town with plenty of restaurants to choose from. Benidorm also have a very large host of services and facilites. Alicante airport is only a 30 minute drive away.

A very special and unique complex which is a residential development that aspires to become a sustainable, healthy, and respectful community. Full of areas to exercise, do yoga and enjoy the natural landscape and the sea. The beautiful beaches of El Vergel are just 500m away.
The project has been designed with brilliant sustainable strategies: rainwater will be collected for water irrigation and reuse systems that will give life to a lush sustainable ecosystem; refreshing gardens with native species that require minimal maintenance; large surfaces of solar panels for self-consumption energy, even multiple charging stations for electric cars. There is parking on the ground level of the complex which is secured. There is also an exclusive beach-house only for the residents where they can store their bicycles and belonging to enjoy a day by the sea.
There are 2 and 3 bedroom apartments available. First floor to Penthouse. All of the apartments have ample terraces to enjoy the light and sunshine with privacy.
There are also a selection of very nice townhouses, which are either terraced or semi-detached, some with an option for a private swimming pool.
Luxury is having everything you need while respecting the surrounding ecosystem.
Please contact us for more information.

LAST REMAINING apartments left.Â The complex is being built right in the town centre and walking distance to the sandy beaches and town of Calpe. Under construction and ready for December 2025.
The properties benefit from fully installed hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from a communal swimming pool, a children's play area and underground parking as well as a gymnasium and indoor pool. It is just 100m from the beach of Calpe. Please contact us for the latest availability.
Calpe is one of the livelier areas of the north Costa Blanca and is busy all year round. The town centre with a great selection of fashion boutiques, shops, cafes and restaurants becomes pedestrianized in the early evenings and the restaurant tables spill out into the street giving it a real buzz. It is only a 45 minute drive to Alicante airport.

Home EspaÃ±a are very proud to be able to offer you these fantastic 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, detached villas with sea views and private swimming pools. The airports of Valencia and Alicante are both an hour's drive away.

These apartments under construction and different phases are ready at different times between 2024-2026.

It has a large town centre with Spanish charm, yet with so much to offer as a holiday destination. A fantastic long sandy beach and beautiful marina as well as a historical castle. There are plenty of schools in the area if you are looking to relocate with a young family. Come to Denia and see it for yourself!

These 2 3 4 bedroom apartments are in a prime location in Denia, walking distance to the town and the popular marina with a fantastic variety of restaurants and amenities to chose from. You are also a short walk to La Marineta beach. In our opinion the best complex in the area!

The area is very popular with holiday makers and permanent residents and offers a fantastic lifestyle all year round.

Brand-new development of apartments with 2 or 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, situated in the sought-after area of Lomas de Cabo Roig. There are ground-floor apartments with a private pool, middle floor apartments with large balcony, and top-floor apartments with private roof terrace.

La Zenia Boulevard shopping centre is only 5 minutes in the car.

The complex is situated in a quiet part of Villamartin, yet only a few minutesÂ´ walk from three different golf courses (Villamartin, Las Ramblas and Campoamor) and from La Fuente commercial centre, which offers an excellent selection of bars and restaurants. All local amenities are within easy reach. Various stunning Blue Flag beaches can be found in less than 10 minutes by car, and there is also a bus connection. This area is very popular with many expats, who have chosen it for its high-quality lifestyle.

property.property-address: San Miguel de Salinas, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
These brand new 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom detached villas are located in Vistabella Golf on the outskirts of San Miguel de Salinas. Situated only a short walk from the commercial centre which has a host of restaurants, bars and shops. The blue flag beaches are a fifteen-minute drive away.
The villas are under construction and all have different completion dates for 2025. February 2025 through to December 2025.
Included with the villa is the private swimming pool, lighting, kitchen appliances, electric blinds in the lounge and bedrooms, fully fitted bathrooms with shower screens and under floor heating, solar panel for hot water and there is also the option to add a large under build to the property.
About the location: Vistabella golf course is located between Los Montesinos and San Miguel and is only a fifteen-minute drive from the beaches. The towns of Torrevieja and Orihuela are a short drive away. The properties are walking distance to the Vistabella Golf Club, which is an 18-hole course and is 6000 m long. There are paddle courts and a bowls club also. The supermarket and local amenities are within a 10-minute walk.

property.property-address: Torre de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This small development of modern townhouses with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, and with private pool, is situated only 350 meters from the Cala Higuericas beach in Torre de la Horadada.
These villas are under construction and ready for the Spring of 2025.
The development also includes a number of ground floor and top floor apartments, all with private pool, and larger detached villas.
Torre de la Horadada is a sought-after area that falls under the town hall of Pilar de la Horadada. Torre de la Horadada has a mixed population of local residents and expats. There are various white sandy beaches, including the fabulous Cala Higuericas. For entertainment there is the town square, which offers a great selection of bars and restaurants, the new shopping centre Plaza Nueva, and various other commercial areas. Lo Romero Golf Course is less than 10 minutes away by car.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This new development consists of 24 apartments with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and is currently under construction in the town of Pilar de la Horadada. The ground floor apartments have a private garden, and the top floor apartments have a large private terrace.
The apartments are situated around a central water feature, with communal gardens and a communal pool. There is also an off-road parking area, where each apartment has its own parking space.
There is a KEY READY Show House Available, then there are options for the end of 2024 and April 2025.
Pilar de la Horadada is a lively, typically Spanish town that also has a vibrant ex-pat community. It is situated in the southernmost part of the Costa Blanca, very close to the border with the Murcia region and to the fabulous Mar Menor and its adjoining salt lakes. The sandy beaches are just a couple of kilometers away and are easily accessible. The town centre itself is just around the corner and offers a great selection of bars and restaurants. Various award-winning golf courses are also available in the area.

The first block of this new development, within walking distance of Mil Palmeras beach, has just been released. There will be apartments with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The delivery date will be April 2025.

Situated in the southernmost part of the Costa Blanca, Mil Palmeras is a very popular seaside destination. This well-maintained area offers stunning white sandy beaches, and a good range of local shops, bars and restaurants. There are various golf courses, fantastic shopping centres, and typical Spanish towns within a 10 minuteÂ´ drive. The international airports of Alicante and Murcia are both about 45 minutes away.

This is a brand new development of just 6 exclusive single-storey properties with private pools, rooftop solariums and off-street parking close to the beach in Mar de Cristal.
They are all KEY READY so you can move straight in!
Prices start from 549.000 euros and corner plots from 585.900 euros.
Mar de Cristal is a small coastal village on the shores of the Mar Menor, with a lovely promenade, home to several bars and restaurants all within walking distance. There is also a popular sports centre with 8 Padel tennis courts, a large outdoor pool, a gym and a popular bar. La Manga Club resort with 3 golf courses is close by and the popular fishing village of Cabo de Palos with dozens of excellent frontline restaurants and is home to several dive centres as we enjoy the best diving in the Mediterranean at the local marine reserve. Alicante airport is an hour away and the newly opened Murcia International airport is just a 25-minute drive.

A development of 32 premium apartments with a communal pool, underground parking space and store room, just 600m to the beach in Mar de Cristal. These apartments are KEY READY!
These fantastic apartments consist of either 2 or 3 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms, the master being en-suite with a dressing room.
There are ground floors with extra-large terraces, first and second floors with large patios and penthouses with a private rooftop solarium offering fantastic views of the sea and the surrounding hills. The developer is creating these spacious apartments with a premium feel, both in terms of the modern design and the quality of finishes, fixtures and fittings. There will also be a gated communal area finished with the usual elegance of this developer with both an adult and childrenâs pool.
Other benefits include ducted hot and cold air conditioning and a fully fitted kitchen to includeÂ extractor hob , induction hob , oven , fridge freezer , dishwasher and microwave.
Mar de Cristal is a quiet urbanisation on the shores of the Mar Menor, with a lovely promenade, marina, supermarket, several bars and restaurants, a tennis club with bar/restaurant, padel tennis courts and a gym. Close by you have the famous La Manga Club resort with 3 golf courses, the typical Spanish village of Los Belones with plenty of great restaurants. Also, nearby is the beautiful fishing village of Cabo de Palos with a wealth of fantastic restaurants, stunning beaches for snorkelling and the best diving in the Mediterranean. A fantastic national park Calblanque with hiking routes and beautiful beaches. A truly privileged location!

property.property-address: San Pedro del Pinatar, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.desc:

On the ground floor, there is one bedroom and a shared bathroom, an open plan kitchen with all white goods included and a living area with large patio doors leading to the front terrace and there is a private pool included in the price. On the first floor, there are a further two good sized bedrooms and a shared bathroom with a large 20m2 terrace and a private roof solarium. On the solarium, you also have the option to build a summer kitchen for â¬8000. Externally there is off-street parking on the plot and a good-sized storage room included in the price and to the rear a small patio. All internal and external LED lighting is included in the price. The property is also sold furnished.
Located close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar which is a small coastal town in the Murcia Region, with all the amenities you could wish for all year round living and close to the stunning beaches of both the Mediterranean and Mar Menor and protected natural parks.

property.property-address: Santiago de la Ribera, Murcia (Costa Calida)
property.desc:

On the shores of the Mar Menor, the largest Salt Lake lagoon in Europe, famed for its shallow warm waters, perfect for families and water sport enthusiasts alike. Great transport links via the AP7 motorway take you to the new Murcia International Airport in 30 minutes and Alicante Airport in just 45 minutes.

Los Montesinos is a traditional Spanish town which has a host of amenities including bars, shops, restaurants and a lovely plaza area to meet and enjoy a glass of wine in the sun. The beautiful beaches of Guardamar is only a fifteen minute drive away.

Golf villas is a small development of 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom detached villas with private pools built all on one level and situated in Torrevieja only a short walk from the Habaneras shopping centre which has a host of bars, shops, restaurants. The city centre and the beautiful beaches are also only a few kilometres away.
The villas are built to order within 12 months.
Torrevieja is a large bustling Spanish town which has beachfront promenade with a great selection of shops, bars and restaurants. It has a great community made up of Western Europeans and Spanish which consists of permanent residents and regular holidaymakers.

This is the first phase of a new development which will ultimately consist of 24 villas, situated in a quiet residential area, within walking distance of Punta Prima beach and a fantastic range of local amenities.
The properties are under construction and ready for completion between 2024 and 2025.
The villas will have a build size of 130 m2, and will be built on spacious plots, with the smallest plot having 320 m2 and with a choice of larger plots available.
There is an inviting private pool, surrounded by landscaped gardens with high-density artificial grass, supplemented with areas of natural vegetation and an automatic irrigation system.

Situated just where Orihuela Costa meets Torrevieja, Punta Prima has the best of both worlds. The lively town centre, the stunning promenade, and the buzzing nightlife of Torrevieja are just a 5 minute drive away, as are the stunning beaches, the championship golf courses, and the ex-pat lifestyle of Orihuela Costa. There are various commercial areas with shops, bars and restaurants within easy walking distance.

LAST REMAINING KEY READY APARTMENTS IN MORAIRA!

The vibrant town of Calpe offers many amenities including many fine restaurants and bars to choose from. In the early evening, the town becomes pedestrianised and the restaurants spill out onto the streets giving the whole town a party atmosphere. Many festivals take place throughout the year where you can experience the Spanish culture and traditions. The working port has a regular ferry service to Benidorm should you wish to explore the city. Water sports are available in the summer months including jet skiing and surfing and of course for those golf enthusiasts, the three golf courses in Finestrat are just a short drive away.

These luxurious front line apartments are under 1km away from Denia centre, making this a highly desirable location.
LAST REMAINING APARTMENT! Ready for September 2024.

Denia is still an undiscovered treasure with more and more international tourists coming over each year. It has a large town centre with Spanish charm, yet with so much to offer as a holiday destination. A fantastic long sandy beach and beautiful marina as well as a historical castle. There are plenty of schools in the area if you are looking to relocate with a young family.

This is a luxury development with sea views, situated within a gated community with private access consisting of 30 modern design detached villas just a short drive from the stunning and picturesque town of Altea.
These independent houses are built with high-tech quality materials and exquisite finishes, located in one of the best locations in northern Costa Blanca, next to the Don Cayo Golf Club, La Olla Beach and the Campomanes Marina.
It is just 8km from Altea town centre and next to Altea la Vella. These villages are traditionally known for their quality of life, services and cultural and artistic activities, where you can practice a variety of sports and attend cultural events which bring to life the rich heritage of the area, also offering variety of restaurants with excellent cuisine. They also have direct access from the Mediterranean motorway AP7.

These projects have been designed to completely look out towards the Mediterranean with incredible sea views and offers a unique panoramic view over the North Costa Blanca coastline. This is a plot with a project with a build time of 18-24 months.
The plot totals 823mÂ², with 542Â² of living space over three floors, with a total of three bedrooms with their own en-suite bathrooms and room terraces, large kitchen with island, living room, guest toilet, open-plan basement area, machine room, garage for two cars and spacious pool terrace.
It is located at the Cumbre del Sol urbanization in Benitachell, between Javea and Moraira, one of the most sought after destinations on the North Costa Blanca, ideal for year-round living as well as enjoying holiday periods.

These plot and build projects have been designed to completely look out towards the Mediterranean, with a build time of 18-24 months.
It is located at the Cumbre del Sol urbanization in Benitachell, between Javea and Moraira, one of the most sought after destinations on the North Costa Blanca, ideal for year-round living as well as enjoying holiday periods.

These brand-new KEY READY luxury villas are situated in the urbanisation on the La Finca Golf course, on the outskirts of Los Montesinos. The current phase is now Key Ready. It comes with a â¬ 20,000 furniture pack and white goods package included in the price.

The urbanisation has its own supermarket and a few bars and restaurants, and all the amenities of Los Montesinos are also within easy walking distance. Los Montesinos has a very lively atmosphere, with a good mix of Spanish residents and expats. The larger city of Torrevieja, the beautiful sandy beaches of the Guardamar del Segura, and a range of stunning golf courses are all just a short drive away.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This brand new development consists of 17 detached villas. These modern style 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom villas are located in the town of Pilar de la Horadada and come with a private swimming pool.
The villas are under construction and ready for the Spring of 2025. Some options are Key Ready.

Pilar de la Horadada is a vibrant, typically Spanish town on the most southern point of the Costa Blanca. It has a good local infrastructure, making it a very suitable place for both permanent residency and short holidays. There is a good selection of local shops, bars and restaurants within easy walking distance. The beautiful white sandy beaches are just a 5 minute drive away, as is the local Lo Romero golf course.

This fantastic brand new front line development consists of 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. It is beautifully situated in Punta Prima on the exclusive development of Posidonia. Each property has panoramic views of the stunning Mediterranean Sea.

2 bedroom apartments start at â¬ 449.000 and 3 bedroom apartments start at â¬574.000

All of the kitchens are open-plan come with fitted kitchens and top of the range appliances. There is an aerothermal boiler and under floor heating in the bathrooms. The patio doors lead out to a beautiful terrace.

It is popular for its long sandy beaches, historical monuments such as the castle and many local festivities. Denia is famous also for its gastronomy with so many good restaurants to choose from.

It is popular for its long sandy beaches, historical monuments such as the castle and many local festivities. Denia is famous also for its gastronomy with so many good restaurants to choose from.

This LAST REMAINING 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom EAST FACING apartment is currently under construction and ready for April-May of 2025. The complex is a very close walking distance to the town of Denia and just a 10-minute walk to the Marina. A fantastic open space with a paddle court, storage and parking included.
The plot is over 10,000mÂ² of green area, 3 blocks and 63 apartments in total. Please contact us for the latest availability.
There is an ancient fig tree present which is from the 19th century, along with many beautiful Mediterranean plants to make the natural environment a key feature for this special complex.
There is a large communal pool for the residents to enjoy and all of the apartment terraces face towards the pool and green areas. There will also be a gym, a clubhouse and charging point for electric bicycles and cars.
All of the kitchens are open-plan come with fitted kitchens and top of the range appliances. There is an aerothermal boiler and under floor heating in the bathrooms. The patio doors lead out to a beautiful terrace.
Denia is an enchanting port town with a population of 43,000 and has nautical links to the Balearic Islands of Formentera, Ibiza and Mallorca. It is popular for its long sandy beaches, historical monuments such as the castle and many local festivities. Denia is famous also for its gastronomy with so many good restaurants to choose from.

These BRAND NEW East facing apartments are being constructed just 2km from the town of Denia and only 100m from the fantastic long sandy Las Marinas beach. An excellent location. The properties will be ready for December 2024.
There are only a limited amount of 2 and 3 bedroom apartments left so please do contact us for the latest availability. All of the Penthouses are sold. There are only 16 properties in total. The ground floors have very spacious gardens. The mid floors have smaller terraces of 11mÂ².
There is a communal pool and parking for all the residents of this gated complex. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. The oven, hob and extractor is included in the kitchen.

LAST REMAINING 3 Detached villas being built close to the Serena Golf Resort in Los Alcazares.
It is just a 20 minute walk to the beaches of Los Alcazares
They are ready to begin building within 10 months time from signing the contract.
These properties include a private garage, private swimming pool, air-conditioning, kitchen, home appliances (equipped kitchen with sink, fridge/freezer, dishwasher, hob, oven, and extractor), exterior interior lights (LED light fixtures) and exterior garden with electric gate for the car. There is also a private roof solarium.
La Serena Golf hosts a very nice restaurant and Golf Club overlooking the Mar Menor sea. Los Alcazares also have many restaurants, coffee shops and amenities to offer with easy access to the motorway and the local airports.

JUST RELEASED - A brand new development of 3 4 Bedroom Townhouses with sea views in the area of La Nucia, close driving distance to many amenties and the coast. Â Extraordinary panoramic views of the bays of Albir and Benidorm. Walking distance to restaurants and supermarkets.
The properties are distributed over 3 floors to make the most of the sea views from the upper living area.
There is off-road parking for 2 cars, fully installed hot and cold air-conditioning, a roof solarium to make the best of the sea views and a private garden.
In the common areas there is a large communal pool, communal gardens, paddle court, children's play area and heated Jacuzzi.
La Nucia has a lot to offer in terms of services and amenities, restaurants and banks, but is also only 10 minutes from the large beach town of Benidorm and 15 minutes from Altea and Albir. A fantastic location just a 40 minute drive away from Alicante airport.

This brand-new gated development of apartments with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, all situated around two stunning communal pools, is situated in the Los Balcones area of Torrevieja, about 3,5 kilometres from the beach.
There are ground floor apartments with a private garden, and top floor apartment with a private roof terrace. They have an open plan living room/kitchen with patio doors giving access to the terrace, a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a second bedroom and a second bathroom.
Included in the price are: fully installed ducted air conditioning, underfloor heating in both bathrooms, white goods in the kitchen, TV, and interior and exterior lights.
The development is fully gated for extra security and has lovely communal gardens, two stunning communal pools with lounge areas, a childrenÂ´s play area, and a fitness area.
About the location: Los Balcones is a sought-after residential area on the outskirts of Torrevieja. It offers a high-quality lifestyle, yet only a few minutes away from the hustle and bustle of Torrevieja city centre. There is a good range of local amenities within easy walking distance, and it is less then 10 minutes by car to a good variety of white sandy beaches and championship golf courses.

Situated only 30 minutes from Alicante airport, and 15 minutes from the stunning white sandy beaches of Guardamar del Segura, this town is very popular with holiday makers and ex-pat residents. There are fantastic bars and restaurants within easy walking distance, two golf course and a water park less than 10 minutes away, and plenty of entertainment for the whole family to enjoy. This area is particularly popular with people looking to enjoy the pleasant winter climate and the health benefits that the salt lakes offer.

This KEY READY brand-new gated development offers a choice of ground floor or top floor apartments with 2 or 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The development is situated in the popular Villamartin area, close to a variety of golf courses and white sandy beaches.
The 2-bedroom top floor apartments have a 69 m2 roof terrace.
The apartments have an open plan living room/kitchen with patio doors giving access to the terrace offering pool views. There is also a master bedroom with en-suite bathrooms and a second bedroom and second bathroom.
Included in the price are aero-thermic water boiler, LED lights, shower screen in both bathrooms, an extractor fan in the kitchen, and pre-installation for ducted air conditioning.
The development is fully gated and offers off-road parking and a beautiful communal pool surrounded by landscaped communal gardens.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
About the location: This development is situated in a quiet part of Villamartin, yet only a short stroll away from the lively bars and restaurants of Villamartin Plaza, and from the well-known Villamartin golf course. The area has an abundance of local amenities and is very popular with ex-pats, choosing it for its high-quality lifestyle. Within the wider Orihuela Costa area there are two more golf courses and various commercial areas with plenty of shops, bars and restaurants. The beautiful white sandy beaches that the area is famous for are only a short drive away, and so is the fantastic shopping centre Zenia Boulevard.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This new development consists of 24 apartments with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and is currently under construction in the town of Pilar de la Horadada. The ground floor apartments have a private garden, and the top floor apartments have a large private terrace of 68mÂ². The ground floor apartments have a special access to the communal pool that runs all the way along the row of apartments.
The apartments are under construction and ready for April 2025.
There is also an off-road parking area, where each apartment has its own parking space.
The apartments have a spacious living room, with patio doors giving access to the terrace, an open plan kitchen, a master bedroom with built-in wardrobes and en-suite bathroom, a second bedroom with built-in wardrobes, and a second bathroom.
Included in the price are: oven, hob and extractor fan in the kitchen, shower screens and mirrors in both bathrooms, LED lights in kitchens and bathrooms, outdoor lighting, and pre-installation for ducted air conditioning.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
Pilar de la Horadada is a lively, typically Spanish town that also has a vibrant ex-pat community. It is situated in the southernmost part of the Costa Blanca, very close to the border with the Murcia region and to the fabulous Mar Menor and its adjoining salt lakes. The sandy beaches are just a couple of kilometers away and are easily accessible. The town centre itself is just around the corner and offers a great selection of bars and restaurants. Various award-winning golf courses are also available in the area.

FULLY EQUIPPED APARTMENTS...
This brand-new exclusive development of 144 apartments is located in the popular area of Playa Flamenca. All apartments feature 2 or 3 bedrooms 2 bathrooms, set in a great location with stunning views, only a few minute's walk from the local restaurants, bars and shops. The stunning beaches of Playa Flamenca are less than a 10 minute walk away also.
This apartment comprises of a spacious lounge with patio doors to the private sun terrace, an open plan kitchen with fitted appliances including oven, hob, extractor, fridge/freezer, dishwasher and microwave. There is a dining area, a master bedroom with en-suite, a further bedroom and a guest bathroom.
The apartment will be ready for January 2025.
ThisÂ ground floor apartment comes with a 115mÂ² terrace. It is complete with air conditioning, all lighting, kitchen appliances, there is also an indoor Gym and Spa area, beautiful communal gardens and swimming pool, secure underground parking and storage included in the price.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
The Playa Flamenca area is very popular with tourists and most of the population consists of Western European expatriate communities who have settled there in the last 10 years, virtually transforming the village into a modern-looking town. There are also many golf courses nearby and numerous beaches.

The third phase of this development has now been released and are due to be ready for December 2025. There is a choice of 2 bedroom ground floor apartments with a garden, and 2 bedroom top floor apartments with a private roof terrace.
The ground floor apartments have a terrace of min 13.97 m2 and a private garden of min 33.24 m2. and they have the option to have their own private pool ( not included ). The ground floor apartments start at â¬ 310.000.
The 2 bedroom penthouse apartments have terraces from 19.53mÂ² and roof solariums from 73.25 m2. Here you have the option for a jacuzzi, outdoor kitchen and a pergola ( not included ). Penthouse apartments start from â¬ 370.000.
Both models comprise a spacious open plan living / dining room and fitted kitchen, a utility space, a master bedroom with walk in wardrobe and en suite bathroom, a double bedroom and a guest bathroom. Sliding doors open up from the living room and both bedrooms onto the private terrace / garden.
The penthouses have exterior stairs from here that lead up to the private solarium.
Included are hot and cold air conditioning, an alarm system, underfloor heating in the bathrooms, bathrooms with furniture, mirror and shower screen, automatic blinds in the bedrooms and underground parking.
The community will be gated to give you full peace of mind and will offer beautiful sub-tropical communal gardens with 3 communal pools, heated pool, picnic and fitness area.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.

These modern apartments are located a few minutes from the city of Rojales and are equipped with a private pool, air conditioning, kitchen appliances, indoor and outdoor lighting with LED spot lights. There is also a private pool included for each apartment.
The communal areas have a gym, a barbecue area, a sauna and an outdoor and indoor swimming pool and sunbathing area with hammocks.
There are 2 and 4 bedroom options. Please contact us for the latest availability and floor plans.
The concept is to be sustainable and energy efficient, with a modern design, a high quality finish and an exclusive location which is unique on the Costa Blanca.

We are offering this last remaining KEY READY, LUXURY 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom villa. Every corner of these villas has been carefully designed to offer a unique and relaxed lifestyle. Immerse yourself in the serenity of your own private garden, ideal for barbecues, family gatherings or simply relaxing in the warm Spanish sunshine.
The private swimming pool offers a refreshing option for those sunny days, surrounded by lush green areas that invite you to relax and unwind. There are spectacular views of the âEl Recorralâ Natural Park and the tranquil lagoons that surround it.
Living in DoÃ±a Pepa â Ciudad Quesada means embracing comfort. Everything essential and desirable is within walking distance, allowing you to free yourself from the constant need for a vehicle. Its strategic location is a bonus: just 30 minutes from international airports, 35 minutes from Alicante and only 5 minutes from one of the best beaches on the Costa Blanca. With mild temperatures throughout the year, it is easy to understand why it is such a sought-after residential enclave.

This new private development of apartments in Ciudad Quesada, which combines modern elegance with functionality. It is under construction and ready for the end of 2024.
The ground floors have a private garden or a solarium on the top floor option, giving you an outdoor space to relax and enjoy privacy. In addition, each flat includes a parking space, ensuring convenience and security for residents.
Immerse yourself in the serenity of its splendid swimming pool, the centerpiece of its well-kept communal areas. This oasis invites you to relax and create social connections in a peaceful and harmonious environment.
This location puts you close to all essential services in Ciudad Quesada. Supermarkets, restaurants, health centre and leisure services are just a few minutes away, making your day-to-day life easier. You will enjoy the best beaches just 10 minutes away. Very close to cities such as Alicante and Torrevieja and 35 minutes from Alicante Airport.

This new development of villas with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, and with a private pool, is situated in the charming town of Benijofar, within easy walking distance of all the local amenities. The villas are due to be delivered in December 2024.
On the ground floor, the villas have a spacious living room, with patio doors giving access to the front garden and pool area, an open plan kitchen, a master bedroom, and a shower room. The second floor has two further double bedrooms and a second bathroom.
The development is situated in a quiet, residential area, opposite a municipal green area, and close to the town centre of Benijofar, where you will find a large selection of local shops, bars and restaurants. Each villa has its own individual privatepool and off-road parking space on their own plot.
Included in the price are: aero-thermic boiler for hot water, pre-installation for ducted air conditioning, electric shutters throughout the property, downlights in the kitchen and living area, wall lamps in the garden, and electric hob and extractor fan in the kitchen.
Benijofar is a very pleasant town in the southern part of the Costa Blanca, very popular with the ex-pats, yet still retaining its original Spanish charm and character. It is situated very close to Ciudad Quesada and Rojales, and offers a great range of local amenities. There are two golf courses available within a 5 minute drive, and the glorious white sandy beaches of Guardamar del Segura are only 15 minutes away. The international Alicante airport is only 30 minutes in the car.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This small development of KEY READY apartments with 2 or 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms is situated in the typical Spanish town of Pilar de la Horadada, very close to a large selection of shops, bars and restaurants.
The ground floor apartments have a 45 m2 terrace and the top floor apartments have a 12 m2 balcony and a 70 m2 roof terrace.
All kitchen appliances are included in the price, as are the underfloor heating in the bathrooms, shower screens and exterior lighting.
The community has a lovely communal pool with cascading waterfall on the roof.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
About the location: Pilar de la Horadada is a lively, typically Spanish town that also has a vibrant expat community. It is situated in the southernmost part of the Costa Blanca, very close to the fabulous Mar Menor area. The white sandy beaches are just a couple of kilometres away and are easily accessible. The town centre is just a short walk away and offers a great selection of lovely shops, bars and restaurants. Various award winning golf courses are also available in the area.

We are pleased to offer this unique project that combines an exclusive design and stunning sea views from every apartment and every room.
The three buildings are each ten stories high and will house a total of 117 touristic apartments , each consisting of three bedrooms and two bathrooms, with a garage space and an underground storage unit.
These apartments offer something that no other can in this residential area. You can enjoy your home Â for personal use, and the rest of the year it can be rented out, where you can obtain profitability without having to worry about anything, as a specialized rental company will manage everything for you.
With each apartment having a floor space of approximately 120mÂ² and a 25mÂ² terrace, which will be completed in 2025 and in which design, luxury and an exceptional landscape harmonize. Every mid floor apartment features a terrace on both the Mediterranean Sea and Mar Menor side giving you the best view of both worlds.
All the 3 bedroom + 2 bathroom apartments will be fully furnished and ready to live in, with lighting, furniture, appliances, and fully finished bathrooms. There are various types of housing to choose from in different orientations.
The complex has a reception, a Beach Club with three pool areas â an infinity, childrenâs and a heated pool, a gym, a health and well-being area with various elements such as hydrotherapeutic shower, a sensory shower, a blue shower , a sauna and a Turkish bath. It includes everything that even the most discerning of travelers may require to enjoy a truly first-class vacation.
With families in mind, the kids club will ensure that both adults and children alike have the best possible experience during their break away.
Prices and availability are subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
La Manga has an excellent, well-connected road infrastructure that allows you to reach the airports of Murcia and Alicante in 20 and 70 minutes, respectively. Trains depart from Cartagena destined for Madrid, Barcelona and other major European cities.

These 2 and 3 bedroom, apartments have KEY READY and options under construction. They are located in Villamartin and are set in a great location situated only a few minutes walk from the local restaurants, bars and shops. The fantastic La Zenia beach is also only a 10 minute drive away.
There are 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom options from 255,000â¬ that are ready for June 2025. Please contact us for the latest availability.
There is also a beautiful communal area with swimming pool to relax and chill out in the sun.
All kitchen appliances, air-conditioning and secure underground parking is included in the price.
The Villamartin area is very popular with tourists and most of the population consists of Western European expatriate communities who have settled there in the last 10 years, virtually transforming the village into a modern-looking town. There are also other golf courses nearby and numerous beaches.

A very special and unique complex which is a residential development that aspires to become a sustainable, healthy, and respectful community. Full of areas to exercise, do yoga and enjoy the natural landscape and the sea. The beautiful beaches of El Vergel are just 500m away.
The development will be ready in 2026. It is being built by a very reputable developer that has already many projects being built in the whole region of the Costa Blanca and Alicante.
The project has been designed with brilliant sustainable strategies: rainwater will be collected for water irrigation and reuse systems that will give life to a lush sustainable ecosystem; refreshing gardens with native species that require minimal maintenance; large surfaces of solar panels for self-consumption energy, even multiple charging stations for electric cars. There is parking on the ground level of the complex which is secured. There is also an exclusive beach-house only for the residents where they can store their bicycles and belonging to enjoy a day by the sea.
There are also 2 and 3 bedroom apartments available. First floor to Penthouse. All of the apartments have ample terraces to enjoy the light and sunshine with privacy.
Please scroll down to see other options and contact us for the latest availability.
Luxury is having everything you need while respecting the surrounding ecosystem.

These 1, 2 3 bedroom apartments have sea views in the popular strip of La Manga. These are under construction and ready for October 2024.
All of the apartments have sea views either towards the Mar Menor or the Mar Mayor.
Located in Murcia in south-eastern Spain, La Manga boasts a saltwater lagoon next to the Mediterranean, where there are 73 kilometres of coastline dotted with beaches sloping gently into clear, shallow waters.
The properties of this complex have been designed to optimise every last inch of space in the property, using premium materials.
We think "These make a fantastic holiday home or rental investment just a stone's throw from the beautiful Mediterranean Sea."

These 1, 2 3 bedroom apartments have sea views in the popular strip of La Manga. These are under construction and ready for October 2025.
All of the apartments have sea views either towards the Mar Menor or the Mar Mayor.
The 2 bedroom apartments come with an open-plan kitchen and a terrace with sea views.
There is pre-installation of air-conditioning.
