These 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment are located in Villamartin and are set in a great location situated only a few minutes walk from the local restaurants, bars and shops. The fantastic La Zenia beach is also only a 10 minute drive away.
The apartments are ready for June 2025. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The property is comprised of a spacious lounge area, an open plan kitchen/dining area with fitted appliances including fridge/freezer, washing machine, dishwasher, oven, hob, extractor and microwave. There are also two double bedrooms and a bathroom. Patio doors lead out onto a private terrace to enjoy the all day sun. A secured underground parking place is also included.
There is also a beautiful communal area with swimming pool to relax and chill out in the sun.
All kitchen appliances, air-conditioning and secure underground parking is included in the price.
We think - "These apartments are fantastic value for money and the location is great with the bars, restaurants and amenities only a short walk away."
The Villamartin area is very popular with tourists and most of the population consists of Western European expatriate communities who have settled there in the last 10 years, virtually transforming the village into a modern-looking town. There are also other golf courses nearby and numerous beaches.

This new development of one-level detached villas with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms and with a private pool is situated in the prestigious golf resort La Finca.
The villas are under construction and ready for June 2025
All the villas have an open plan living room/kitchen, with patio doors giving access to the garden and offering views over a private pool. There is a master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, two further double bedrooms, and a second bathroom. All three bedrooms have built-in wardrobes. An external staircase gives access to a roof terrace.
The houses are situated on spacious, fully fenced plots with car ports, finished with a landscaped garden, a private pool, and roof top solariums.
The price includes all kitchen appliances, pre-installed ducted air conditioning throughout the villas, electric security shutters, shower screens and mirrors in the bathrooms.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for more information.
La Finca Golf is a prestigious golf resort, built around the stunning La Finca golf course. It offers a high-quality lifestyle and has a good range of local shops, bars, and restaurants, all within easy walking distance. Nearby Ciudad Quesada offers you a wider range of amenities, including shopping centre, water park, and a vibrant nightlife. The beautiful white sandy beaches of Guardamar del Segura are only 15 minutes away.

We are pleased to offer this NEW RELEASE of apartments in Villajoyosa. Located just a 5 minute walk from the beach.
This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment with terrace is under construction and ready for 2026.
There are 2 3 bedroom apartments available. Ground floor, mid-floor and Penthouse. Please contact us for the latest availability.
All of the apartments face south, south-east and south-west, which guarantees a high number of hours of daylight during the day. Light will be a constant thanks to the large windows on the main faÃ§ade.
The kitchen comes with fully installed electrical appliances and is open plan.
There is a large communal swimming pool for adults and children and large landscaped communal areas, including mini golf, a gymnasium, coworking room and bicycle parking. For your maximum comfort, the development has smart mailboxes to collect your online orders when it suits you best. There is also a parking space and storage unit included in the price.
Villajoyosa stands out for its excellent, unspoilt and uncrowded beaches. In this privileged location, and surrounded by natural spaces, you will enjoy green areas, leisure activities, sports facilities and quick connections to Alicante city and the airport.
Villajoyosa is history, nature and sea. Its location, between the Sierra de Aitana mountain range and the coast, generates an exceptional climate with an average annual temperature of over 19Â°C andÂ the most hours of sunshine per year in Spain.

property.property-address: San Juan de Alicante, Costa Blanca North
property.desc:
These LAST REMAINING 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments are under construction in the beautiful beach town of San Juan de Alicante and just a 5 minute drive from the long sandy beaches. You can stroll to the beach in 30 minutes where you will find a large quantity of fine Spanish restaurants.
This property is a first floor apartment and have a 7mÂ² terrace.
There are also ground floor options available with much larger terraces. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The property comprises of an open-plan kitchen, diner and living room. Has three double bedrooms and two bathrooms. One of the bedrooms is en-suite.
The complex has a community pool area, parking and storage.
San Juan is a large beach town with a city feeling. Complete with large parks, shopping streets and golf courses. With a mountain backdrop and close to the city of Alicante and the airport. There is a tram service that takes you all the way up to Denia.

These two front row beach villa will be completed in 10 months from signing the contract and is just a stone's throw from the sand and sea. Walking distance to restaurants, 3 km to Mercadona and only 1.3 km from Club Nautico of Oliva.
The property consists of 2 - 3 bedrooms, depending on whether you want a gym or a bedroom in the basement, and 4 bathrooms. High quality materials are used on four levels. One of the highlights is the roof terrace with 100% panoramic sea view.
A cold-warm air conditioning system will be installed in the house and on the first floor external blinds will protect from the sun's rays. High quality tiles with mosaic details will be installed in the wet area. Terraces, parking space and a heated pool are also included in the purchase price.
Please contact us for more information.
There is a private beach access right next to the property.

Fantastic villa, under construction and completion is scheduled for the end of October 2024. This is your opportunity to purchase a luxury new build villa on Monte Solana in Pedreguer, with stunning sea views.
The villa is distributed on two level and has 3 bedrooms and 2 ensuite bathrooms, one also has a sauna. There is a possibility to build a 3 bathroom in the upper floor which would take 50% of the Walk-in wardrobe. In the underbuild there is a bodega, a gym, a laundry room, as well as a 74 m2 garage
The villa is built with high quality materials and the price includes the following; Terrace glazing according to plan Tiled underground garage with electric sectional door Sports room with split air conditioning and fantastic sea view Natural stone wall Electric sliding gate Intercom system Underfloor heating Air conditioning on the ground floor Photovoltaic system with lithium battery ACS solar system for hot water (solar collector, boiler, control unit) Electric shutters Windows and doors 260 cm high Floor to ceiling triple glazing Fitted kitchen with Miele appliances Floor deep shower with glass partition from floor to ceiling Freestanding bathtub Sauna
Please contact us for more information on this villa. The interior layout can still be adapted to your needs and dreams.
Construction time is approximately 9 -12 months,. 10 years warranty.

This is the LAST REMAINING, KEY READY 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in the beautiful beach town of San Juan de Alicante and just a 5 minute drive from the long sandy beaches. You can stroll to the beach in 30 minutes where you will find a large quantity of fine Spanish restaurants.
This property is a ground floor apartment with a very large 92mÂ² terrace. Built and ready to move into.

The complex has a community pool area, parking and storage.
San Juan is a large beach town with a city feeling. Complete with large parks, shopping streets and golf courses. With a mountain backdrop and close to the city of Alicante and the airport. There is a tram service that takes you all the way up to Denia.

These newly constructed apartments are ready the middle of 2025 and 2026 and are in a fantastic location walking distance to the Old Town of Javea and the Port.
There are 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms remaining. Please contact us for the latest availability.
The kitchens come fully fitted with a hob, oven, extractor fan and microwave. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from a gymnasium, a Jacuzzi, a sauna, an indoor heated pool, an outdoor communal pool, a children's play area and bicycle parking.
Javea is one of the most popular beach resorts on the Costa Blanca. With its beautiful promenades, port area and old town, it has a lot to offer. The area is busy all year round and has a large host of restaurants, cafes and bars. The beach offers water sports and boat excursions in the high season. Javea has its own golf course and is just under an hour away from Alicante airport.

This fantastic one-bedroom, one-bathroom new build apartment is the best value for money on the coast of GandÃ­a, just a 40-minute drive from the city of Valencia. The best feature of these apartments is the ample terraces, which allow the maximum amount of light to enter the entire property. This property is on the second floor with sea views. It is under construction and will be ready for December 2025.
All properties come with a garage and storage space included in the price. Most of the apartments have panoramic sea views. The resort is wheelchair friendly with lifts and pathways to all properties. The kitchen equipment includes the following white goods: Extractor, Oven, Induction Hob and Fridge. There is also fully installed hot and cold air-conditioning included in the price.
By taking advantage of these great prices, you will have the opportunity to watch the development grow into a popular resort, with all the facilities needed to keep you relaxed and entertained. There is access to a social club and a communal swimming pool area, a fitness centre and other sports facilities as well as a green area with outdoor gym equipment.
Close to the complex, there is a protected natural park with natural marshland, orange groves, orchards, as well as mountains, adding to the pleasant views. The nearest village nearby is Xeresa, which is just a 5-minute drive from the resort. Also, close by are the blue-flag beaches of Gandia. Nearby you can enjoy equestrian sports facilities and golf courses. Valencia and Alicante airports are easily accessible by car, train, or bus.

Upstairs there is a further 2 double bedrooms also, with en-suite shower rooms. There is a large upstairs sun terrace with a Jacuzzi.

24/7 attention, so that you can live with peace of mind and security, which consists of a terminal and a button that connects with the Red Cross professionals 24 hours a day, 365 days a day, facilitating a response and intervention to any need or eventuality. The push button, which can be worn hanging or on the wrist at all moment, since it is waterproof. If necessary, you just have to press it. In case of emergency, the Red Cross is responsible for notifying people of contact, as well as doctors, police, firefighters if necessary.

This small new development on only 6 apartments is currently under construction in the typical Spanish town of Pilar de la Horadada, within walking distance of all the local amenities.
This is the LAST REMAINING penthouse and it is KEY READY.
The properties consist of a spacious living room with patio doors giving access to a front terrace, an open plan kitchen, a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a second bedroom and a separate bathroom and a private roof terrace.
Included in the price are a gated parking space, aero-thermic boiler, white goods (oven, hob, extractor, fridge-freezer, and washing machine), Furniture pack, underfloor heating in the bathrooms, pre-installation for ducted air conditioning, and LED lights throughout.
There is the option to buy a separate storage unit for â¬ 4.000.
The community has a communal pool with partly covered lounge area.
Pilar de la Horadada is a vibrant, typically Spanish town on the most southern point of the Costa Blanca. It has a good local infrastructure, making it a very suitable place for both permanent residency and short holidays. There is a good selection of local shops, bars and restaurants within easy walking distance. The beautiful white sandy beaches are just a 5 minute drive away, as is the local Lo Romero golf course.

Construction time is 14-15 months from signing the contract.

property.property-address: San Miguel de Salinas, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
These brand new 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom ground floor apartments are built to a very high standard and are situated on the Vistabella golf resort which has a beautiful 18 hole course and a host of bars, shops and restaurants. This is a new phase released and will be ready for December 2025.
The properties comprise of an entrance hall, a lounge / diner, an independent kitchen, a master bedroom with en-suite, a double bedrooms and a family bathroom. There is either an external staircase leading up to a private solarium or a spacious garden depending on which apartment you choose. The development will comprise of only 52 properties in 8 phases.
The development has a large communal pool and communal garden area.
We think - "These apartments are fantastic value for money in a great location surrounded by beautiful countryside and the golf course. The supermarket, bars and restaurants are just a few minutes walk away."
Vistabella Golf is a well established area with all round magnificent views, the local shops, bars and restaurants are only a few minutes walk away. The beautiful Guardamar beach is a short fifteen minute drive away.

These 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom detached villas all on one level with private pools are ready for December 2024. Located in the very popular Los Alcazares beach town just a 20 minute walk to the beach and a 5-10 minute walk to amenities.
The property comprises of an open plan kitchen, living room and diner. There is a master bedroom with en-suite shower. And 2 more doubled bedrooms with a shared shower room. Patio doors lead out to the terrace and private pool.
Included in the price are electric shutters in the bedrooms, electric hob and extractor fan in the kitchen, fully fitted bathrooms and indoor and outdoor LED lighting.
There are two models to choose from. Some are ready for December 2024 and others will be ready for May 2025. Please contact us for the latest availability and floor plans.
Los Alcazares is a large seaside town on the Mar Menor with all amenities and two 18 hole golf courses. In close proximity to Murcia airport and the historic cities of Cartagena and Murcia.

Modenity and technology come together to deliver a home that exceeds all expectations. EachÂ apartment will feature air-conditioning and home automation, providing an experience of comfort andÂ energy efficiency. The kitchen will be fitted with high-end appliances, such as an oven, dishwasher, fridge-freezer, extractor hood and induction hob.
Its facilities, including a rooftop pool and sun terrace, will provide an unparalleled space for rest and relaxation for the luckyÂ residents. The option of purchasing a covered garage space and a storage room will be available for â¬25,000.
The properties have a truly privileged location, a stone's throw from the beach and surrounded by aÂ whole host of services and amenities, such as restaurants, shops, supermarkets, and entertainment venues. Guardamar del Segura, famous for its beautiful sandy beaches and natural surroundings, provides a quiet and relaxed lifestyle with all the necessary amenities in easy reach.

property.property-address: San Miguel de las Salinas, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This new development of 106 apartments is located in San Miguel de Salinas and will offer either 2 or 3 bedroom ground floor apartments and 2 bedroom penthouse apartments.Â This first fase of construction will be KEY READY in September 2025.
The Ground Floor apartments will benefit from a private garden and the penthouse apartments will benefit from a terrace and a solarium. The communal areas consist of two large communal pools and gardens.
The kitchen will be fully furnished with high and low cupboards, built-in sink of a bowl and worktop, a ceramic hob and integrated extractor hood.
The upper floor apartments will have a solarium with power outlet and TV antenna and water connections. All homes will also have a pre-installation for air-conditioning.
It takes a short drive or walk to the centre of San Miguel de Salinas, where you can find shops, bars and restaurants, a medical centre and sports fields . San Miguel is a traditional Spanish village with local fiestas and a popular weekly market. The closest beach is just a 20 minute drive away.

This BRAND NEW East facing penthouse with 3 bedrooms is being constructed just 2km from the town of Denia and only 100m from the fantastic long sandy Las Marinas beach. An excellent location. The properties will be ready for December 2024.
There are only a limited amount of 2 and 3 bedroom apartments left so please do contact us for the latest availability. There are only 16 properties in total. The ground floors have very spacious gardens. The mid floors have smaller terraces of 11mÂ².
There is a communal pool and parking for all the residents of this gated complex. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. The oven, hob and extractor is included in the kitchen.
Denia is an enchanting port town with a population of 43,000 and has nautical links to the Balearic Islands of Formentera, Ibiza and Mallorca. It is popular for its long sandy beaches, historical monuments such as the castle and many local festivities. Denia is famous also for its gastronomy with so many good restaurants to choose from.

These 2 bedroom apartments have sea views in the popular strip of La Manga. These are under construction and ready for May 2026.
All of the apartments have sea views either towards the Mar Menor or the Mar Mayor. The properties come with a fitted kitchen with electrical appliances and there is a gymnasium for the residents.
Located in Murcia in south-eastern Spain, La Manga boasts a saltwater lagoon next to the Mediterranean, where there are 73 kilometres of coastline dotted with beaches sloping gently into clear, shallow waters.
The properties of this complex have been designed to optimise every last inch of space in the property, using premium materials.
We think "These make a fantastic holiday home or rental investment just a stone's throw from the beautiful Mediterranean Sea."

A development of 32 premium apartments with a communal pool, underground parking space and store room, just 600m to the beach in Mar de Cristal. These apartments are KEY READY!
This is a 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom ground floor apartment with an extra large terrace with direct access to the communal pool.
Other benefits include ducted hot and cold air conditioning and a fully fitted kitchen to includeÂ extractor hob , induction hob , oven , fridge freezer , dishwasher and microwave.
The developer is creating these spacious apartments with a premium feel, both in terms of the modern design and the quality of finishes, fixtures and fittings. There will also be a gated communal area finished with the usual elegance of this developer with both an adult and childrenâs pool.
Mar de Cristal is a quiet urbanisation on the shores of the Mar Menor, with a lovely promenade, marina, supermarket, several bars and restaurants, a tennis club with bar/restaurant, padel tennis courts and a gym. Close by you have the famous La Manga Club resort with 3 golf courses, the typical Spanish village of Los Belones with plenty of great restaurants. Also, nearby is the beautiful fishing village of Cabo de Palos with a wealth of fantastic restaurants, stunning beaches for snorkelling and the best diving in the Mediterranean. A fantastic national park Calblanque with hiking routes and beautiful beaches. A truly privileged location!

This is a KEY READY 2-bedroom ground floor apartment with 2 bathrooms, the master being en-suite.
There is also a fully fitted kitchen to include extractor hob , induction hob , oven , fridge freezer , dishwasher and microwave. The apartment also has a spacious terrace and direct access to the communal pools and gardens.
Other benefits include ducted hot and cold air conditioning
The developer is creating these spacious apartments with a premium feel, both in terms of the modern design and the quality of finishes, fixtures and fittings. There will also be a gated communal area finished with the usual elegance of this developer with both an adult and childrenâs pool.
Mar de Cristal is a quiet urbanisation on the shores of the Mar Menor, with a lovely promenade, marina, supermarket, several bars and restaurants, a tennis club with bar/restaurant, padel tennis courts and a gym. Close by you have the famous La Manga Club resort with 3 golf courses, the typical Spanish village of Los Belones with plenty of great restaurants. Also, nearby is the beautiful fishing village of Cabo de Palos with a wealth of fantastic restaurants, stunning beaches for snorkelling and the best diving in the Mediterranean. A fantastic national park Calblanque with hiking routes and beautiful beaches. A truly privileged location!

This KEY READY 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom detached villa is walking distance to the Roda golf club and a 6 minute drive to the beach town of Los Alcazares. It is built and ready to move into. It comes with all of the furniture included so you just need to move in with your suitcases.
The properties are comprised over 2 levels and also a roof solarium to enjoy sunshine all year round. You have a double bedroom and shower room on the ground level and two double bedrooms and a guest shower room on the upper level. The upper level has a large terrace coming off the bedrooms with views towards the gold course. There kitchen and diner is open plan with patio doors leading out to the private swimming pool and terrace.
Included in the price is a fully fitted kitchen with oven, hob, microwave and extractor fan. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. There is off-road parking for one car.
Los Alcazares is a great Spanish beach town. Full of amenities, restaurants and coffee shops. There are nice walks to do alongside the coast. Just a 30 minute drive from Murcia airport. Roda Golf is one of the many popular Golf Resorts in the Murcia region.

These newly constructed apartments are in a fantastic location walking distance to the Old Town of Javea and the Port.
This is a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom NORTH facing apartment in Phase 4 which will be ready in 2026.
The kitchens come fully fitted with a hob, oven, extractor fan and microwave. There is pre-installation of hot and cold air conditioning. The complex benefits from a gymnasium, a Jacuzzi, a sauna, an indoor heated pool, an outdoor communal pool, a children's play area and bicycle parking.
Javea is one of the most popular beach resorts on the Costa Blanca. With its beautiful promenades, port area and old town, it has a lot to offer. The area is busy all year round and has a large host of restaurants, cafes and bars. The beach offers water sports and boat excursions in the high season. Javea has its own golf course and is just under an hour away from Alicante airport.

This 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom detached villa is under construction and ready by September 2024 in Mil Palmeras.
It is distributed over 3 levels as it has a private roof solarium. It has 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. One of the bedrooms is on the ground level with a separate shower room. There is an open plan kitchen with oven, hob and extractor fan.
The property comes with pre-installation of white goods, a private pool and off-road parking.
Just a short walk away, there is a very pleasant pathway surrounded by trees, where we have the Mil Palmeras beach. Furthermore, 8 minutes by car we have the beaches of Campoamor. A wide range of services ca be reached within walking distance. Several golf courses can also be reached within a short drive.

Project of 6 contemporary villas with privileged golf views in a 5 Star Resort in Algorfa, built to the highest standards, with private pool, parking space and landscaped garden. The villas are under construction and will be key ready in 2025. Prices starting from â¬509,000
Each villa has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on two levels, including a fully equipped kitchen and a private swimming pool.
Features such as private indoor parking, electric shutters, ducted Air-conditioning, underfloor heating in bathrooms, a management domotic system and a fully fitted alarm system are some of the main specifications of this exclusive development. Its south / southwest orientation provides natural lighting at any time of the year and natural heating from dawn to sunset, which reduces energy consumption.
The open concept properties with windows and sliding doors that allows cross ventilation and lets the light in. The properties are situated so that the light can enter everywhere, but at the same time it offers some fresh and cozy corners.
These Villas are located in Algorfa in the surroundings of one of the most exclusive 5-star Resorts with a golf course in Spain in the extreme south of Alicante Province. Its privileged location near La Finca Golf Spa Resort allows enjoyment of all the services the complex offers.
Additionally, it is close to the most beautiful beaches of the southern Costa Blanca and to places of exceptional beauty such as the Torrevieja Pink Salt Lakes and the Dunes of Guardamar del Segura. Its proximity and easy access to the AP-7 motorway and main national roads connect Gante Villas with numerous towns on the Costa Blanca, including Orihuela, Cartagena, Elche, Murcia and Alicante. The airports of Alicante and Murcia are less than 40 km away, offering connections to the main European capitals. Alicante, the provincial capital, is less than an hour away by car.

2/3 Bed Apartments with Views of the Pink Lagoon in Torrevieja. The apartments are under construction and will be Key Ready in June 2025.
Discover the perfect harmony between luxury and comfort in our ground floor apartments with a garden or upper floor apartments featuring a balcony and a solarium.
The residence consists of two bedrooms and two bathrooms, with the option of a third bedroom for an up price of â¬6,000 in case it's needed.
All the apartments sold before 31/08/2024 will have included the following extras: White Goods, A/C, Spotlights and exterior lights, Shower Screen in both bathrooms, Underfloor heating in bathrooms and Pergola for top floors.
Each apartment offers spectacular views of the pink lagoon of Torrevieja, creating a unique experience where nature becomes an integral part of your daily life. The communal areas are an extension of your own private oasis. Immerse yourself in the infinity pool while enjoying panoramic views of the pink lagoon, play with the little ones in the playground or stroll through the green landscaped areas.
Located just minutes away from the beaches of Torrevieja, la Zenia Boulevard shopping center and many more amenities such as supermarkets, pharmacies and restaurants. The proximity to golf courses and the highway with exit to Alicante Airport are also a highlight of the area.
It is also possible to purchase a parking space for â¬10,000 and/or a storage unit for â¬3,000 additionally.

property.property-address: San Miguel de las Salinas, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
Residential area comprising 24 villas, some of them are KEY READY and others under construction to be finished in 2025 with 3 Bedrooms, 3 Bathrooms, private pool and parking. Prices start from â¬574,000 up to â¬1,000.000
Some of the villas have a solarium and an underbuild. The villas have 237,38mÂ² built on a plot of approximately 400mÂ², a private 8 x 3.5 metres pool, featuring a palm tree, an olive tree and a private parking space with a motorized parking gate.
The price of the property includes a swimming pool, high and low kitchen furniture with countertops, cabinets with LED lighting, bathroom furniture with their sliding screens, faucets, sanitary ware, underfloor heating in the bathrooms and aerothermal system. Additionally, it features a finished open-plan basement, appliances, air conditioning and an electric gate motor.
It takes an 18 minute drive to the closest beach in Orihuela. All the necessary amenities are also close by. Golf courses and the pink salt lake can also be reached within a short drive.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
These brand new 2 or 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments are situated in a small development of 18 properties with a beautiful communal area with swimming pool and off road parking only a few kilometres from the sea.
The first phase is KEY READY and the next phase is ready in April 2025.
The apartments include all kitchen appliances, LED lights in the bathrooms, kitchen and lounge and underfloor heating in both bathrooms.
There is a beautiful communal area with swimming pool and a choice of ground floor or penthouse options available.
We think: "This is a beautiful modern property and is great value for money, set in a great location close to all amenities and is just a few minutes from the Spanish town of Pilar de la Horadada and the sea."
Pilar de la Horadada is a bustling Spanish town with lots of choice for bars, shops and restaurants and only a few minutes from the beach. The Dos Mares shopping mall is also a few minutes drive away.

property.property-address: Pilar de la Horadada, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom penthouse apartment and it is located in the area of Pilar de la Horadada and will be ready for April 2025.
The penthouses have terraces of 15mÂ². There is a lovely communal pool for all of the residents to enjoy.Included in the price are the white goods in the kitchen, air-conditioning and underfloor heating in both bathrooms and the LED lighting.
Pilar de la Horadada is a vibrant, typically Spanish town on the most southern point of the Costa Blanca. It has a good local infrastructure, making it a very suitable place for both permanent residency and short holidays. There is a good selection of local shops, bars and restaurants within easy walking distance. The beautiful white sandy beaches are just a 5 minute drive away, as is the local Lo Romero golf course.

New development with 120 apartments in Gran Alacant, in Cabo de Santa Pola, very close to the natural park of Clot de Galvany and a short distance from the beaches of CarabassÃ­.
The 2 and 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartments have a carefully designed distribution and enjoy beautiful views of the communal areas, the natural environment or the sea, and the pool and private gardens at the development.
The apartments boast a spacious living room with integrated kitchen opening onto the terrace which ensures maximum natural light and the sensation of space. The ground floor homes have large terraces and private gardens. Upper floor apartments enjoy fabulous unobstructed views from the terrace. All have access to the fantastic communal areas, including pools, garden areas, and a childrenâs play area.
Every home includes an underground parking space and a storeroom.
Located to the south of the city of Alicante, between Altet and Santa Pola, gives you the chance to make the most of everything this beautiful province has to offer: great climate, gorgeous beaches, nature, delicious cuisine, culture, excellent transport connections and good infrastructure.
Sports fans will be in their element here as this coastal area is perfect for many sporting activities, all year round, such as kitesurfing, windsurfing, sailing, fishing, diving or hiking. There are also 21 golf courses nearby for lovers of the game.

Detached Villa with 4 Bedrooms and 3-4 Bathrooms located between the Golf Courses of Villamartin and Campoamor, within a short 10-minute drive to the Campoamor Beach in OrihuelaÂ Costa.
The villa is distributed all on one level with bright colors and plenty of light. The living/dining/kitchen is open plan withÂ high and low cupboards and pre-installation of white goods.
There are 3 double bedrooms all en-suite with fitted wardrobes and the master bedroom has a separate dressing area. The fourth bedroom is a single bedroom next to the laundry/utility area that could be converted into another bathroom. In the lounge we have a guest toilet. And from here we can access the terrace with a private pool and space for a chill out area and sun loungers. It is possible to add a basement and/or solarium for an extra cost.
Supermarkets and other amenities can be reached withinÂ walking distance. Surrounded by nature, blue flagged beaches and less than an hour by car from the Alicante airport.

This is an exclusive complex located on the main avenue âHabanerasâ, in Torrevieja. With a privileged location 300 meters walk to some of the best beaches and close to all services: restaurants, cafes, supermarkets and the Habaneras shopping center. Just a 5 minutes walk to the bus station and the centre of Torrevieja.
The complex is made up of 56 apartments with 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms and a wide selection of properties, duplexes, penthouses with solariums with large terraces and impressive panoramic views of the sea or private terrace in the case of the ground floors with access directly to the common areas. All one Bedroom apartments are sold out.
All the properties have a double orientation (east and south) that guarantees cross ventilation to allow the entry of natural air and provides sunlight to them.

property.property-address: Guardamar del Segura, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
Home EspaÃ±a presents the new Oasis Laguna Project, located in the El Raso Urbanization of Guardamar del Segura. This new residential complex will consist of 78 touristic apartments distributed on the ground floor, first floor, and second floor + solarium. All the homes will have a parking space and storage room in the basement, which will be accessiblefrom the community stairs or from the elevator on each floor. The common areas will include a pool area, reception/meeting room,outdoor gym, pÃ©tanque area, mini-golf, and spa.
These apartments offer something that no other can in this residential area. You can enjoy your home for 4 months a year for personal use, and the rest of the year it can be rented out, where you can obtain profitability without having to worry about anything, as a specialized rental company will manage everything for you.
From all the first and second-floor homes in our new development, you can enjoy privileged views of the Laguna de La Mata.
Located just 10 minutes by car or 15 minutes by bike, you can enjoy Moncayo Beach, just 10 minutes by car from the Habaneras shopping center, 9 minutes from the dining and entertainment area of Ciudad Quesada, or 8 minutes from the center of Guardamar del Segura, making this development have an unbeatable location.
All the homes will be fully furnished and ready to live in, with lighting, furniture, appliances, and fully finished bathrooms. There are various types of housing to choose from in different orientations. 2 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms and 3 bedrooms + 2 bathrooms types.
All 3-bedroom homes will be corner units, making them even more exclusive for clients. Among these, we offer homes with South, East, and West orientations. All with terraces/porches facing the green area and Laguna de La Mata.
For lovers of this sport, it's worth mentioning that just 15 minutes by car, you can enjoy one of the best golf courses in Spain, located in the La Finca de Algorfa urbanization. Also, note the beautiful golf courses of La Marquesa and Vista bella, which are 10 and 20 minutes by car respectively.
PLEASE NOTE:
* There is a 21% tax to pay on top of the purchase price. * The apartments must be rented out through a specific rental agency. * It is permitted for the owners to use the property during 4 months of the year, always with previous agreement with the rental agency. * The apartments have to be rented out for the other 8 months of the year.

Newly built residential area with 15 luxury villas with 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, private pool, garden and parking, located in Sierra Cortina in Finestrat. Golf Courses, the sea and all the necessary amenities are just a stroll away.
There are three different types ofdetached villas, which varyin available floor area and room distribution.Depending on your needs, you can choose between a 3-bedroom property, with or without a basement and underground parking.The layout is designed to make best use of the space, reflectingan essential architectural concept that aims to give centre stage to the fantastic views of the bay and the gardens, from both theground floor, first floor and sun terrace.
Each plot has abeautifully-designed garden which is a true reflection of our commitment to environmental sustainability, combining maximum energy efficiency with easy maintenance.The highlight of the garden is a fabulous private poolwith a glass mosaic finish, artificial or natural grass, trees, an automatic sprinkler system and outside lights. Surrounded by steel fences with slats angled towards the sea, in order to take advantage of the sea breezes and Mediterranean woodland, to ensure optimal temperature 24 hours a day and to gain maximum benefitfrom the 320 days of sun a year offered by the Costa Blanca.

Newly built luxury villa with 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, private pool, garden and parking, located in Sierra Cortina in Finestrat. Golf Courses, the sea and all the necessary amenities are just a stroll away.
The villa is distributed in an open plan living/dining room with a furbished kitchen with Bosch appliances, a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and access to the pool terrace, a shower bathroom and a laundry/utility room. On the upper level we find the other two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and en suite. Both of the bedrooms have access to a private terrace.
The layout is designed to make best use of the space, reflectingan essential architectural concept that aims to give centre stage to the fantastic views and large windows to allow plenty of natural light coming in.
The plot has a beautifully-designed garden with a fabulous private pool with a glass mosaic finish, artificial or natural grass, trees, an automatic sprinkler system and outside lights. Surrounded by steel fences with slats angled towards the sea, in order to take advantage of the sea breezes and Mediterranean woodland, to ensure optimal temperature 24 hours a day and to gain maximum benefitfrom the 320 days of sun a year offered by the Costa Blanca.

Newly built luxury villa with 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, basement, private pool, garden and parking, located in Sierra Cortina in Finestrat. Golf Courses, the sea and all the necessary amenities are just a stroll away.
The villa is distributed in an open plan living/dining room with a furnished kitchen with Bosch appliances, a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and access to the pool terrace, a shower bathroom and a laundry/utility room. On the upper level we find the other two bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and en suite. Both of the bedrooms have access to a private terrace. The is also aÂ 62mÂ² basement floor with natural light that can be converted into a further bedroom or to be used as an entertaining area.
The layout is designed to make best use of the space, reflectingan essential architectural concept that aims to give centre stage to the fantastic views of the bay and the gardens, from both theground floor, first floor and sun terrace, and large windows to allow plenty of natural light coming in.
The plot has a beautifully-designed garden with a fabulous private pool with a glass mosaic finish, artificial or natural grass, trees, an automatic sprinkler system and outside lights. Surrounded by steel fences with slats angled towards the sea, in order to take advantage of the sea breezes and Mediterranean woodland, to ensure optimal temperature 24 hours a day and to gain maximum benefitfrom the 320 days of sun a year offered by the Costa Blanca., with or without a basement and underground parking.

These 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom villas come with the option of a private pool are located in the popular area of Els Poblets and are under construction, ready to be lived in by the summer of 2025.
The properties are all on one level and come with solar panels, fully installed hot and cold air-conditioning and a private roof solarium which offers and extra 58mÂ² of terracing to enjoy the outdoor weather. There is also off-road parking for one car.
A private pool is extra and the price is from 18,000 EUR plus IVA.
You can walk to all of the local amenities including restaurants, supermarkets and shops. The beach is also just 1.5km away.
Please contact us for a viewing of the area and you can visit a show house by the same developer with a similar specification to get the idea of the quality of all of the materials.
Els Poblets is a residential area, close to the beach. Just a 15 minute drive away from Denia and 1 hour from both Alicante and Valencia airports.

property.property-address: Las Colinas Golf, Costa Blanca South
property.desc:
Welcome to the new private villa complex located in the heart of Spain's finest golf courses, Las Colinas on the Costa Blanca. The complex consists of three individual villas, each with two floors: a basement and the first floor, parking spaces, a large terrace with a swimming pool, and plenty of green space.
Each villa has 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, as well as the possibility to customize the basement floor into aliving area. You can create a cozy atmosphere according to your wishes and needs.
The design is modern and built with the best premium-class building and finishing materials and technologies in construction. Included are furnished kitchens with Bosch appliances, furnished bathrooms, fitted wardrobes, home automation, LED lighting, ducted air conditioning, parking area with an access point for electric car charger, an outdoor shower, etc.
Costa Blanca is a tourist region of Spain, in the province of Alicante on the eastern coast. There are plenty of infrastructure facilities near Las Colinas. Alicante-Elche Airport is a major international airport that serves a large number of flights from different countries around the world, and it's about an hour's drive away.

Luxury Villas in the prestigious area of Finestrat just 15 minutes drive to the closest beach.
Consisting of an open plan living/dining/kitchen, a bathroom and a bedroom on the basement floor with direct access to the pool terrace, 3/4 bedrooms and 3/4Â bathooms on the mid floor and a solarium on the upper level.
The master bedroom benefits from a walk in closet and en suite and the other two bedrooms also have an en suite bathroom.
The modern style of decoration comes with stone and wood elements. You have lots of options to personalize your villa. Just buy one in time!
The villas include a kitchen with appliances, a swimming pool 6 x 3m, fully furnished bathrooms, air conditioning preinstallation, underfloor heating in bathrooms, and electric blinds.
Open space and floor â to - ceiling windows on the ground floor ensures that you will have a bit of sun in your house at all times of the day! It creates a spectacular place to work, watch a movie or to just chill out. Open kitchen is delivered with modern furniture and practical distribution. Combination of wood and natural stone makes the house modern and rustic at the same time. Big windows bring a fresh sea breeze through the flourishing garden and pool. All these elements make the villa special and cheerful. The upstairs solarium has 360Â° views of the sea and the mountains.
There are three 18 hole golf courses and two luxurious hotel complexes in the area, Asia Gardens Hotel Thai Spa and the MeliÃ¡ Villaitana Golf. Terra Mitica theme park is a 5 minute drive away and 5 minutes in the other direction sits a very large shopping centre. It is just a 10 minute drive from the fantastic beaches of Benidorm and just 40 minutes from Alicante airport.

These 1, 2, 3 bedroom apartments have sea views in the popular strip of La Manga. These are under construction and ready for May 2026.
All of the apartments have sea views either towards the Mar Menor or the Mar Mayor. The properties come with a fitted kitchen with electrical appliances and there is a gymnasium for the residents.
Located in Murcia in south-eastern Spain, La Manga boasts a saltwater lagoon next to the Mediterranean, where there are 73 kilometres of coastline dotted with beaches sloping gently into clear, shallow waters.
The properties of this complex have been designed to optimise every last inch of space in the property, using premium materials.
We think "These make a fantastic holiday home or rental investment just a stone's throw from the beautiful Mediterranean Sea."

The villa sits on a large plot of 976 mÂ² and has a private swimming pool of 40mÂ². It includes three double bedrooms, two bathroomsÂ âan en-suite and a guest toilet. There is a fully equipped open-plan kitchen and a closed garage with two parking spaces.
Its one-floor distribution and its large windows maximise its integration into the environment and facilitate outdoor living. Conceived for the enjoyment of the Mediterranean climate and landscape, this exclusive villa is very unique within the residential complex, both for its avant-garde design and its high-quality standards.

This is the very last remaining 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom luxury apartment on a very private development with stunning views located in one of the most coveted and privileged areas of the Sierra de Altea. Equipped with spectacular terraces, offering panoramic views over the bay of Altea, including the Isle of Altea, Altea La Vella and El Albir. The property will be finished in February 2025.
Each property has a total of three bedrooms, equipped with large fully fitted wardrobes, 2 bathrooms and a guest toilet. The master bedroom of approximately 51mÂ² has a large walk-in-wardrobe and a spacious en-suite bathroom, with a shower and free-standing bathtub. The other 2 bedrooms share a very large bathroom, with a walk-in shower, double washbasins and bathtub. The 3 bedrooms have direct access to the terrace and enjoy fantastic sea views.
All the bathrooms are equipped with Duravit sanitary ware, wall tiling from an Italian brand. The kitchen is equipped in keeping with the standards and quality of the entire house, with Miele appliances and high gloss lacquered furniture. The main room of the property is certainly the lounge-dining room: an area exceeding 63sqm which houses several different environments, defined by the exquisite lighting, with a screen-projector that transforms the room into a wonderful movie theatre, a bright living room with access to a fantastic terrace of over 53mÂ², with a jacuzzi and fantastic sea views.

property.property-address: San Juan de los Terreros, Almeria
property.desc:
These KEY READY apartments are just a short walking distance to the cove beaches of San Juan de los Terreros.
There are 1-3 bedroom options and there is a choice of Ground Floor, 1st Floor, 2nd Floor and Penthouse. There is a communal pool for this phase which is built and ready to move into.
There are 3 restaurants, a supermarket, gymnasium and a pharmacy within walking distance. There is also a chiringuito beach bar which is open in the high seasonal months. San Juan de los Terreros is a beautiful and tranquil area. The local town is a 5 minute drive away in the car and offers more services.

property.property-address: San Juan de los Terreros, Almeria
property.desc:

The property comprises of an open-plan living, kitchen and dining area with patio doors leading onto the terrace which is West facing where you get the morning sun.
There are other 2 bedroom apartments with 2 bathrooms or different orientations. Please contact us for the latest availability as prices are always subject to change.

A unique opportunity to be able to own one of these spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom townhouse has views overlooking the cricket ground and the golf course in the Almanzora area of Almeria which hosts restaurants and services all year round. You are only a 15 minute drive to the coast.
Desert Springs Resort is Europeâs only international award-winning luxury family resort and championship desert golf course with its very own dedicated Cricket Oval Academy.
These properties are all ready to move into and there is plenty of space to live all the year round. They also make a good rental investment as the resort hosts cricket and golf events throughout the year. There is a property maintenance company on site that can take care of all of the rentals including cleaning and 24 hour assistance.
The properties are terraced but have their own private terraces facing south and north including a roof terrace. So you always have sun throughout the year. There is also a beautiful communal pool only shared between 14 home owners.
The properties have all of the white goods and full installed air-conditioning included. There is also off-road parking for one car.
The Desert Springs Golf Resort is one of the most popular golf courses in Almeria. You are just a 30 minute drive from Mojacar and a 25 minute drive from Aguilas. Almeria International Airport is the local airport for the Almanzora region. An easy 45-minute drive along the A7, which skirts the Cabo de Gata Natural Park brings you to Desert Springs Golf Resort.

These 3 4 bedroom FRONT LINE GOLF villas are on Desert Springs Resort providing stunning views across the championship Indiana course and of the mountains.
There is a mechanical ventilation system and photovoltaic panels connected to the hot water cylinder with individually controlled hot and cold air-conditioning. There are USB ports in all rooms with high speed internet connectivity. Included in the price is a private roof solarium, built in BBQ, a landscaped private garden overlooking the golf course. In the basement there is a games room, cinema room, wine cellar, office, utility room and a fifth bathroom.
All have private parking. The price includes a private swimming pool with terrace, mechanical ventilation system to lower and ground floor, individual hot and cold air-conditioning in the living room and bedrooms, photovoltaic panels connected to the hot water cylinder, double glazing, high quality fitted kitchen with integrated white goods; oven, hob, dishwasher,washing machine,tumble drier, cooker hood and external lights.
The LAUNCH PRICE includes FREE OF CHARGE an Adult Non-Resident Resort Membership of the Desert Springs Golf Club, with the privileged possibility of up to one additional adult and two children. Non-Resident Resort memberships also FREE OF CHARGE.
Please contact us for more details.

We are pleased to offer these 3 bedroom detached villas with an option for 2 or 3 bathrooms in the beautiful area of Vera in AlmerÃ­a, within walking distance to the beach and all of the services and amenities. Here you have six kilometers of beaches which is recognised internationally for their clean waters being next to the Nature Reserve lagoon.
The colour and warmth of this model proved a relaxed lifestyle for holidays and all year round living using terracotta or wooden floors, ceilings that leave the beams visible and allowing lots of light to come in with double height windows.
The price includes a 6 x 3m private swimming pool and pre-installation of hot and cold air-conditioning.
There is a roof solarium which has the option to add a summer kitchen or Jacuzzi at an extra cost. Some of the roof terraces have sea views.
Phase II is ready for November 2024. Phase III is ready for June 2025 and Phase IV and V is ready in June 2026.
Lovers of the sea and the sun count Vera as one of the best destinations for enjoying summer days. The beaches of Vera are truly spectacular, not only for their beauty but also because they have everything necessary to satisfy the needs of visitors; even the naturist tourist is well received on the wide beaches of Vera. Those who enjoy hiking, diving, windsurfing, scuba diving and other adventure sports can find these activities in Vera.
Vera is a 45 minute drive away from the airport of AlmerÃ­a. But you can also access the area from Murcia and Alicante being a 1-2 hour drive away.

It is located just one hour from the city of Murcia and is perfectly connected to three main airports; Alicante, Murcia and Almeria.

This 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom detached villa is located in the popular area of Finestrat, close to many services, amenities and the beaches of Benidorm. It is Key Ready, which means you can move into the property straight away.
There is also another villa under construction and it will be ready for April 2025.
The property comprises of an open plan kitchen with all kitchen appliances included. The living room has patio doors that lead to the outside area, which has a large terrace for sunbathing and a private 8 x 4m swimming pool. There are Mediterranean plants and artificial grass, making it low maintenance.
There is a double room and shower room on the ground level. A bright staircase takes you up to two more double bedrooms, both with en-suite shower rooms. Then a lower staircase takes you to the underbuild where you have more accommodation including a living room, bedroom and shower room. There is also a very spacious private garage.
Finestrat is a great choice for families and those that want to live all the year round, having great access to Alicante airport and surrounded by theme parks, restaurants and the bustly beach town of Finestrat.

This new development with 2 or 3 bedroom luxury apartments with 2 bathrooms are located in the centre of Pilar de la Horadada. Just a 5 minute drive to the nearest beach and close to shops, bars, restaurants and public transport.

First floor apartments have private terraces and the penthouse apartmentsÂ include a large private solarium. All terraces on the development have a south facing terrace allowing for maximum enjoyment of the Spanish sun.
All apartments include a parking space and private storage room in the underground carpark. Pre installation of air con is included.
The buildings are surrounded by gardens with a fantastic communal swimming pool. The complex features a gym, sauna, jacuzzi, swimming pool,ChildrenÂ´s playground and bicycle parking.

These luxury 3 bedroom apartments are located next to the Oliva Nova Golf Resort and is a short walk to the beautiful sandy beaches. Some of the apartments have stunning sea views. Please contact us for the latest availability and floor plans.
The complex is very unique, where 9 of the apartments have their private pool with stunning elevated views either towards the mountains or the sea. ONLY 2 ARE LEFT WITH PRIVATE POOLS. The rest are with sun terraces.
The residential development has parking and storage spaces which will be an extra cost. There is also a communal pool with a landscaped area to enjoy a family afternoon in a securely fenced area. There are only 16 apartments with 4 apartments per floor, providing the best views and orientations with two view points per apartment bringing in lots of light.
Oliva is a gateway to the Mediterranean sea, offering direct access to kilometres of fine sandy beaches. Oliva Nova offers a full range of activities to satisfy all tastes and ages, from the Golf Club to the world class Equestrian Center

property.property-address: Calle Moratalla 2, San Pedro del Pinatar
property.desc:
This new development of six 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom luxury apartments are located in the popular area of Lo Pagan. Just a 10 minute walk to the beaches of the Mar Menor with itÂ´s famous mud baths and close to many amenities and public transport stops.
There are 2 ground floor apartments with a back terrace, 1 ground floor apartment with a terrace and private pool and 3 penthouses with a front terrace and a large private rooftop solarium with private pool. All ground floor apartment have a private closed driveway and all penthouse apartment have off road parking and a closed secured private bicycle storage room.
The layout internally is the same for all models.
Included in the price is a parking space,Â ducted hot and cold air conditioning, Kitchen complete with Bosch white goods, including induction hob and oven, microwave, fridge-freezer ,Â washing machine and dish washer, electric shutters, interior and exterior LED lighting.
Prices and availability may be subject to change, so please contact us for up-to-date details and floor plans.
Located close to the town centre of San Pedro del Pinatar you are within walking distance to all the amenities you could need and a host of great cafes and restaurants which are busy all year round. The stunning beaches of the Mar Menor and Mediteranean are a very short walk away as are several local golf courses and Dos Mares commercial centre with dozens of shops, restaurants and a cinema. The town is well connected by motorways and you can reach Murcia International Airport in 30 minutes while Alicante Airport is just 45 minutes away.
